item.text: 'agla@#// dam pa'i chos( dran pa nya bar gzhag pa///
bam po nyi shubazhi pa/ d mtshon cha nges brgyab pa dang/
nyams nas sa'i 'og ga la ba ma 'a ra der 'gro bar byed da// da
sa pa sog rgyu phan 'bul ba sde rnams kyis btagasems pa mngon pa mtho
byed do// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan yang 'khor dang bcas te/ lha ri wang can gsum pa/
ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// rang gi lag mthus dregs pa de dag 'ongs pa mngon par mthong
rgyal pom taM/ d+he bum ze sbyag pa a ka rnams gsan tha/
nas/ lha rnams mchan lta mngon par 'bebs shing/ de dag kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der rgyug par byed de//
mchar ltar phab pa des kun tu mngon par sreg pa na/ 'khor dang bcas par sa'i 'og ga la ba de nyid du rgyug par byed do// lha ma yin
kyis rgyal bo gsum bo do dag mthong nas/ lha rnams ni snying rab tu dga' bar gyur/ lham yin rnan sa ni yid dman bar gyur te/
mthu rtsal nyams pa/ mgon 'dod pa/ skyabs 'dod pa/ dpung gnyen 'dod pa thams cad sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug bar
byed do// de dag gang gi tshesa'i 'og gi sgo der lhags pa de'i tshe/ lha rnams yang baiDU'i ri'i rtse mo de la 'dzegs te 'khod do// 'di
na// ltar lham yin na sa gor ma chag par ya nga 'ongs par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir thag bzas ris dang/ rab dgod dag da dung
das 'ongs te/ lha ma yin 'di dag ni de la srog ltos/ de la brten/ de gtso bor byed pa yin no// de las rgyal ba na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur la/
de las pham nan 'di dag thams cad las pham par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ lha thams cad dga' ba shin tu skyas/ mthu shin tu skyes te/ de skad
brjod cing g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir nges par gnas par byed do// klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa yang longs spyod ldan gyi grong khyer ga la ba de na kru'i
rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ 'jog po la sogs pas dpung gan thu rtsol lhag ma lus pa rnams bcomamo// de dag kyang rab dgod de la shin tu se nas shing pa'i
mo= de la dpung tshol te/ sa lha rnams gzhom par nus kyi/ gzhan du lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni shin tu pham la/ lha'i phyogs ni rab tu 'phel te snyam mo//
deltar lha ma yin gyi phyogs klu dang/ lha ma yin de dag thams cad yid sdug bsngal zhing gnas so// de ltar de dag gnas shing lha ma yin rnams kyang yid dman par gnas te/ thag bzang
rigs dang/ rab dgod dag gis 'di ltar lha ma yin gnas gsum pam tog 'phrang dang/ brtan pa dang/ sgra gcan yang pham par gyur to zhes thos te/ de ltar mthu med par byas so//
de ltar sprob mad pa// dpung dang 'bru nyams pa de dag la mgon gzhan med de/ 'di ltar lham yin gyi dbang po khyod du bas so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod kyis 'di skad smras so//
lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum dgabag la gnas rtogs shig/ rtogs shig/ de skad smras pa dang/ lham yin rnams kyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po la 'di skad sAsaso//
'di ltar sa'i 'og gi sgo'i thaman lham yin dpung dang/ mthu nyams pa thams cad khyod la srog ltos/ khyod la dpu nga'atshol/ khyod la brtan cing mchisate mtshar kho nar nge tshanes sa'i
'og gnad du yang mchiba'i rdzom thog go/ de nas thag bzas ris dang/ rab dgod kyis 'di skad smras so// ci lha de rnams kyis brgya byin 'ongs saMm 'os/ lha ma yin rnams kyis smras
ba/ mamachisaM so// de nas rab dgod khros pa'i mig dmar pos rang gi dbung la lta zhing 'di skad smras so// rgyal chen bzhi pa dganyitshes gnas gsum du gtogs pa'i lha ma yin rnams lem
kharabyas/ dpung dang mthu nyams par byas/ brtson pa med bar byas te/ kye ma lha ma yin rnams lha'i ris kyi tshig gis dpung dmathu nyams par byas pa de'i phyir
'diltar ng cha ste/ lhathams cad pham par bya'o/ deskad smras nas/ lham yin gyi dbang bo de lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun gyi dpung bas lhag par brtson pa gang yin pa des/ dbon sna thams cad la
bsgo ba/ 'di ltar lha gsad pa dang/ lha gzhom pa dang/ lha rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir bag cha yis rdza bo tsha jus shig jus shig/ lha dang brgya byin du bcas pa ngag cig pus thub par
bya sta/ ni bdag bar ma dor bam par mi 'dod do// gang lha'i brtson 'grus dpung dang ldan pa dag/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams la lta ba dang/ skyug par 'dopa ci sami shes snyam mam
deskad smras nas thag bzas ris dang/ rab dgod de dag rnga sgra 'byin cing/ lham yin rnams rgyugasashig/ rgyugs shig/ 'di ltar sa lha thams cad pham par bya ba dung/ lham
yin thams cad 'byor ba bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid cha'o// des de skad ces bsgo nas shing rta 'khor lo rtsibs 'bum dang lha ma yin gyi 'od khyim lta bu bye ba phrag du ma dag chas so// des chas pa
dang/ ridang/ chu bo dang/ ri khrod khrod dang/ ri'ir dang/ ri'i modang/ ri rab tu bcas pagayosanas/ legs mthong tshal na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i dun
sa chos bzangasan 'jug ba'i stan gyi bar dug lo pa dang/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi em bdag gi stanayang g.yo ba lasan/ gor ma chag khar lha dang lha ma yin g yul 'gyedapar 'gyur te/
lham yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris de chas pa lta/ 'di ltar tshal dang nags tshal 'di dang/ ri khrod khrod dang/ chu klung dang/ ris dang bcas pa thams cad ng/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
'di garab tu g.yo'o// brgya byin s de ltar rig nas lha rnams la bsgo ba/ sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos shig/ chos Mshig/ 'di ltar rab dgod dang/ thag bzas ris dag lha rnams

pham par bya ba'i phyir cha zhing 'dug go/ de'i phyir bdag kyang 'di ltar blang bo ches srungs kyi bu la zhon/ lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der 'byong bar bya'o//
gang gi phyir rab dgod dang/ thag bzangs ris kyi g.yul 'gyed pa gang yin pa deralhabadag bani sama mthong ngo// desad smras pa dang/ 'diltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin de ni dpung gi gtso
bo yin te/ lha'i banas chos bzas dang/ grong khyer blta na sdugan gnas pa rnams la yang bsgo/ bzhimadodang bzhi mdo/ sum mdonas sum mdo dag tu yang 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyu/
byin ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'groste/ rab dgod dang/ thag bzangs ris gag la bde nyid du thams cad 'dongabar bya'o zhes bsgo'o// donas de dag lade skad smras ]
bdang/ lag chadang/ mtshonasna tshogs kyi gnas su gyur pa/ shing rtasnatshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed de/ mtshon cha thams cad yod pa der lha brgya 'am/
stong/ khri 'am/ bye ba mtshonam don du gnyer ba de dag bshing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed do// de dag rgyug ban/ rgya mtsho brug pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste/ lha rnams phan tshun dong
bshin tu brtul ba'i cha la gang gis nam mkha' yog par gyur pa rnam pa di lta bu byung ngo// de ltar de dag mtshon cha rnams blas nas/ nam mkha' la rgyub rnams ni nam mkha' la/ skam
sa la sgrub rnams ni skam sa la/ ri'i rtse mo la rgyub rnams ni'i'i rtse mo kun tu gang nas 'dong ngo// lha gzhan tshal dang/ nags tshal dag na gnasashing rtser 'dong ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag

sku kyang rnga sgra thos nas shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/ sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dod kun kyang btang nas thams cad rgyug par byed do// mtshon cha dang/ lag cha dang/ go
mtshon rab tu mang po brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ bye nga lam/ bya ba brgya phrag stong snyed dag blangs nas/ de dag thams cad brgya byin shin tu mthong bar 'dod cing 'khod do// de nas brgya byin
gyis de dag gi nyam drod rig nas lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed cing shing rta rab mang bo la zhon/ shing rta kha cig ni rin potshosna bdun gyis brgyan/ kha cig nigasar gyis brgyan/ khacig
za0 nidangul gyis brgyan/ kha cig ni bi chus brgyan/ kha cig ni sha'akhyis brgyan// kha cig ni sngag la sogs pa'i ri bo chen po rnams kyis brgyan/ kha cig ni nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan
cing nu dril bu g.yar kha'i dra bas gtibs pa/ kun s mdzes ba/ las kyis mchog ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis rtag tumedzes pan// kha cig ni gsar gyis
rab kyi rtse mo ga khyab par gnas so// brgya 'am/ stong snyad kha cig ni nam mkha' la dong ste/ lha'i dbang bo lham yin rnams pham par bya ba phyin m 'gro zhig gu snyam nas/ brgya byin
'ashin tulta zhing 'khod do// de ltar phan tshun kun nas bgatam zer zhing 'khod do// 'thabab la yadi zhugs pa thams cad 'khod do// de dag de ltar 'bod pa dang/ lha'i dbang bos

glang bo che'i kha la sbyar ba ma ta li la paso ba/ 'di ltar bzang bo songal pa'i glang po che sa srungs kyi bu/ glangapo che thams cad kyi yon tan dang ldan pa/ kha drug yod pa de la zhon nas sa lham
yin rnams pham par bya'o zhes sgo zhig/ de nas ma ta lis brgya byin gyi bka'amanos nas/ rang gi 'dod bas sprul pa'i pad+ma'i tshal naglangaboms srusakyi 'aglang bo chamang pos yongs su bskor
ba ga la ba der song ngo/ de nas glang bo tshos nga shes de la 'dis skyasaso// 'di ltar lha'i dbang bo brgya byin di khyod la 'bod// lha ma yin gyi g.yul du khyod la zhon nas/ lha ma yin nas+sa
tham par bya'o zhes gsung// de nas glang bo ches srungs kyi bu ma ta lis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// lta'i 'dunas chos bzas ga la ba der songabo te//
[p]'os pa dang ma ta lis brgya byin la smras ba/ lha'i dbang po 'di ltar glang po che'i mchog de mchis so// brgya byin gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i lus de la khaskyonamed pa brgya sprul bar byed de
kha re re la so dkar po bcu bcu/ sorar la pad+ma'i rdzing bu bcu bcu/ bats+tsha'i rdzing bu re re la ba stong stong/ bdarar lari bo bcu bonu/ ri'ir la bog ri brgyu brgya/ bogi rir ra la lha mo
ya/ brgyabargya/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas glu len bro brdung zhing shin tu chags su rung ba gzhan dang mi 'drapa'i glu dbyangs dang yang dag par ldan pa dag lenAte/ de ltar glang bo che'i

mchog sa srungs kyi khul lha'i dbang bo brgya byin sprul pa byed de// glang bo tsha'i dbang po de yang lus kun nas dbag tshad stong yod do// lha'i dbang bo brgya byin lha ma yin ms pham par bya ba'i phyig
sil snyan dang/ rol mo'is dang/ glu dang/ ca co dang/ ga zha'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pan/ kun nas rnam ba de lta bu dang ldan pa'i glang po che'i mchog dkar
bo de la zhen no// de nas de 'gro ba mngon por mthong nas/ lha rnams kyang shing rta kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs la zhon te/ mtshon cha sna tshogs ni thogs/ lus la rgyan sna tshogs ni btags/
dgod pa dang/ rtsa ba dang/ sgra dir ri 'don pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid rnam pa du ma phyir zhing yid rab tu dga' bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin dbus kyi stan la 'dug/
sta/ bsod nams kyi stobasachen po dang ni ldan/ lha'i mchog mang bos yongs su bskor/ gzhan dang mi 'dra bar ni brjod/ lha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni sos su bskor te/ sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po ni ma 'bum bas lhag ba'i 'od kyis nam mkha' 'gengs shing/ sil snyan dang/ gla sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gengs pan/ nam mkha' dpag tshad nyi khrir
bkang nas/ lha dang/ lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der 'jug par byed do// de nas de 'jug pa na/ 'jig rten skyong pa rnams bred skad 'byin cing/ brgya byin gyi drung du phyin nas/
'di ltar lha'i dbang po lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir/ rab dgodadang/ thag bzas ris dag mchis/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu dkrugs/ ri bor gtogs pa stor b
tu g.yo bar bgyid/ lha ma yin rnams sgra 'jebs pa 'byin te/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra thos so// gang thos nas rgya mtsho na gnas pa cad ng klu dag kyamathu chung par gyur/ srin
bo dang/ sha za dag kyang gum par gyur/ klu'i rgyal bo chos dang mi ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa ni shin tu dga' nas 'brug sgra 'byin/ klu'i rgyal po tshes dang ldan po 'jog po
dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pani/ 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang bozag bzas ris sa'i 'og nas byung ngo snyam nas yid dman par gyur te// 'brug sgra mi/
sgogs gsar gyi ri bo drug khri ri rab dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang g.yo bar bgyid/ 'byung po thams cad kyang spyodalug bar gyur nas/ 'phreng thogs dang/ rtag tuchos
gnas dang/ lag na yol go thogs pa// bi wa can gasum pa shin tusgyid lug pa rnams kyis bdag lha'i dbang po'i drung dumangags pa lags na/ lhalan du bgyi ba gang lags pa do
bsgrub tu gsol/ 'di ltar bdag cag rnams kyis ni gnas gsum du gtogs pa'i lham yin gyi dbang bo gsum bo mo tog 'phrang dang/ sgra gcan dang/ brtan pa dag g.yul du lan
brgya'am stod du thub lags so// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams las de skad thos nas/ lha'i dbang pos de dag la sbas ba/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'di dag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
bdag gis rig sto/ 'di dag rab dgod dang/ thag zas ris dag chas pa'i phyir bdag kyang de dag chad pas bcad de dang/ lhade rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung bya ba'i phyir 'di ltar bdag 'gro
bar bya'o// bdagazhichos kyi skyabs/ chos kyi dpung gnyen/ chos kyi brten/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ chos 'tshol ba yin te/ bdag ni chos ma yin pa la mi dga' la/ chos ma yin//
ba la yid kyang mi 'jug go/ de ltar bdag cag yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa rnams lanams kyang thub par mi 'gyur gyis/ de dag lam 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ bdag kyang/
dpung gi tshogs rab tu mang pos lha ma yin ga la ba der 'gro bar bya yis/ de dag la 'jigs par ma byed cig/ 'dzam bu gling na da dung du mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du
'dzin pa dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang/ chos dang ldan zhing/ chos skyong ba dang/ dam pa'i chos la dga' ba dang/ dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dunal gus pa dang/
las dang 'bras bu'i de nyid rig pa dang/ gso sbyong la da bar gnas pa dang/ sbyin padag sbyin par byed// bsod nams byed pa'i rang bzhin can dag rjes su skyong bar byed/ ye shes la
goms par byed/ de la yid zhugs par byed pa dag yod la/ bdag gis kyang chos dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin bsgrubs te/ de dag dang bdag cag nyung gis kyang lham yin du gtogs
pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa mdudo// de skad smras nas/ lha'i dbang po bzuma'i rig la bdang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnamaMs ga la ba der song ste/ de dag mngon par mthong nas/ lha'i
dbang bos smras pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba ga rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag 'khod pa ni lham yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir 'khod pa yin no// lha'i dbang bos de skadasmras ba dang/ 'dza
rten skyong ba dag gis slar slas pa/ 'di ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag ni brgya byin khyod la brten/ khyod la skyabs 'tshol/ khyod la gnas ba kho na lags te/
lha ma yin gyi dbang bo tshogs dang bcas pa mang rtsis lam chags par bgyid do// deskad smras pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sngon du drenab dang
bcas par rgyal bar spyon cig ces gsong por smra zhing stod par byed do// de lha'i tshog sakyis bstod cing rgyal chen bzhi'i lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de nas lha'i dbang bo 'khor dang bcas
ba shing rta 'bum phrag du ma dang/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/ glang po che sa srungs kyi khu lani snga mo bzhin zhon/ rin poche sna bdun gyisanimadzes par byas/ nam mkha' ltar rtag
tu lus 'od kyis ni gsal bar lus/ phyogs bcur rol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan gyi sgra du mas ni bkang/ lha yid rab tu dga' ba 'bum phrag dums ni chos su bskor/ ri rab zams
cad l gnas pa'i dri za rnams kyis ni mdzes par byas/ lha dang drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyisani mngon par bstod de/ bde ba dpa med pa nyams su myong zhing las kyi 'bras bu shin tu legs pa
la spyod pa 'ong ba dag mthong nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' bar gyur to// des de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas smras ba/ 'di ltar ng ni lha ma yin pham par bya ba'i
phyir da dpung chen po dang lhags pa yin gyis ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad smras so// lha'i dbang bo 'di/
ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig gis kyang pham par bgyi ba'i slad dumachis pa la gsan/ lha'i dbang bo dang bcas pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ khyod kyi dpung gis bdag
cag bskangs pas na lha ma yin du gtogs pa'i 'jigs pa cung zad kyang ma mchis so// de skad smras nas/ lha ma yin lta pa khonar 'dod pa de la mngon du phyogs pa// lha rnams kyi
dbang po brgyabyin de ga la ba der yos su bskor te 'khodapa rnams/ 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbangapo thag bzas rigs de lham yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang/ brtan pa dang/ me tog
'brang dang lhan cig tu ji srid cigan 'ong bar 'gyur snyam mo// de ltar lcagasakyi ya ladami byed pa bsgos pa// lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ lha ma yin bam par bya ba'i phyir
g.yul du chas pa/ yid gcig tu gyur pa dag rin po tsha rnam pa snatshogs kyis mdzes bar byas pa'i shing rta la zhon pa rnams 'khed de// de ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug
pa'i klu 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa g.yul 'gyedabar shin tu chas pa/ brgya byin la lta zhing bka' gus par nod pa dag brgya byin gyis bka' ci zhig stsol bar 'gyur
snyam nang 'khod do// de ltar sa'i 'og mtha' dag kun la mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa rnams la/ ji ltar lha ma yin gyi dpang po bzhi lham yin 'khor dang bcas
ba mas cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/ lag na mtshon chadang/ lag cha statshogs bye ba phrag du ma thogs pa/ lag par shin tu bsdus pa/ lag pa'i sor mos 'dzin pa rnams kyis
yos su bskor ba dab/mas cha bar byed do// de dag gi phyi bzhin du yang 'bum phrag bye ba du ma dgagos yongs su bskoracing/ ri rab thams cad mathu chen pos sgul bar byed pa// lha ma yin/
de dag thams cad dang bcas pa/ dpung dang brtson 'grus lhag par che ba/ mtshon dpag tu med pa la mkhas pa/ rirab gnyis pa lta bu cha ban/ klu'i rgyal bo chos dang mi ldan zhing/
chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rab 'dzoms la sogs pas sa'i 'og gi bdag po thag bzangs ris dang/ rab dgod yongs su bskor to// de nas de ltar lha dang lha ma yin 'khod pa dag/ lha/
rnams kyis ni nam mkha' bkan gnas 'khod/ lham yin rnams kyis kyang rgya mtsho khebs par 'khod de/ ngomatshar gyi yid kyis phan tshun 'thab pa la shin tu mos pa phan tshun du 'thab par 'dod
pan/ de ltar klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang lhan cig 'khod pa rnams/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang bos bodag cag gi mdun
lha ma yin de ltar ba khod pa 'di dag la lha ma yin dang bdag cag 'thab mo gyis shig cesacis bka' mi sol skyes brjod do// de nas lha'i dbang pos de dag la 'di skad smras so// 'di ltar/
'jig rtenaskyong ba dag 'dzam bu gling du rings par mngag par bya ste/ kyi 'dzam bu gling na phar 'dzanang/ mar 'dzin pa/ chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dag ci yod dam med/
de ltar brtags nas/ lha ma yin rnams pham par bya'o// lha dgan chos skyob pa yin/ chos kyi gnas yin te chos 'phal ban lha rnams 'phel bar 'gyur la/ chos 'grib pa na lha
rnams 'bri ba bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba dag mi yul 'dzam bu gling du bdag gis mngag par bya'o// deskadasmasanas/ lha'i dbang po brgyaban gyis 'jig rten skyong ba nas
la bsgo ba/ khyed 'dzam bu gling dumyur du de ngal 'di ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jugapa/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa// rigs kyi gtsopo'i rjes su 'jug pa/ gso sbyong
la nye bar gnas ba/ sbyin pa gtong bo/ tshul khrims srung ba/ bag yod pa rnams bag yod par gnas pa// rang gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag la so sor rtogs shig/ de skad bsgo ba
dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong ba bzhi ma dar 'phangs pa ltar shin tu mgyogs par 'dzam bu gling du dong ngo// deng nas gnas nas gnas/ gong nas grong/ grongakhyer nas grong khyer/ grong rdal nas
grongajul/ bzhim donas bzhimado/ tshul nas mul/ ldes nas ljongs/ thams cad du so sor rtog par byed de/ kyi 'di dgan mar 'dzin pa/ bar 'dzinab/
dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag su yod/ rigs kyi rganarabs rjes su skyong ba dag su yod ces/ de de ltar 'dzam bu gling 'dim lus par so sor rtog par byed do// de dag gi
'dzam bu gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshar 'dzin ba/ phar 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa/ gas kyi gtarabs rjes su skyong// 'dzam
bu gling gim rnams chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong ngo// de dag gis de ltar yig nas yidra dga' sto/ mda' 'phangs pa ltar shin tu mgyogs par lha rnams kyi dpang po brgya byin ga
la bder 'ongs nas/ yid shin tu dga' ba de dag gis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad sas so// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dgyes par mdzad du gsol// 'dzam bu gling
na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzin pa/ bar 'dzin pa// dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'tshol// rigs kyi rganarabs rjes su skyong ba/ sbyin pa gtong ba/
bsod nams bgyid pa dag mchis te/ lha'i phyogs ni rab tu 'phel bar bgyid la/ lha ma yin gyi phyogs na yongs su 'grib par bgyid lags so// de skad smras pa dang/ lha'i dbang
a bo brgya byin yid rab tu dga' nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba dag la smras pa/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dag yod pas na/ bdag cag gis lha ma yin
gyi phyogs pham par bya yis/ lha khyedakun yid dga' bar gyis shig/ de skad thos nas/ lha rnams yid rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ yid dga' ba bcu 'gyur du skyes pa'i stobs kyis
ba byin la smras pa/ lha'i dbang po ri la gzhes ci lagazhes/ dgra las rgyal bar spyon cig/ khyod kyi bka' drin las bdag cag gis lha ma yin rnams pham par bgyi'o// de skad
ces smras pa de/ lha'i dbang po klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog bo la sogs pa la 'di skad smras so// chos dang mi ldan pa klu rab 'jom la sogs pa dang/ lha ma yin thag bzang
ris dang/ rab dbod la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir khyed gsashig/ rgyugs shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ klu'i bdag po 'jog po dang nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa
klu'i bdag po chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa/ lham yin gyi thogasasu gnas par b 'jom la sogs pa ga la ba de dag gi drung du khros pa'i shugs kyis ma char ltar 'bebs shing
rnyog go/ de nas rab 'jom yang thag bzas ris dang/ rab dgod kyis bsgo pa dang/ dedag 'ong ba mngon pa mthong nas glog char ltar mngon par 'bebs so// des rab tu 'bar ba de
dog thams cad tsha ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par myong zhing/ de nas ya nga pham pa dag lha ma yin gyi dbu ga la ba der rgyug bar byed do// dpung dang mthu nyams pa de lham yin/
nang du song nas 'disang sbas so// nyams po bdag cag gis rgyal bar dka' ste/ bdagacag 'dusan ni bsgrimami gos bar lha rnams las rgyal bar nus so// de skad smras nas/
denas yong klu'i rgyal po 'jigo bo dang nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der dong ba dang/ de dag 'ong ba 'jog po dang nor rgyas kyi bu des mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ltar rab 'dzom bdag
cag gi drung du 'ongs pa chad ba drag pos gcad par bya'o// gzhan dun de yang dang yang du bdag cag la'atshabar byed do// de skad smras nas/ klu'i rgyal po rab 'jom la sogs pa ga la
der rgyugs nas/ 'jog po des rab 'jom de bzung nas steng dum char phab bo// de ma'i char des ri dang bcas pa rab tu bsreg pan/ srog 'dodapa lha ma yin gyi phyogs ga la ba der rgyug
bar byed do// de ltar de 'os pa mngon par mtho nas/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra ba/can gyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la sbas pa/ 'di ltar kA pham pa de dag la khyed kyis yid
drang por ltos shig/ de skad smras nas/ bdag dang bcas ba'i dbung des brgyugs so// de 'ong ba mthong nas/ lha 'gan lo la go thogs pa rnams kyisaM kyang brgyugs te/ de ltar de
dag phan tshun 'ong ban/ rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang lha ma yin ri'i rtse mo mi bzad b 'phan// shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i g.yul bkye'o// lha dang lha
ma yin rnam par 'khrugs pa des/ lham yin rgya mtshonargyu ba 'bum phrag dum dag las kha cig zin par gyur/ khacig ni srog dang bral lo// lha dang lha ma yin de dga rnam par 'khrus
bas mtshon cha 'bum phrag nyam nga ba char ltar bab pa'i g.yul bkye'o// danas khyadapar ni 'di yod de/ lha gang gi rkang pa bcad n slar nd mad par skye bar 'gyur lag ba bcad nAyang
nad med par skye bar 'gyur/ de ltar yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad cing gtubs kyang sa bar 'gyur te// nad med pa dang/ gnodapa med pa dang/ mdog nyams par mi 'gyur
de'i tsho su zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mgo bcad pa ni ma gtogs te/ lha rnams kyi dag yang zhikhor 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams kyang ji ltar mi rnams la mtshon chas btaban gnod pa
de ltar lha ma yin rnams la yang de bzhin 'byung ste/ lha dang lha ma yin dganang gi khyad par ni de lta bu yin te/ daltar lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams dang/ lha ma yin sgra gcan gyi
sar gtogs pa rnams kyi khyad par ni de lta bu yin no// de nas lha lagan yol go thogs pa rnams kyis ri rtsa mo can du ma blangs nas lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs te/ richar ltare'abebs
ba des lha ma yin de dag gi dpungabargya 'am stong dub comamo// de bcom pa mngon par mthong nas/ sgra gcan gyis ri dbab/tshad gsum pa byas nas brgyugs so/ lha
lagan yol ge thogs pa rnams kyis de ltar 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs te/ lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs go// ri de mtshonachachar ltar bab pa des dziltar bya
ma bzhin de ltar zhib mor lhagasanas rgya mtsho'inang dugator te// de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ dud 'gro'i gosems can gyi tho ma sgra gcan de yongs su mi chad do// mtshon chachar ltar
'bab pa na/ lha ma yin gyi dpung ga 'bader brgyugs so// lham yin kyi dbang po brtan pas de beng ba mngon par mthong nas/ rang gi 'khor rnams la sbas pa/ ri rab gnyis kyi tshad ltar
'dug pa chas pa 'di gcig pus lha 'di dag thams cad chad pas bcad par nus su gsha'agasha' lta zhig na/ 'di ltar bong tshod 'ba' zhigacher zad de mthu chung nas lha rnams kyis bsngags
glo ba dang/ mgon 'dod pa/ skabs 'dod pa/ dpung gnyen 'dodapa lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed pa/ lha ma yin phal pa dang mtshungs pa 'di nimathu dman pa yin la sman pa nyid yin no/
'di'i mdun na 'thab par gnas ba lha lagan yol go thogs pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni snying stobs che ba yin no// de skad smras nas/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo brtan par ng gi 'khor dang yapalhan cig/
lha ma yin mchog tu rgya che ba mgul 'phrang dang lhan ci'i khyugayul 'gyed pa'i phyir/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa ga la ba der rgyug par byed de// lha rnams kyis brtan pa dang de dag lhan cig 'ong
ba mthong nas lha 'brang thogs rnams la sbas so// 'di ltar brtan pa bdag nyid thams cad lha lagan yol go thogs pa rnams kyi drung du rgyug gis/ lha rnams kyang rgyugs shig/ rgyugs
shig/ de skad sbas nas/ de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang brtan pag la ba der dong ngo// de nas yang sgra gcan de brtan pas phyir bzlog ste/ kheng blta blta nas de nas yang phan
tshun 'dus te/ lus kyi mthud dpung tshol bar 'dod pa/ 'dus pa dag lhag la ba der phyir leg pa dang/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa dang/ lha ma yin sgra gcan gyis gtogs pa//
mgul 'phrang de dag dang phan tshun dgrar gyur pa phan tshun mi bzod pa sor dpung chen po'i g.yul 'gyed de/ ri'i rtsa mo rnams dang/ brag gi rtsa rnams dang/ mda'achar ltar 'bab pa rnams
dang / mtshon char ltar 'bab pa rnams dang/ shing ljon pa char ltar 'bab pa rnams kyis/ rtag tunam mkha' phan tshunamun pa 'thibs po ltar gsal bar mngon te/ bar chad byed pa khyeb
'bum phrag du ma'i g.yul dpa med pa 'gyed do// de ltar lha rnams kyi yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs pa de dag ni de nas yang snga ma bzhin slar skya'o// lha ma yin rnams kyi yan lag
dang nying lagadumakhacad pa dgand dang bcas par 'gyural/ skya bar yang mi 'gyur ro// mgo bcad b rnams kyang mi dang 'dra bar mi su'o// lha rnams kyang mgo/
bcad pa dang/ skadapa bcad pa la 'tshibar 'gyuro// deltar lha ma yin ji lta ba dastor lha rnams zad par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang lha ma yin rnam par nyams ban/ lham
yin rnams shin tu 'du ba de ltar lha rnams nim nin// de nas lhag ma phyedatsam lus pa/ lha rnams kyis bcom pa/ skyabs 'dodapa/ dpung gnyen 'dod pa dag sa'i 'og gi slog
la ba der rgyug par byed de/ slaha 'byin ba'i lha rnams kyis nya bar bcom pa/ brtson 'grusachung ba/ skyabs zhan ba/ srog dman ba dag lha ma yin gyi dbang bo brtan pa dang yang ldan cig
sgra gcan dang yang lhan cig tubros so// lha ma yin gyi dbang po de gnyis mthu nyams shing gnas nyams pa dag ma tog 'phreng gis mthong nas/ lham yin gyi dbang bo gsum pa la smras ba/
'di ltar bdag cag gis lham yin ga la ba der 'dong gis rgyugs shig/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i lha rnams bdag cag gis dbu dang/ brtson 'grus dang 'thun pas pham par bya'o//
des deskad smras pa dang/ de nas me tog 'tho lha rnams la bder rgyug par byed do// de nas de dag 'ong ba mthong nas/ dbung chen pos de nas yang bcos pa'i lhag ma phan tshun gyis brtson
0 'grus dang/ phan tshun gyis dpung gis 'dus ba bdag nyid dang 'khor mang bo dang bcas pa phyir log ste phan tshun 'di skad dod snya'o// 'diltar lham yin zhes ming du btags pa 'dici'i bros pa gtso
nar gyur tam/ brtson ba la mi gnas sam/ mtshon cha la mi brten pa lta zhig ste/ ragi gnas su yos su nyams pare'agyural/ chung ma de dag gi nang du yongs su nyams par 'gyur
ro deskadu sa nas/ de nas madradabung dang mthu rgyas bu mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dag lha ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/ ri'i rtse mo 'tshar lta bu dang/ rlungagi ltoda mngon bar
mgyogs pa de dag g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir yang 'phog go/ de nas lhakun tu sgrub dang/ lha 'phreng thogs dang/ lha rtag tu myos gnas dang/ lha lab na yol go thogos pa thachos cad phan
tshun du 'di ltar kyim lham yin 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni blo gros ma bortan pa yin te/ kyi ma lha ma yin rnams gang gis bdag nyid dang// bdag cag gi dpung khyad par khong duchud kyang
de dag rgyug par byed do zhes brjod do// de dag gis de skad smras nas/ lha rnams kyang lha ma yin dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed do// ban tshunargyal ba brtodaban lhadang lha ma yin de dag
gzhan ng 'dra ba'i g.yul bkye// ban tshun ri bochar ltar 'bebs pa dang/ mcharaltar 'bebs pa dang/ rdocher ltar 'bebs pa dang/ mtshon cha char 'bebs pa dang/ dpung gi/
tshogs rnam par 'joms pas mngon par bcom mo// de dag mtshon chadum du/ rnam pa 'jom pa du tshudang/ nyam dub dum dang/ de ltar srog bcod ba du
mag gis ga mu la dpe med par bsta/ de dag rgya mtshokun nas bar med par 'khod nas g.yul ba'o// 'di ltar de gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i ri de ni deb khyabar la mi nus te/ de dag
g.yul rnam pa dum bkye// rnams kyang klu rnams dang lhan cigagayul dpe med pa bskye'o// delta g.yula rnam pa dum de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mthong nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum
ba'i lha rnams la sbas pa/ 'di ltar rab god ni da dung 'jug ste/ ma gtogs par lha ma yin de dag thams cad rgyug par byed kyis khyedachos shig khyad chos shig/ dedag chos pa'i phyir/
bdag kyang glang po chos Msras kyi bu la zhon te cha'o// de nas brgya byin gyis lha rnams la de skad smras nas/ yid rtsa gcig gis glang po chos srungs kyi bu la 'di skadas so// glang bo che'i
rgyab tu zhonanus/ sa lham yin gyi lhag ma lus pa thag zas ris dang/ rab gong bonadang/ lham yin de dag gi lhagam thams cad las rnam par rgyalabar bya'o// desad smras nas/ derdo
rdzogasor te lha ma yin gyi dbangalakun tu lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas lha dang lha ma yin g.yul shin tu mi bzad par 'jug khan lham min rnams ni yongs su nyams/ lha rnams nirgyal ti shin tu dga'
nas/ lham yin rnams kyi drung du rgyug par byed do// lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin yang 'dzum rangs te/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi dbung 'dzom du chas pan/ rab dgod 'asnyam du sems te/ kya
ma 'diltar/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo gsum bodang/ gnas gsum n 'khod pa'i lha ma yin bye ba phrag du ma mthu nyams par byas pa 'di dagani/ ji ltar saramatshokun mthong du mthong ba de ltar 'di/
ga gyurati/ kye ma mtsho dar mthong ba nimanor ba yin no// 'diltar brgya byin tham par bya ba dang/ lha thams cad kyang gzhom par bya ba'i phyir bdagacha ste/ kyam lha de dag dang bdag khyad par cang
mad dosnyam mo// blo de lta bu bskyedanas g.yul durengs par 'jug par bya ba'i phyirasa'i 'og gi sgo ba khodado// rab dgod dang thag bzas ris khros bas gzir ba de nyid du 'khod pa dang/ rikun
ni g.yos/ rgya mtsho yang slobs rnams kyis kun tu 'khrug par byed/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dmar po thoms cad kyang ri la shar// 'khor dang bcas ba sa'i 'og la sgod nyid du 'khod pa dang/ de
nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin sgra gcan la sogs ba pham par byas zhing/ nyams par byas pa rnams sa 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug cig spro ba med pa/ mgonamed pa/ kun nas gnod
ba / haha'i sgra rnams kyisasams dkrugs pa/ kun nasazhum pa/ mgon med par gyur pa rnams de skad phan tshunabarjod ban/ lham yin gazhan kha cig gis smras l/ lham yin dag ma
khabros/ 'gros/ sa byol/ cis 'bros/ slar log/ sgrub lug/ degangas+sazhing phan tshun desmad brjod pa'i lha ma yin rnams ri rtse mo can char ltar bab pas
kun tu brtags pa na/ lha yid rab tu dga' ba rnams/ lham yon tshos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag zur zhig/ gtogo sashig/ bdag cag la du 'gro 'di dag blo bur du
khyorar byed kyang g.yul 'gas pa med de/ lhangan pa 'di dag gi g.yul la 'jigs pa mdudo// mtshonachadang lag cha la ma khas ba yang ma yin te/ 'di dag ni ji ltar saraldeg par mi 'gyur
! ba de ltar rgyal bar bya ste/ kyamasam yin ba'i g.yul 'gyed par rtag tu 'dod pa 'di dag ni ji ltar phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal khabya'o// de ltar phan tshun spro ba bskyang nas/ lham
yin rnams shin tugazhom par yid zhugs pa// khros kha/ mig shin tu dmar ba dag lham yazhig la ba der dengos/ ralagrod mtshon kun nas char ltar 'bebs te/ ji ltar char gyi rgyun
'bab pa ltar 'deng sangashing/ daltar ma yang char ltar 'bebs so// de nas de ltar lha ma yin blong blong bora 'khod b shing 'khum snyad la zhonab/ lha ma yin dums yongs su bskorabo
dgasa'i 'og bskor 'khod de// lha rnams la mtshonachasnatshogs char ltar 'bebasal/ ri bgatshadagasumang/ zhing/ lnga'i tshad ma 'bad bar byed do// dolta bur char/
altar mngon par 'bebs ba dang/ rnam pa de lta bur chas pa de dgu lham yin kyis kyang mngon par mthong nas/ nas yang dbugs phyin te/ g.yul 'gyedapar phyir log gnas rab dgodadang
lhag yin de dag nyid lasob skyed par byed da/ 'diltar bdag ni lha thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir chas pa yin gyis/ lha ma yin dag slar leg/ slar lag/ lha ma yin gyi dbangabo dag tsani/
'bros/ ci ste 'bros/ la la dubadamadadal khi ra la nga ji ltar skyas/ 'di ltar skyes bani bdag cag yin na/ skyes pa'i ming yang med// skyes ba zhes bya ba don med par 'gyur ro//
daskad smras ba dang/ rab dgod lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do// dergyug kha mngon bar mthong nas/ lha rnams kyang de dang g.yul 'gyed par rab dgod ga la ba der brgyugs so// lha
dang lham yin de dag phan tshun g.yul 'dres par bkye ste/ sgra byung ba gang yin pa des/ ri'i lcangadang ri rab thams cad kyang kun tugang// sgra gcan 'ba' zhig lam du zhugs nas/
lha la gan go'ago thogs pa drag ga la ba derab rgyugs so// lhos yin gyi dbang bo brtan ba lagan dbyug tho thogs pa yang/ lha 'phreng thogs dge ga la ba der brgyugs so/ lham yin
gyi dab bo me tog 'phreng sang ri dpag tshad gsum tsam zhig blangs nas/ lha pa wang can gasum pa dang/ lha kun tu rgyu ba dag ga la ba der brgyug ste/ tshun g.yuMl chen po bkye ba ni gtam
dubarjod na/ sems can thams cad kyis spu zing zhes khyen/ gang man mtho ba 'am thos lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ltag yin gyi dbang bo rab dgodakyang
1 rlung gis nam mkha' sprin ltar lha rnams mngon bar 'jom sa/ shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa de la/ lha gang gis kyang phyir rgol bar mnus so// de nas de ltar rgyu la chen bzhi'i lha
nams la mngon bar 'tsho na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin gyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lhan ms la 'di skad ces smras so// lham yin 'ba' zhig gis lha 'di dag la mnabar
k+kA 'tsho zhing 'dug na/ dpung phyim pa'i lha de dag ci ste mi rgyug/ lham yin gyi dpung gis lha rnams yongs su nyamasangashing bcom pa dag ci khyed pham par dga' 'am/ gang+galha'i 'dunas chos bzang
na 'khod pa dag ma gtogs par sum cu gsum pa'i lha rnams rgyugs shig/ ma lus par rgyugs shig/ deskad ces bsgo nas rab dgodadang thag bzas ris ga la ba der brgyugs so//
rab dgod kyi steng du sum curtsa gsum pa'i mda'i tshogs rnams dang/ ri bo char ltar bar mtshams med pas nam mkha' b gnas a mngon par 'bebs la/ rab dgod kyang ri bo char ltar mngon/
bar 'bebs shing sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed// nam mkha'athamasacad sgrasakun tu bgesashing/ lha dang lha ma yin na tshun rgyal ba la brtod ba di dag
dbang gi tshog samalus pa thams cad gayul 'gyed do// daltar g.yul 'gyed pa na gsar gyi ri bo 'bum snyad phan tshun 'drud pa'i bu ma lhung ba'i rdul gyis nam mkha' khebs te/ nam
mkha'akun nas bar mtshams med par dbag tshad stong tsam gsar myurjel gyis khebasaso// rdul gyi bar de dganamangajiltar char gyi rgyud rgyun mi 'chadabar babs pa ltar/ rnam pa de
lta bu'i mda'i tshogs phan tshun char ltar 'bebasaso// de bzhin du bonatshunari bo char ltar mngon por 'debasang lha ma yin byeb dum de dge 'jom par byed ba'i g.yu lo bkyogo/ lha
stong phrag dum rnams kyang gzhom par bya ba'i phyi g.yul ni mi bzod pa bkyigo/ de nas lham yin snying stobs chung ba/ ma par 'gyur la/ shari dogs pa gang yin pa de dag sa'i/
gtugs// malus par bcom pa zhugs pa de dag la/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo dag gis smras pa kyis lhag mar gyur pa bdag cag gis khyim thab dag ga re/ doskad 'dri ba
na/ dodag la lhas yin rnams kyis sbas pa/ ded na bodiltar lha dang lham yin gyi g.yul las rgyal ba thob ste 'dir 'ong ngo/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dag mtshokun mthong ga la pa/
mthong nas/ khyim thab bsad pa'i phyir nyon mongs/ shin tu yi chad de/ sa'i steng du 'dug nas du bar byed/ sa sngags 'don/ rab tu sdug bsngal ba/
kun matsho de yongs su bskor nas kha bod la/ brang rdung bar byed/ skra 'bal bar byed/ lus la bgrod par byed/ mtshams gdong gshar khor byed do// de ltar matsho'inangan khyim
thab dag phan ste bsadapar mthong nas smra sngags 'donati// de nas lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul shin tumi bzad par 'jug pan/ lham yin gyi dbang po rab dgod lha ma yin bya ba snyad
kyis yongs su bskor nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do// de dag nyid 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ lha rnams la bsgob/ 'diltar lham yini 'dag
ni lul 'gyed du bdag ga la ba der 'ong ste/ dbung chung ngu gdul bar dka' ba dedag ni ji ltar 'od kyis mun pa gsal ba de ltar grogs chos kyis rgyal bar bya'o// des lha rnams la
de skad bsgo bas/ glang po che'i rgyal bo sa srungs kyi bu la zhon te/ lcags kyimada' 'phas pa bzhin du rab dgod ga la der brgyugs so// de rgyug ban lha'i dbang bo brgya byin 'dunas/
chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rdodang shing gis 'byed pa dag lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der brgyugs so// khagicig ni mda'achar ltar mngon par 'bab

tha shing rab dgodag la ba der rgyug par byed do/ rab dgod kyang brgya byin ga la ba der shing rta sbyar bar byed cing/ 'di ltar brgya byin pas bdag rgyal bar bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas brgya byin gyis/
rab go dal 'diskas so// chos ma yin ba'i lamal gnas pa'i dud 'gro dgar 'ge/ 'di ltar nga ni khyod pham par bya ba'i phyir 'os te/ 'di ltar ngas khyod rgyags pa dang bral
nas/ danas langasa'i 'og tu gtang bar bya'o/ de nas thag bzas ris dngarab god kyis/ brgya byin la smas pa/ 'di ltar 'ong brgya byin khyod dang lha thams cad chad bsu gcad bar
bya ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas thag bzas ris dang rab dgodakyis gsar gyi ri dbag tshad lnga ba gcig 'khesaso// 'phangs pa de mngon bar mthong nas glang bos srungs kyi bu'i
khanas dbugs phyung bsar dbye sa chung pa nas gtor ba bzhin phyir bzlag naas rgya mtshor lhung ngo// de byamar brlags shing gator ba de mngon par mthong nas/ de nas yang lha ma yin dag gis
ri bo rdo'il ba can bag tshad lnga pa gcig bla sa nas brgya byin g la ba der 'phangs so// 'phags pa de mngon par mthong nas/ sa srungs kyi pu'i sna'i thor tos bzung ste slar lham yin/
gyi dbang bo la 'bas te/ glang bo che 'di nicang shes pa yano// rang gi ri 'bas pa des de'i brang du brgyab pa dang/ rab dgod debargyab pa des nyams nasastan de las lhung zhing/ rgyal
'khod de brgyab pa des rab tu nyams so// de dag mthong nas sum cu rtsa gsum bdag sgra chen pos nam mkha' bkang nas/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang pos dud 'gro de pham
1 bar byas te/ 'dir re zhagi glang po che'i mchog 'dis 'phangs pa'i shugs kyis mngon par nyams shing g.yosan/ gal te dorjes brgyab par gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ daskad smras nas/
lham yin ga la ba der brgyugs te/ la lani rdod shing gis 'gyed/ la la ni ri bos 'gyed/ la lani rtsa gsum kha gdeng gis 'gyed/ la lan sta'u khas 'gyed/ la lani
sgyu glog 'byung bas 'gyed/ la la ni thong gshol gyis 'gyud/ la la ni stobs kyis 'gyed/ la lani 'khor los 'gyed/ la la ral gris bgyed/ la laninam mkha' la 'gro
bas 'gyod/ la la ni sna tshogs pas 'byed/ la la ni bro bas 'gyed/ la la ni mtshonacha mchog tu gdams pas 'gyed/ la la ni mtshon cha dri ma med pas 'gyed/ la la ni mtshon
charab byed kyis 'gyed/ la la ni mtshon chab mdar byed kyis 'gyed/ la la ni mtshon cha brtsigs pas 'gyed/ la lanams 'gyed/ la la ni chus 'gyed/ la la ni chu 'bebs
bas 'gyed/ la la ni thams cad kyis bgyed/ la la ni mtsho chanag bos 'gyed/ la la ni sgyu mas 'gyed/ ma ni 'dud pas 'gyed/ la la ni sen mos 'gyed/ la la sgras
tha0 'gyed de/ sgra'i shugs gangamanyan bar yang minus so// la la ni rdo brdeg pas 'gyed de/ rnam pa de lta bu s go mtshon sna tshogs kyis lus ngashin tubs drub rnams kyis lha ma yin
rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin lta thams cad kyi mdun du bzhag go/ de nas mog mog bor gyur ba de mngon par mthong nas/ lham yin gyi dbang po thag pazas ris la sogs pa
'gan mtshonacha sna tshogs thogs pa rnams rab dgodakyi dbung bu ba dang/ brgya byin btags pa'i phyir brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang bo bzhi bo dag brgya byin
khon la 'byed du 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ lha rnams brgya byin gyis dpung gi rom grongs ba dang/ rang gi rtsal ston cing brgya byin galab der bdong bar byed do// de nas brgya byin gyis 'os
ba de dag mngon par mthong nas/ shin tu khros techasanas sbas pa/ dud 'gro khyad ci stangashin tu rmos/ gang khyed kyi dpung rnam pa 'dulta bu n ri zhig lha ma yin thams cad la bdog par
gyur kyang/ dedag nga 'ba' zhig gis lam bar bya bar nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di dag gi dpung ni chos ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi dbu nganichos minano// lha ma yin rnams kyi
dbu ni chos ma yin no// chos dang chos ma yin ba'i khyod ba ni choste/ go khyad par ni mun pa dang nyin ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni bden pa dang brdzun pa ltar che'o/[]/gang khyad par ni
ri ba dang yungs 'bru ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni thar pa dang ba ni su da ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni bzar rung ba dang bza' mi rung ba ltar che'o// gang khyad/
parani bdud rtsi dang dug ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni mtshan mo dang nyin par ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni nor bu mching bu dang rin po tsho ltache'o// gang khyad par ni dbul ba dang phyug pa

ltar che// gang khyad par ni bya ba dang ri bya ba ltar che'o/ gang khyad par ni nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer ltar che'o/ gang khyad par ni bro ba la rlung dang srin bu mdaku ltar che'o// gang khyad par
ni mthong ba dang mi mthong ba ltar che'o// gang khyad par ni yang dag pa'i lam dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lam ltang ches/ gang khyad par nisangs rgyas dngagazhan mu stegs pa ltar
cha'o// gang khyad par ni gnamadangs ltar cha'o// gang khyad par nubaskal pa dang skad cig ma ltar che ste/ nga khyedan khyad par de ltar 'o// khyadani chos ma yin pa gtso bor byed
la ngedanAchos gtso bor byed do// khyod ni shes rab dman pa yin la/ lha rnams na shes rab bcas pa yin// khyed ni brtson pa med pa yin no// lha rnams ni brtson pa dang
bcas pa yin no/ khyedani dud 'gro yin la lha rnams ni lha yin te/ lhade dag gis de lta bu yin par khong du chud nas khyadanged kyi drung du mngon par rgyug banim rigs so// de skad
ba smasanas/ glang po ches srus kyi bus kha lo sgyur te/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smasanas/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po ga la ba der rgyug par byed do// chos kyis
tshos min pham par byas// bden pas pardzun pa pham par byas// shes pas gti mug pham par byase// lha yis lha min pham par byas/ da skyid smras nas/ glang po ches
srungs kyi bu kha lo sgyur te/ sprul pa'i ng snga ma bzhin byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi bo de dag thams cad g lab der/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdo rje'i rtsa mo stong yod pani
thogos/ bsdigs pa'i mtshanom tsam/ sems kyis bsad cing ba cings bar lhag par myos pa'i sems ni mdas/ rlung gi shugs bas ches mgyogs par rab turgyug par
byed do// lha ma yin de dag mngon par rgyug pa dang/ de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ rgyal chen bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang rgyug par byed do/ lha
dang lha ma yin de dag phan tshun rnam par 'dzinaM ban/ so sor rgyal bar 'dod pa/ gcagi la la gcig ga mngon par 'drabs pa/ mogamog por gyur ba/ lha ma yin khacigan srog dang/
bral bar gyur/ de bzhin du lha ma yin kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag ste phyir log/ kha cig ni yi cha nas phyir log/ kha cig ni tshugs su lta zhing 'khod/ kha cig ni
@#// rang gi gnas su 'gro bar sems shing 'khod/ kha cig ni zhe sdang gis nyam thag/ kha cig ni gti mug gis sems bsgribs/ kha cig ni yongs su
kams shing yid daman par gnas te/ de ltar gnas pa rnams la/ sa srungs kyi bu'i steng na 'dug pa/ lha'i dbang po sprul par byed do// de nas glang po ches sras kyi
kha re re la pad+mang ra/ pad+marer la dbang bo lab/na rdo rje thogs pa/ mtshonacha dang go mtshon bges bu rnams slar bstan pa bzhin lhem yin gyi dbang bos mthong ste/ de dag kyang/

ts+tshA dbang bo'i gling po tshas srungs kyi bu ba stong yod pa/ khare re la pad+ma'i rdzing stong yod do// pad+ma'i rdzong re re la pad+ma stong yod do// pad+ma re re la 'dab ma stong yod do// pad+ma ra
la snying po brgya yod do// de dag kyang sa srungs kyi bu'i kha nas byung ste/ 'dab ma de dag dang snying po de dag thams cad la dbangapo rtag tu lagan rdorjod ng/ mtshon cha dang lag cha thog
babya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'khod par mthong ngo// de nas sprul pa de bu mngon par mthong nas/ lha ma yin rnams skrag 'khrugs te/ dbang po go mtshon dang cha byad sna tshogs
thogs pa rnams kyis de rtag tu gang zhing dbung dngamathu dpa med pa rnams kyis nam mkha' 'di bar matshamasamad par byas so// mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
ba thams cad bar mtshams med par gang bar byas so// dbang po rnams kyis sa'i 'og nga/ nga yin pa de dang/ de'ang bar mtshams med par byas bar dogs so nas de skad lham yin na/
tuskabag pa de rnams phan tshun smra'o// daskad smras pa de rnams la/ rab dgod kyis smras pa/ lha ma yin dag sa dbang pos sras kyi bu dang bcas te phyir bzlog par byas/
ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ de skadasanas/ glang bo che'irgyal bo sasrungs kyi bu ga la ba der brgyugs so/// ma ba'i tshesan
ba nye bar gzhag pa bam po nyi shu lnga pa/ ba/ de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ sa susakyi bu'i sna'i phyir tes bzung ste/ nam mkha' la gsob pazhin skor bar byed
do// debaskor ba na srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus nas gtang ngo// de btang ba dang/ danas yung 'du shes re nas lha ma yin de dag la 'di skang sa'o// ci dpung 'di/
gcig pu dab 'a ba yin nam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po khyed kun lha'i dbang bo la rgol mi nus sam/ de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po bsdus pa de dag thams cad de nas yang sa spungs
kyi bu ga la ba der brgyugs so// de dag 'ong ba mngon bar mthong nas/ dbang bos de dag gi srog gcod par bya ba'i phyir na ma yin tso/ pha rol pham pa khonar bya ba'i phyi ro/
sgrum bi sar ba rdo rje lta burnam pa dum phab bo// de nas yang dbang bo ga la ba der richar ltar 'bebs shing lha'i dbang po de'i stang du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs
'phan to// de la ri bo dachar ltar 'babs pa na/ char gyi rgyun susu 'bab pa ltar/ ri'i char ltar 'bab pa rnams kyang madzes pa yin te/ de ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul
pamed pa rnam ba sna tshogs bgyi'o// de nas lha rnams kyis lham yin de dag mthong nas/ de nas yang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der brgyugs so// de nas lha ma yin la/
rgyu g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/ lha rnams ga la ba der brgyugs so// de nas rnam pa du mar 'khrugs shing skrag par byed pa rnam pa du ma byung ste/ de ltar lho dang lha ma yin rnams kyang g.yul
gsal bar bkye'o// de ltar dbang po dang lham min rnams mtshon cha dang rdo rjes 'joms pa lta bu'i g.yul chen po gzhan dang mi 'dra bamang bo bkye'o// lha ma yin rnam pa du ma dga mngon
par mthong nas// brgya byin gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po srog dang bral banim byed la/ bam pa khenar bya ba de phyir ched du gnas so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang bo de dag thams cad
kyang ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod dang thag bzas sa de dag dang bcas pa ma lus par pham pa nyid du gyur to/ mgon 'dod pa/ skyabs 'dod ba/ gnas 'dod pa/ spro ba med
ma pa dag sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba de dang der 'bros par byed do// rab dgod de shin tu 'bros ba ni lha ma yin gyi dbang bo gzhan gsum bo 'khor 'bum snyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi mdunan skad
na'adon cing kun nas mngon par gnod ba rnams kyis 'bros pan/ brgya byin gyis/ sa srungs kyi bu la smras pa/ glang po che'i dbang bo rab god dang thag bzasaris kyi brtson 'grusani
shor/ shing rtani chag kyang ngas de dag gas dpar mi nus te/ drang srong chen pos mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gzhin srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/ 'dini sems can
thams cad bslu ba med pa'i gzhi yin no// de rang gi srog dang lhan cig song yang bas/ 'i shing rta brgya 'gastong du gzhom par bya ba la khyod rings par chos shig/ des de skad bsgo
nas/ brgya byin des bal bar byas ba dang/ glang po cha'i dpang po dang lhan cig sa'i 'og gi ga la ba der rlung gi shugs ltar brgyugs// de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/ rab/
dgod dang thug bzas risoshin tu skrag ste/ mthu med ba dag sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der ris par rgyug go[ ]/danas mgyogs pa'i song nas sa srungs kyi bu'i stobs kyis shing rta de las
rab dgod de bab nas shing rta dang phral lo// de nas shing rtad sna'i thor tos de'i mig sngar rtswa bzhin du brgya 'am/ stong du btsem mo// me tog 'phrang yang dbang dang mthu nyams nas/
tsha[ g]@#// sa'i 'og gi sgog la ba der 'bros par byed de/ srog la bsam ba bsdus pa/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ spro ba med pa/ dwang ba bu dang chung ma sI nga la bsams nas sa'i 'og gi

slobag lab der rgyug go/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa'i ng gson por 'dod de/ rang gi khyim du phyogs nas sa'i 'og gi sgrog la ba der rgyug go lham yin gyi dbang po sgragacan ga son par 'dod pa/ lus bong

chab 'ba' zhig tu 'dug pa'i ng sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyugago/ de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad nyams pa dang/ lha rnams shen tug 'a nas 'di skad smras so// lha

rgyu ma yin rnams kyis mimathunapa'i mtha' las 'bras bu nyams pa'i lhag mthob ste/ 'bros khung 'tshol bar gyur pa rnams/ dachos la lta zhing sa'i 'og gi sgo gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ lha shin tu
dga' ba de dag rlung gis sprin kun tupa/tor ba ltar l ma yani rnams l rlung gi shugs lta bu s kun tu 'tsho bar byed// de nas dbang bos/ lha dag lasmas ba/ gangarang gi lus mad per bya ba'i ri dang/
lha ma yin mang po 'di rnams srog dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ don med de/ khon zhugs ba/ nyos pa'i gnas 'di dag ci'i phyir byas/ lha rnams kyirgyal kha dang pham pa mi la rag las pa yin la/ dadu

mi'i 'jig rten na skyes bu chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa thams cad brtan pa dag yod na/ khyed kyis yul dang dus dedag shes bzhin du bdag nyid gsod ba'i dgra don med pa 'di dag byas so//
adenas mngaltam yin nyams pa srog gi skyabs 'tshol b rnams sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba de nyid du rgyug go/ de nas dab bos/ lha rnams la bzlo ba/ lha dag slar log/ slar leg/ phyis la bar

'gyur ba'i srog dang ldan pa rnams rang gi kha nas su thong zhig/ de nas dbang po la/ lha rnams kyis sgos pa/ 'di ltar lham yin khes pa 'di dag ni bdag nyid dang gzhan gyi dpungakhong du chud ba lags/
te 'di dag ni bdag cag gis nges par ltar slar log par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dgra gsul bar bgyi// bdag cag ni 'di dag la gnod pa'i bgyid do/ 'di ltar bdag cag mtho sonarang gi las kyi 'bu/
bu la spyod cing mchis na/ 'di dag gis mi'i 'jig rtenan bdag cag gi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams la ci ste bar chad bgyi bar 'bad/ dgra 'di dag ma gsal bar bdag cag
slar mi'achi'o// de dag gis de skad smras nas/ de nas yang lag cha dang/ mtshon cha dang/ go mtshon snatshogs bgos te/ 'diltar lha ma yin 'dig nges par shin tutshar gcad par bya'osnyam
pa'i blo des lha ma yin rnams gzhom bar bya ba'i phyir shugs dang ldan pas brgyugs so// de ltar yid la byed pa de lta bu dang 'bad pa da ltabu dag la/ de nas yapalha'i dbang bo mid snying rjes bas
bas smras pa/ lham yin rab dgod lasogasapa btags ba khyed kyi snying la brtsi bamed dam/ doskadasmasanas/ lha'i 'dunas chos bzangan lha bakhod pa gang yin pa de dag bsdus nas slar log go/den
lha'i dbang bo slar leg ba mthong nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum ba rnams la smras pa/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po de slar gshegs so// lha'i dbang po do/
slar gshegs kyis/ khyod kyang ma lus bar slar gshegs shig ces smras nas/ rgyal ba thob pa'i lha rnams slar log// de nas yang phan tshun dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi gnas su dong ngo// lha'i

dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ba rnams kyis mngon par bstod cing/ sa srungs kyi bu la zhon te yid dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha' redun sa chos bzangs ga la ba der 'dzegs te dong ngo//

lha rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas su dong nas/ de nas yang go mtshon dang lag cha rnams shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du bzhag go/ glang bo ches srungs kyi bu yang sprul ba sprul ba de dag bsdus nas tha mal par

gnas te rang gi rdzing bu pad+ma dang ut+pa las khebs par zhugs so// de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten du dong nas gzugs dang sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro yid du 'ong bo la nya bar spyod de/ lha'i dad pa yon tan lnga

'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis gnas so// klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa thob ba rnams kyang snying rtag tu dga' ste/ rang gi gnas le ngos spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo// lha ma
min btag ste nyams pa'i lhag ma lus shig shig por gyur ba nyams rab tu nyams pa'i sems can ngo tsha nas mgo smad ba rnams kyang/ bud med rab tu ngu zhing yid dman pa rnams kyis mdun nas bsu ba na/

wa sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po snying stobasanyams pa de dag la sgras ba/da ltar 'athab ba'i dus la ma bab po zhes ngas sngar ma byas sam/ da dung du mi'i 'jig rtagan chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjesasu
'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzan pa/phar 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzan pa/rigs kyi rganarabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag yod pas lha'i phyogs ni rab tu 'phel la khadag cag gi phyogs ni 'grib bo

nas bdag gis sngar bsgo na/ de'ang khyed kyis ma mnyan te/ bdag gi tshig de ltar ma byas pas 'di ni de'i 'bras bu yin no// lha rnams kyis lha ma yin nyams par byas pa 'bum phrag du ma gang yin pa dag la
sgra gcan gyis de skad smras pa dang// lha ma yin gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/'di ltar g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus la ma bab bo zhes sbas pa ma mnyanapa'i 'bras bu 'di yigano//lha ma yin magul 'phreng gis

kyang smras pa/'di ltar gang gi ma bya bar bya ba de dag gi ngo bo med pa la blo gros ngan pa 'di skyes pa nye bar gnas so// de dag thams cad phan tshun de skad smazhing nga rang gi gru la ba der dong ngo// thag bzangs ris

kyang gnas ga zhan bzhu bar ngo tsha nas mge snyad de zhugs pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nyams ba rab tu ngu zhing ngom thung ba/nag ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo// klu rab 'joms la
sogs pa tshos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa/ snying stobs 'bcu nyams ba rnams kyang klu'i gnas longs spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo// da ltar srid pa'i dug gis nyams pa'isems can
phan tshun rab tu nyams ba dag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'khyam la da bde ba mi mthong ngo// de dag rjes su mthong nas 'phags banyan thos 'dod pa dag gis 'dod chags dang bral lo//

de nas gazhan yang rnal 'byor spyod b.lang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa la/'di ltar dge slong 'di ni sa gzhan bcu bdun pa la zhugs te de khon nyid la blo shin tu zhanano// de thos nas sa bla'i gnod

sbyin shin tu dga' nas/bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams la spyan to// de dag gis kyang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la snga ma bzhin sbyar to/ chung dga'i bar du'ang de bzhin du spyan tra/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu/

blo gling na rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig/ grong ming ge mo zhig dang/ grong rdal ga ge mo zhig tu ming chage mo zhes bya ba sku dang kha spu bregs/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
stad bdud kyi yul gyi dngos po ni mi 'dod/ nyon mongs pa'i dngos po rnams dang yang lhan cig gnas par mi byed la// 'khor ba las shin tu 'dod chags dang bral te/de ltar 'bad pas kun tu khyab nas
sa gzhan bcu bdun pa la zhugs so// de thos nas lha rnams shin tu dga' nas bstod de/ 'di ltar gang bdud kyi phyogs ni 'grig la/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs 'bal ba ni bdag cag dga' 'o// dud
gro'i le'u rdzogs so/// de nas gzhan yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar smon pa shes pa des sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas nyes par byas pa
rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shin tu phra ba thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin brtags shing shes te yid la bzung nas/ legs bar byas ba'i las rnams la'ang las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar
smin pa la rtogs par byed de/'di ltar sems can ni sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa bde ba 'dod ba yin la/ lha rnams ni bde ba bsags pa la dga' ba yin te/de rnams kyi las kyi chos dang rnam

bar smin pa dang/ skye ba dang/ 'chi ba shin tu phra ba dag la'ang rtog par byed do// las dge ba byas shing bsags pa so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba ni las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod pa sdug
ba yid du 'ong ba so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bar so sor rig par bya'o// de la tshul khrims rnam pa bdun gyis mtho ris su skyabar 'gyur te/ lus kyi gsum dang/ ngag gi bzhi kun tu bstan cing

bsgoms te mang du byas pas/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi nang du skye bar 'gyur// chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang chen pos 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug dge chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po'i 'gro gathob

ste tshithung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ ring po dang/ kha zas ngan pa dang/ 'bring dang/ bzang po drang/ gzugs ngan ba dang/ 'bring drang/ bzang po dang/ brtson 'grus chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po
dang [0f10 ]bde ba chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen por 'gyur ro// de la lha'i ris gnyis ni ri rab la gnas so// bzhin sprin gyi phung po ltar nam mkha' la gnas so// de la lha'i ris dang bo nimador
la/ bsdus na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams so// de dag gi gnas dang bo na 'phreng thogs rnams te/de dag kun nas rab kyi phyogs bzhi la brten cing gnas so// de la 'phrang
thogs de rnams kyi bye brag deng po nyid du 'byung ba ni 'dulta bu yin la/ phyogs khyogs de rnams kyi bye brag kyang ming dang las kyis 'gyur te/ daltar las du mas bskyed ba'i tshe/ de la gnas dang/
nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/ gzugs dang/ lang tsho dang/ g.yo ba rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro// las kyi drab kun ni rgya'i 'bul ltar 'byungaste/ rgyu ma da ba ma yin/ 'dod rgyal bas ma byung/ la/ kanye/
bskyed pa ma yin no// da lta bas na skyes bu gang bdag skyid par 'dod na dge ba'i chos rnams la 'bad par bya'o// sems can rnams kyi las dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa bden//
ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa yin te/ las kyi dra ba gang gis sbrel ba'i sems can rnams ni zo chun rgyud mo ltar sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi 'khan pa 'a yangs su
rgyu 'khyam mo// srog chags rnams ni kun nas gar gyi ltad mo pa lta bu yin te/ dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa ni lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// de la lha rnams gnas pa 'i rgyal bo tsA ba
phrag drug cus yongs su bskor ba yin la/ rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas ba/ stongan 'bab chu dang/ lteng ka dang/ pad+ma'i rdzing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa
byas pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong lod pa/ ngos bzhi ni lo tshalas byas ba/ las legs par byas pa'i lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa bde ba 'bar ba du mas gsal zhing
dga' ba yin te/de la 'di ltar dge slong de thog ma kho nas sa'i cha rnam par 'byed do// de la gnas dang bo ni lha 'brang thogs kyi yin la/ de dag gi gnas bcu yod de/'di lta ste/ zur la 'gan
ba dang/ mtha' la gnas pa dang/ 'bras bus nye bar 'tshob dang/ yon tan dkar bo sod pa dang/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gnas pa dang/ 'gro mgyogs dang/ khul la chags pa dang/
'dod pa la chags pa dang/ yid g.yo ba dang/ tshal dang rtaba'i tshal na gnas pa yin te/ de ltar gnas rab tu dbye ba ni bcu yod do// rab kyi ngos 'dzam bu gling logs su lta ba gang yin
ba den ni/ zur na gnas pa zhes bya bar ming btags so// de'i 'og tu gnas pa de dang de gang nye ba na mtha' la gnas bzhes bya bar ming btags so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi phyogs gang yin pa de na/
'bras bus nyapar 'tsho ba zhes bya bar ming btags so// de dang nyiban lon tanadakar po spyod bo gnas so// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi phyogs gang yin pa don thams cad rab tu dga' bar gnas pa zhes

bya ba gnas so// de dang nye ba na 'gro mgyogs gnas so// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gleng g phyogs gang yin pa de ni yul la chags pa gnas so// de dang da ba na 'dod pa la chags pa dang/ de dang nye ba na yid
g.yo ba dang/ de dang nye ba na tshal dung nye ba'i tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ de dag ni gnas so so kun la dpag tshad stong stong yod do// de dag gi dang bo na rgya mtsho'i nang gi stong
min te/ de dag gi tshe nami rnams kyi lolnga bcu gang yin pa de'i nizhag gcig yin no/ de ltar bsgyur ba'i lo lnga brgyakhrub ste/dus su 'chiba'ang yod dus ma yin bar 'chiba'ang yod do/
denas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de/ gnas de dag gi dga' ba lo rtog ba' byed do/ las gang gis gnas der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung b.lishis
bas brtags na/ gang gis legs par byas pa'i las 'di byas n skye bar 'gyur te/ don 'di ltar shin tudang ba'i sems de la yid zhugs ba gzhan du ma g.yengs pa'i yid gsal bas/ sangs rgyas sam
sa sam/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song na/ de 'chi ba'i dug byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zur na gnas bzhes bya bder shan tu dang ba'i soms de skyabs su song ba'i rgyus skya bar 'gyur ro//

der skos nas kyang de'i lus gzi brjid dang ldan zhing/ lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ cung zad cig dpa byan 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po'i bde ba gang yin pa de
ni lha gnas pa gcig gi bcu drug gi char yang mi phodado/ gnas de dag gi chu'i nang namu tig gi bye ma yod la/ de'i mingan 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa byung zhes bya'o// de'i mthu ni 'di lta
bu yin te/'di lta ste/ mtha' la gnas pa dang/ thur la gnas ba'i lha'i yid mkhasams pa gang yin pa de dag chu'i rnam ba chu bo de las 'thob bo// gzhan yang chu bo mu tig dang byu ru 'bab bzhes
bya ba yod de/ lha mo 'tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba yin no// dena'ang ni bo che rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab ste/ 'dolta sku/ bozlum+ma'i thur ma dang/ rdo rje'i dum bu dang/ nor bu mthon ka dang/ mthon

kachen po dang/ sdug ma mdog rnam pa du ma ste/ gzhan yang thur na gnas pa'i lha de dag brgyan par bya ba'i phyi'i rnam ba de lta bu dag 'byung ngo// de dag gi sems la brgyan bar 'adod ba'i rkyen gang yin pa
dag de las 'thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang chu bo spos chu zhes bya ba 'bab sto/ dAna' dubya ngang pa dang/ ka lan da pa dang/ dun pos brgyan la/ 'gram gnyis ku shing ljon pa dang/ gsaragyi
shing ljon pa dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan ba rnams kyi sa khongs su bskor cing/ bya rnams kyisakyang yongs su bskor ba yin no// 'di ltar lha rnams kyis dri bsnams na yid rab tu dgagal/

deltar yeng dang yang rtag tu de la stsas bsnams nas dri tshor ba dang/ snom pa po brgya 'gyur du yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ do dgagazhan yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur ba rnams kyis
dag bar byed do// shing rnams kyi rnam pa ni 'di lta bu yin te/ 'di lta sta/ yal ga doms la lo ma ljang khur 'dug pa dang/ mal ga ljang khu la khom dmar por 'dug pa dag go lo ma'i kha dog lnga la
'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ mar po dang/ ljang khu dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ bung ba kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ sgra 'byin pa rnams/
kyis rtag tu yid dga' ba yin te/ de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyis bras bu dag la rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ longs su spyod par byed do// ri rab dag la rin po na sna tshogs kyi rtsa bo dang/
gad kha dang bu kha dag kyang yod do// del ri'adi lta bu dag bod de/ 'di lta ste/ mtho zhing bkra ba/ 'bab chu sna tshogs bsil ba/ bya skad snyan ba 'byin pa/ sbos kyis bsgos pa// dus

pa tshigs dang rtag tu ldan pa yin te/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i rnam ba de lta bu la zur na gnas pa'i lha rnams dga' bar byed/ longs su spyod bar byed cing bde ba sna tshogs kyis ni tshong/ lhamo
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni lo sa su bskor/ dgod pa dang/ gyingab dang/ rtsed mo ni byid de/ ji srid du gsum la skyabs su song ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin ba las byung ba 'a dod pa//
sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba zad par ma gyur ba de srid du 'dod ba'i bon tan lnga rnams kyis dga' bar byed la/ phyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang
skal ba mnyam pa mir skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par do rtag tu dga' la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan bar spyod bo dang/ nor rdzas dang ldan bar 'gyur ba mthong/
lang dge slong las kyi 'a bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/ sa thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas lha 'phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas gzhan mtha' la gnas pa//
zhes bya ba mthong ngo// lha'i 'jig rten der las gang gis skya par 'gyur snyam nas/ das thos ba las byung pa'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag
la tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no snyam yid la byas nas/ chu bo las bsgral ba'i phyi'i stags btsugasaM sam/ grubyin te chu bo chen po skya bo mi bde ba las sgrol bar byed cing sdig pa la'ang 'jug
na/da lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris lu'i 'jig rten mtha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyasanas kyang legs par byas ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/ lha'i ris
der bde ba sna tshogs la gnas shing/ lha'i 'ge rten de bats+tsha'i rdzong gis yongs su bskor ba yin no// don ba'i rdzing bsil la shin tu dang ba/ ro dang/ dri dang/ mdog skyon med pas gang ba yin/
la lha mo'i tshogs rtag tu dgod pa dang/ ldem pa dang/ rtsa ba dang/ yongs su spyod ba rnams kyis gang ba yin no// don de lha mo'i tshogs mad bo dag gis shin tu mchod la/ lus
rinabo sna tshogs kyis brgyanato// rna bar sil snyan rnam pa lnga dang ldan la/ lha mo de rnams kyis nye bar rtsen pabad par gnas la/ tshal dang nyo ba'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang kun dga'
ra ba rnams su bde ba myong ba byed do// den steng ka yod pa dag na 'di lta ste/ 'bab bde dang/ bud med sdug dang/ mthong dga' dang/ kun dga' dang/ sngon 'phung/
dang/ lteng ka 'brong dang/ yid bzhin snyatshogs dang/ dus mi mthong ngo// tshal dag kyang chod de/mthong nanyams dga'i dang/ mthong na yid 'thun dang/ rlung legs par mngon ldang dag go/
ma tog gi rnam pas mdzes pa bzhi po ded/ 'di lta ste/ spos 'byung dang/ sna tshogs dang/ bung ba mngon dga' dang/ rtag tu nyams dga' ste/ tshal de rnams Msu sgyu de lha mo rnam pa spu tshos/
gis yongs su bskor cing/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sems chags po bde ba myong bar byed do// rin po che sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan ba de thogs pa med pa'i gros dang/ nyams pa med pa'i 'gros kyis

gang dga' bar 'gro zhing gar dga' bar byed do// yul lnga la chags pa de/ ji las chu bo 'bab pa ltar nyin gcig bzhin bde ba 'phel te/ dbang bo lngachu lta bu/ 'dod pa rlabs lta bu dag la rtse zhing spyang mos

! tshal nas skyed mos tshal/ nags tshalanas nags tshal lteng ka nas lteng ka/ gser gyi ri'i rtse mo ni bo che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa nas ri'i rtswa mo gzhan dag la 'gro bar byed do/ rtsi bar byed pa/ lha mo

yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba me tog 'phreng bzang po dpe med ba thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing/ khaza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu tshim pa yin te/de ltar dosrid du po'i 'dod pa sdug
ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ legs bar byas pa'i las kyis stsal pa dpa mad pa/ legs par byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba zad par mgyur pa de srid du bde ba myong bar byed do// de las de zad nas de nas shi lta gal

te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na/las de dong rgyu 'thun par de drang dkan che la 'byor ba dang ldan zhing rgyal po'i mdzod kyi spyan du'ang 'gyur bar mthong ngo// de nas yang dgo slong/
las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar san pa shes ba de lha 'phrong phyogs rnams kyi gnas la rtog bar byed do/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas bogasan lha 'phrang thogs rnams kyi gnas agasum pa 'bras bus

tabara'atshob zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der legs par byas pa'i las gang gis lha rnams kyi nang du skya bar 'gyur snyam nas/ das zos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan
pa/lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid rab tu zhi ba/ byams pa bsgoms ba'i sems gang gis lanyos mi zad pa phal cher byung ba'i yul rnams su/ 'di ltar lam du zhugs pa bkres par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag
khras bu de rnams kyis shin tu tshagazhing bder gnas par bya'o snyam nas/sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'aphyi'i/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ kun dga' ra ba dag bskyedacing byas la/ de dag

kyang de ltar shin tu bde bar gyur na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris lnga'i 'jig rten 'bras bus nyo sar 'tshob zhes bya ba'i lha de rnams kyi nang du skyobar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de lha mo gabrug
dang lang tsho ba med bu dad ldan pa// bde bar gnas ba mtshungs ba mad pa rnams kyis longs su sgor bar 'gyur ro// tshal dang/ rgya ba'i tshul dang/ lha'i ma tog dang/ 'bras

bu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gsar gyi bya ru dra ba 'phyang ba dang/ dril bugalor ka'i sgrab sgrags pa de dag tu shin tu dga' bar byededu/ bdag la chags ba'i dbang bo lnga shin tu bdo ba dang lta gno/ (de na

tshal dang dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'bras bu kun phud ces bya ba'i tshe ya dang/ kun dag 'gazhizhes bya ba'i tshal dang/ dman pa dang mtho bzhes bya ba'i tshe dang/

zhi kun nas bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal dang/ rtagatu dga' bzhes bya ba'i tshol dang/ bung ba rtag chos zhes bya ba'i tshul dang/ gsar gyi gribam zhes bya ba'i tshul te/ tshal de rnams su lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su

bskor nas dga' bar byed la/ pad+ma'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/ 'bab chu sgra lhung lhung 'bab pa'i tshal rab tu mang po dgana'ang dga' bar byed do// rang gi 'od dang shing ljon pa rab tu 'bar zhing kar la ba

dang bya rtag tu myos shing sgra 'byin pa dang/ kha zas mang po babras mi la de ba dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa/ ri'i rtse mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag na'ang mngon par dga' bar byed de//

don ni rab kyi rtse mo'i ming 'di lta bu dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ri'i bod kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba dang/ 'dzam bu'i tshal dang/ chu dkar dang/ dgod 'phrang dang/ rtag dga' ste/ ri'i rtse mo de dag na leg
0bar byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa dag mngon par dga' bar byed do// rang gis legs par byas pa las kyis bsgyur te gnas ba rtag tu khul la dga' ste/ ji skad bstan pa'i gnas de dag na lha
mo brgya phrag dums yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// 'dir tshigs su bcad pa/ mtho ris thams cad 'dod pa na// rgyu chung ba yis thob par 'gyur//
de bas nyes par spyad spangs te/ rtag tu legs par spyad pa spyod// sbyin pa sems la goms pa dang// tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa// lha yi gnas
su 'gro bar byed// ji ltar tshul khrims legs bsrungs pa// pha ma don dang bshes 'grogs dang// gtan 'dun dag gibade ba yang// de lta bur ni myong gi 'gyur// tshul khrims 'di dang pha rol skyob//

tshul khrims 'di yi rten gyi mchog/ tshul khrims rtag tuldan pa'i mi// bde las bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// rang gi las kyis bsgyur ba dag/ sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod// mi gang gtsang mar spyod
ba rnams// de dag lha yi gnas su 'gro// tshul khrims gter ni thad mi shes// tshul khrims bde ba mtha' yas te// tshul khrimos lcags par bsrung ba'i mi// rtag tu bde bar gnas pa yin// bsngags
pa dang ni nor 'dod dang// pha rol mtho ris dag la dga'// bde gsum 'tshol bar 'dod pa yi// blo dang ldan pas tshul khrims bsrungs// migang tshul khrims ldan pa ni// tshul khrims nyid la ston
[p]/ par byed// gang na 'chi ba med pa yi// bde las de ni mya ngan 'da'// thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas// 'dod chags gti mug la sogs bsgribs// snang byed mchog ni tshul
khrims te// de bas tshul khrims yang dag spyod// tshul khrims mtsho ltar rtogamed pa// tshul khrims de ni bsngags pa yin// rgyal bo chom rkun ma dang chus// tshul khrims nor la 'brog mi nus// de bas
tshul khrims rtag tu ston// tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam bar smad// tshul la mngon par dga' ba'i mi// da ni mya ngan 'das dngato// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa bsngags// tshul khrims ldan ba stan par
byed tshul khrims nyi ma lta bur mdzes// tshul khrims 'chal ba rnam par smad// dri ma mad cing gnod pa med// rimasand med tsong mya ngan med// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis tshul khrims bsngags//
mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer nyi// rtagatu tshul khrims ldan pa yi// mi dag nges par kun tu 'gangs// tshul khrims yongs su bsrungasapa ni// 'chiba'i tshon mi 'jigs so// tshul khrims thog ma pha mar
ge bde ba thams cad rab tu 'jug/ skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa bsngags// tshul 'chal dga' ba ba lang yin// tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ma dag ni// dud 'gro rnams dang mtshungs pa yin//
bya dang ma bu mi shes te// debs tshul khrim yang dag spyod// tshul khrims gos kyis gang g.yogs pa// skyes bu de ni ga yogs pa yin// tshul khrims spangs pa gang yin pa// gcar bu de ni phyagrwa
dang mtshungs// skyes bu tshul khrims ldan ba ni// rang gi skyed tshal gro ba bzhin// tshul khrims ldan pa 'di 'ongs pa// der ni gnyen ltar sems bar byed// tshul khrims gtsang ma yang dag
spyod/ dag pa'i las dang ldan pa yin/ skye ba bya ba legs byas pa// de nilha yi 'jig rtan 'gro// skyes bu tshul khrims rtag ldan pa// 'dod pa gang dang gang 'tshol ba// de dag de las so sor
'gro tshul khrims kyis ni yongs su 'phel// 'jig rten 'di dang pha la tu/ tshul khrims grogs kyi mchog yin no// debs grogs po yon tan mchog/ tshul khrims nyid la
rtog tu spyod// bkres skom 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// nyam ngar skyobs pa mag ni te// tshul khrims gnas shing bsgoms pa bstod// 'jig rten pha rol nye bar 'gro// gang zhig
tshula'abras 'di lta bur// gal te tshul ldan rab shesan// danam tshon rnon thogs nas 'dir// bdag nyid mgul gcod la sogs byed// ya mad bshad du med pa ste// shin tu dag dang/
yang dag ldan// tshul khrims 'bras bu dri ma med// bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan// dang po de bzhin bar du dge/ de bzhin tha mar dge ba yin// tshul khrims 'bras bu dri ma med//
da ni dge las bde chen thob// de bas de yis de'i yon tan// jig nas tshul nyid rtag tu sod// 'di dang gzhan du skyobasabyed pa// tshul khrims lta bu gang yang mod/ de ltar dge slong tshul khris+sa
kyi yon tan gyi de khon nyid la sems pa de tshul khrims la ni bstod par byed la/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la ni rtag tu stod bar byed do// de ltar da lta'i gnas na ba dod pa'i yon tan lnga/

'byor bas bde sto/ der ji srid du dge ba'i tshul khrims de so so yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du dga' bar byed do// de dag zad nas dpa'i sku/ gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na/
las de dang rgyab thunabs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing gzugs shin tu lta na sdug ba dang/ gnas dang nyeba'itshil gyi bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam

bsnyen ba shes ba de lha'aphreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ dis thos ba 'a sa byung ba'i shes pas lha 'phrang phyogs rnams kyi goms bzhi ba gangan lha dag dga' bar byed pa yon tanadakar bostod pa

zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/dag blos ba las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ me tog 'phreng bas 'tshob/ blo zhan pa yi dadang bas soms
cung zad bskyod pa dang/ zhing dang dngos po kho na yon tan dang ldan l/sams yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin l lam du zhugs pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam/ mchod rten dag la ma tog snyim pa gang zhig bulan/
de lus dang bralanas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yon tanadakar po spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyu'o// der skyes nas kyang de lus yon tan dkar po'i'iphreng ba btags so// gnas de'ang
kun nasab cha rlabs lhag pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rdo rnams kyis mdzes pa yin no// gnas de 'an po che sna bdun gyis spras pa'i bya skad snyan 'byin ba rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor ba/ kun nas
gsal ba yin te/ de nas yang brgya 'gyur du shin tu gsal bas mas pa yin/ de ltar gnas de ma ba du mas brgyan cing/ shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes pa yin ta'adilta sta/ 'gram na

pad+ma skyob dang/ rgyan du bya bar blo yod lta bu'i ljon pa dag ya gos spos kyis bsgos pa'i dri rnams kyis dbang tshad du byab la/ma tog rtag tu 'byung ba dang/ 'bras bu rtag tu 'byung ba yin te/gnas de
rnam pa de dag dang/ gzhan de dag gis mdzes pa yin no// de na bad la gnas pa de dag kun dga' ra ba dang/ nu bo dang/ lha mo'i tshog sasna tshogs glu len cing phul nas lul dang/ gnas nas
gnas dang/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du lo ngos su sgrub na bde ba dag myong bar byed la/ gad pa dang/ rtses pa dang/ dga' ba dang ga' dgur spyad de bde bar gnas pa dga' ba spyod pa spyad
cing bde ba myong bar byed do// gnas de dma' ba dang ma tho ba'i la ngagyur ta/ mar gsar ltar 'jam pa/ rkang pa bzhag nAnams zhes khyod la/ rkang ba btan pharacas byed do// gnas de phyogs
gzhan dag tu shing bal ltar yang 'jug par 'gyur te/ nemasazhes khyod ba dang/ bar cesakhyad pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ shing thams cad kyang rang las 'od 'byung sta/nyima'i 'od ltar bde ba yin l/
gsar gyi shing ljon pa de rnams ni nams kyang lamarnyes par mi 'gyur/ me tog si par ma gyur te/de ltar las las skyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang gis longs su sprul/legs
bar byas pa'i las kyis mngon sum du gyur pa'i rgya'i 'bur lta bur lhabade ba dpe med ba dgamyong ngo// rnam pa de lta bur nyams dga' ba skyed mos tshal dang/ nags tshal dang/ lteng ka de dag tu rang
gi las ngan pa dang/ 'bring dang/ bzang bo rnams kyis lha ga rtse bar byed cing dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyis lus brgyan pa rnams rang las 'od 'byung la gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri
dang/ ro dang/ rig bya dag myong zhing de dag gi lus nams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ bkros pa dang skom pa'i ng med do// sgra dang/ ro dang/ gabrugs dang/ dri zhim ba rnams kyis tshang ba

mad pa'i lha srod pa la soms chags ba dag gang dang gang 'dod ba de dang de nyid lha rnams la 'grub la/ gang dang gang 'grub pa de dang de dag gzhan gyisanyams par mi byed do// lha rang dgar spyod cing/

rtag tu mgu ba/ rtag tu yid rab tu dga' ba/ gar dga' dgur rab tu 'gro ba'i lha sprul pa dag rang dga' rnam bar rgyu la/ lus sbom pa'i lha dag na lus ya nga bar 'gyur ro// mig btsum pa dang phyi ma gro

pa'i lha dag nimig btsums pa dang phya bas dbagatshad bye ba bya bar 'gro'ang ngal ba mdal yang bar 'gyur ro// dbar ni nam mkha' la rlung dal bar mi 'gyur la/ de bzhin du lha rnams la'ang ngal ba'i skyon mod bar

'gyur go/ yid gsal ba'i lha rnams kyi lus ni la da la drim dang bral ba yin no// thams cad du 'gro bar nus pa dag ni gzugs ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur la/ lha dang lha mo'i ba tu dga' bas kun tu gang/

ba/ lha'i na chung thams cad tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dgan 'khodang/ lha dang lha mo rnams lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'ad pa myong bar bya ba/ sdug pa myong bar bya ba/ yid du 'ong ba myong bar bya ba/ bde bar

gnas pa myong bar bya ba rnams kyis dga' bar byed do// de ltar phanatshun gnas pa mtho ris kyi gnas ri khrags dang de tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal gyi khor sna tshogs dag na 'khrul ba'i sdug bsngal rtsis la ma
chags par yul mi brtan pa rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin myos ba ni bag yod par gnas pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las byung ba'i srid pas bslus pa rnams jisrid du de'i 'dod pa sdug ba yid dung

ba'i las mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ byas shing bsags ba zad par ma gyur ba de srid du dga' bar byed do// de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shin s kyang rang gi las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin

sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te'ang legs par byas ba'i las kyis mi dngago so yang dag par myong bar gyur ba mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/las de dang

rgyu'i thunapar de grong khyer gyi dbon po dang/ yul gyi dbon por 'gyur te/ skyo bo rtag tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba'i yul du skyabar 'gyur la/ nad chod ba dang/ gzugs bzang bo dang ldan bar 'gyur bar/
mthong ngo/ de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin ba shes pa de lha 'brang thogs kyi gnas la rtog ba byed de/ des smras pa las byung ba'i shes bas lha'aphreng
thogs rnams kyi gnas thams cad dga' bar gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyobar 'gyur snyam nas/ des zos ba las byung ba'ishog pas brtags na/
zla tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sams ba gang gis gzhan la mi gnod pa'i m tog bskyadanas sam/ tshongakhong gis nyos nas btogs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul naM/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro

mthe las kyi 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de bde ba rnam ba bzhi myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste// 'gran zla med ba dang/ gar dga' dgu
'grob dang/ lha gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non pa dang/ lha mo'ang lha gzhan la mi brten ba dung/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas skyid par byed/ gongs su spyod par byed/ rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar/

byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed cing gnas so// rtse ba rnam bsnatshogs kyis rtse bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ chu la rtse ba dang/ ba rdzing na rtso ba dang/ ma tog la skye ba dang/ 'bras bu la rtse ba dang/

srog la rtse ba dang/ bya ba rtsa ba dang/ tshal gyi nang na rgyu zhing rtse ba dang/ bung ba sgra'abyin pa'irtsi la/ phan tshun blta bsam yas pa'i lha chotshog sakyis longasasu bskor ba dag dga' bar byed do

lha dang lha mo phan tshun du phrag dog byed pa'i sdug bsngal spangs pa dag dri shin tu'am bos legs par bde ba dang ldan no// gnas de pa rA'i rdzing rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor ba yin te/'di lta ste/
