dag las gang gis skyo bar gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i gas pas brtags na/soms ba dang ldan pa/ phan par 'dodapa/gusaba'i snying dang ldan pa gang yin pa des dge slong lang dag par rab tu

byung ba'achos shes shing phyis bo la'i ri shun pas kha dog dmar bor bsgyur tam/gur kum mam/btsod dam/tshag 'am/skyu ru ra 'am/btsag gam/ba bla ma/ldeng res sam (ma tog bsdus sa tshur dang bcas bas kha

go dmar bor bsgyur na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gromatho'asikyi 'jig rten grong khyer dmar gnas kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas 'phrong pa dang gos dmar bo gyon pa de'i gnas de ni 'od kyis

brgyan pa'i lus kyis rtag tu gsal bar byas pa min la/ lha de dag thams cad kyang ni dga' dgur sbyong ba yin la/de rnams kyi mthus gnas de dag thams cad rnam ba de lta bur dma' bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar ba/

rA ga'i do dgos pa chod pa ltar lhade rnams kyang de ltar dmar por snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyan gyi kha dog sngon po dang so'abor 'dresang shing ni bo chos klubs pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dang po'i
[s]@#/ 'gyur te/legs par byas pa'i las des de'i gos gsal ba rnams kyis dmar bo 'gyur go/ gang gi tshade rtsa zhing gzhal med khang dang/pad+ma'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/ tshul dang/

nyiba'i tshal snatshogs dang/ lha mon byud dang/ rgyun dmar bo sna tshogs thogs ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag sug mar 'groban de'i tshod dgag rgyan rnams kyi tshon rtsi gsal ba dang/ kha dog thams cad

kyang gsal bar snang ngo// na po che'i 'od sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i lus de tshalanas tshal dang/ ri'i thob nas ri zom dang/ pad+ma'i tshal nas pad+ma'i tshul dang/ chu bo dang/ 'bab chu dang/ lteng ka dang/

taba'i tshul nas chu bo dang/ 'babachu dang/ lteng ka dang/ taba'i tshal du 'gro bar byed do// sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan ba'iglu dbyangs nye bar len cing phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/so sor chags pa'i snying gis

dga' bar byed/rtso bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// sred pa'i tshogs drug gis yid rab tu dga' ba bdud rtsi'i zas bzang po lanaza/myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i btung ba zhig bonatshim bar 'thungs te/
jisrid du tshogs chen pos yongs su bskonos/dga' ba sna tshogs byed do/ de ltar de dag rtse ba snatshogs dge slong des mnopar mthong nas 'di ltatshigs su bcad de sgras kha/mthobs mthob ri'i bon//
de bsamathob rtag tu dge/ lha tshogs rnams kyis 'og min du// dge bas skyob khrid par byed// rnam pa sna tshogs dus li// tshul khrims dag kyang srugan ni// dgokhe'i las kyi ma smin 'di// lha rnamU/

tshad dus+san bar 'gyug tshul khrigs chu ni shin tu dang/ rab tu gang bar kun nas su// khrus byas ma ni lha rnams kyis// bde ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyur// sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu la// 'byung bo kun la//
na bar dga'// kho shes brtson lams sems ldan// lha yi 'dunas ra 'gro bar 'gyur/ rkos bsko byed dang ldan pa dang// tshul khrims rin po tsho yis brgyan/ sems can kun la brtsi ldan pa//
lha lul rnams na de dag mkhas// drang po rnams nIgasar 'daso// dril dang ni sdig rnams sbyangs/ khang dag las kyi mtha' brtson pa// lha lul rnams na de dag mkhas/ sems can kun la brtsi
ldan zhing// sems can kun la phan 'dod la// sdig kun rnam par spangs ba gang// de dag lha la gnas na gnas / legs par rtog pa nyin gcig bzhin/ tshul khrims srung bar byed ba gang// nyin gcig

bzhin du de rnams kyi// bde ba dum de dag myong// skyes bu de nyid sems pa bo// tshul khrims rta la zhon nas su/ rtsen pa dug ldan pa dag/ lha yi gnas su 'grobar byed// gang zhig lha yi gnas ni rtse// gang zhig

bde ba blan med// de dag btsun pa tshul khrims kyi// 'bras bu'i de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// gang zhig lha yi'aphrang rgyan dang/ lha yi 'khrung bklubs pa dang// lha rnams mtho'asi rtsa ba ni// de kun
dge ba'i rgyu las byung// pad+maut+pal nyams dga'i tshal// tshal dang nags tshal brgyan pa dang// mtho ris lha rnams dga' ba gang// de kun dge las skyes pa'i 'bras// nam mkha' gzhal med khang gnas
dung lha yi rin chen brgyan pa dang// lha rnams dri'od gsal pa gang// de dag tshul khrims 'bras bu yin// gser dngam tog sna tshogs dang// kun nas ri bo'i stong rnams su//
lha rnams dga' byed gang yin te// la khrims las byung ba brasakhu yin// ji ltar mi dag rang khyim du// zhugs n 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin tshul khrims la de dag spyod/ mi rnams lhalaM

gnas su 'gro// 'di ltar lha ya nang du 'gro ba'i dri/ blo yod tshul khrims ldan pa dri zhim ba// che tog ke ta ka dngam lu ka/ tsam pa ka yi dri dang mtshungs ba min// tshul khrims yongs su srung ba gang//
zla da dag 'tsho ba'i yul yin no// gang zhig tshul khrims yongs spong ba// 'chi ba'i nang na mazad 'chi// bdag la rtag tu byams 'dodapa'i ng// yon tan 'di dag rig nas su// tshul khrims legs par
bsrung bya zhing// tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam par spongs// tshul khrims srung ba rtag tu dul// bzod pa ldan zhing bstan sdug/ them skas lta bur 'dzugs nas su// lha yi 'dun sar 'gro bar byed// de ltar

dge slong des rang go las la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang mthong/ las kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs kyang mthong nas 'khor ba la 'dod chags dang bral lo// grong khyer dmar bo na gnas ba'i lha de dag kyang jisrid du/
'dod ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ de na dga' bar byed/rtsi bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar
@#/'gyur te/shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan l myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyisems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ du'agro'i nang dum skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par ma'i nang du/
skyes na/de las de dang rgyu mthun par 'jig rtan ba thams cad dga' zhing nor mang bo dang ldan pa dang lho phyogs su gnod pa med pa'i skyo bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dge slong las kyi
'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas sna tshogs zhes bya ba ji ltar
'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes bas brtags na/'di ltar sems pa dang ldan bar gyur cing/ sems bas banapa'i snying

dang ldan pa gang gis sems can tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la bza' bdang/ btung ba drang/ bza' bca' dang/ tshodamasnatshog sangag byin na/ do lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs kyis

lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// las snatshogs kyis bskyod ba/ bde ba sna tshogs la ni sbyod/g.yogs pa dang mal stan sna tshogs kyi nang 'gro/ bde bar gnas ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang rtsa ba dang 'gros tshog+ha

ni khyod tshal dang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs suni 'gro/lhacho' tshogs khyad sna tshogs thogs bzhibyibazhin 'brang/ tshal dang/ nags tshal dang/ ri snyatshogs dang/ chubo dang/ bats+tshatshal dang/ ut+pal dang me tog
dang 'bras bu'i skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dag nan ga nas bgo ba dang/ mal cha dang/ sgog pa'i tshul sna tshog san ni spyod/gzha'i gtam brjod cing 'du 'dzi la dga' la/shin tu

[N]1 tshogs pa'i sems sna tshogs kyis ni 'tsho rtog pas bskyod pa la dga' zhing/ blo rnam par chags pa rab tu myos pa yin te/da ltar las sna tshogs byas nas rgyu snyatshogs byed pa rdo tshal sna tshogs rnams su

bde ba sna tshogs dag myong bar byed do// de nas dge slong de shin tu dga' nas/'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ ri mo mkhan gyi'i mo rnams//de ni sna tshogs bris yin// gang zhig las kyiri mo mkhan//

la mtho ris su ni mang du 'dri// chon rtsis bris pa bris ma 'gyur// de nibagrang bar bgrangs yod kyi// las kyis bris pa grangs tshad de// den sams kyis 'dri bar byed// rtsig ba zhig na nges pa yang// ri mo ma
lus 'jig bar 'gyur// las kyis bris pa lus zhig kyang// 'jig ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar ri mo mkhan cig gcig/ ri mo sna tshogs 'dri bdag/ de bzhin sams ni gcig pu yis// las rnams

tshogs byed par gyur// ji ltar tshon rtsis bsal ba lngas// bris pa snang la son par byed// de ltar dbang bo lnga rnams kyi//las kyis 'khor ba 'khor bar 'dri// ri mo mkhan gyi mi dag ni// du ma dag tu snang
'gyur gyi// ri mo mkhan de sems phra bas// thams cad du ni mi mthong ngod mo legs shing legs pa dag/ ji ltar rtsig ngos rnams la 'dri// las rnams legs shing legs pa dag/ de ltar sems la 'dribar

0 byed// ji ltar nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ sems rgyun 'byung la sems gnas 'gyur// de ltar nyin dang mtshan rnams su// de bzhin las kyi rjes su 'jug/ ji ltar rlung dang dung ba rdul// gdung pa rnams kyis 'tsho/

'jig rtad ltar dge dang mi dge ba// sbangs na las kyi'ami 'jig/ da ltar dge slong des sems ri mo mkhan lta bu/las ri mo lta bu la rag las pa mngon par mthong mos/las kyidi nyid rnam par mthong ba 'bar ba

las yid dang// lha sna tshogs de dag gis 'das sna tshogs de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags ba/bang 'grongs bar myong bar 'gyur bde zad par ma gyur ba de srid du

myong bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chibar 'gyur te/ shin s kyang gal te lan grongs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal bdang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes

la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu rgyu zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba dang/ ro dang ldan pa dang/ dbon snabyed bas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo//

denas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ nges thos pa las byung ba'i rigs pas brtags na/lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gan
mtho bar gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/legs bar sbyad pa'i las mngon par shes
khem sa bas khongs su bsgoms pa'i sams dang ldan pa gang gis sems can rnams kyi grang ba dang tsha ba yongs su bskyab pa'i phyi bsod nams kyi gnas mal byas na/de lus dang

bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten mtho bar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyin ng du skye bar 'gyur ro//ngal skyes nas kyang reg pa la bde bar gnas pa de dbang bo lnga'i yul gyi bde ba rnam ba dum rnam pa mang po ngagamyong bar

'gyur ro// lha'i ris de na tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag yod de/'di lta ste/me tog mnar ba la rtsi ba dang/ stag bosbyor gnas dang/ ngal bso ba dang/ rtse dang sgra 'byin ldan dang/ sgyum kun dga' dang/ 'jigs med de

tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag tu lha de lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas ba dag dga' bar byed dgod par byed/ rtse bar byed/ glog par byed do// sil snyan lan lag lnga dang ldan bas dga' bar

byed cing/ blo rang dgar gnas pa bdag nyid chen po ci dgar sgrogs pa/ bde ba mchog dang ldan pa skyid bar gnas pa rnams ba'i tshal nas pad+ma'i tshal du'adod pa byed de/mtho so dang 'thun pa'i zhi bo mi'i snying bo khag tu

mang bos rnam par brgyan pa/ rtag tu bag tsha ba med par spyod pa rnams yul mthob nas lul mtho ba dang/ gser gyi ra ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'ong mas kyis gsal bar byas pa de dag la lus nang med pa rnams

yongs su rgyu bar byed cing rtag tu bde bas myos par gnas ba legs bar byas pa mang bo 'dod 'byas pa'i las kyis der skyes pa rnams dga' bar byed/rtse bar byed/dga' dga' spyod 'byed do chubo dang/ 'bab chu

dang ldeng kas brgyan pa'i mtho ris kyi yul rnams na/ji sring du 'dod pa sngagu ba yid du 'ong ba'i las de las par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed de// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'bar 'gyur te/shacis kyang

gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i lasakyis sems can dmyalob dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i zhing dum skyes la/mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang dusan/de las de dang rgyu mthun par rgyal
bo'atshis sams pa chen por 'gyur zhing 'jig nathams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo// dam kha'i chos dranabanyabar gzhag pa bas khonyi shu brgyad po// de nas

yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar smin pa shes pa des lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des khros pa las byung ba'i shes bas brtags na/lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas
rgun chang tshos gnas zhes bya ba ltar 'dug ba mthong ngo// der soms can dag las gang gis skye bar gyur snyam nas des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ legs bar byas pa'i las kyi mtha'

dab/tshul khrims dang ldan bar gyur pa/ ban bar 'dod ba dang/ 'jam ba'i snying rje dang/ rang bzhin gyi ngang 'jam ba/ brang ba g.yo med pa gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram
ziton mongs ba man med ba rnams la nyin gcig gam/ gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhilta gos kyang ci dgos te/de ltar rim gyis rgya mor rtag res 'kher khyin na/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mgro
ris kyi 'jig rten lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur pa mthong ngo// der skyes nas kyang mtho ras kyi skyed mos tshal na bde bar gnas ba de/ gsar gyi dril bu

galar kha'i dra ba bres ba/ sgra mang po 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i tshal rnams kyin ngan/lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i yul la chags pa dag dga' dga' spyod bar
byed do// lhag zhon nu gzhan rab tu mang po rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing lha'i bdud rtsi'i sgom mang pos chos ma tog mnar ba'i 'phrang bas ni mgo brgyan pad+ma'i tshal gyi gsab gsab nani gnas/

gser dang/ be zurlu dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi ra dag la ni 'dzegs/ bung ba sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa pad+ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na rnam par rgyu la ni byed/lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma 'bum

go so na 'gran pa lta bu'i ma tog mnar ba dang/ pad+ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na gser gyi bya sgra 'byin pa thos na rnar snyan pa dang/ la mo'i yan log lnga dang ldan pa byas na sgra snyan cid bde ba rnams kyis nang na mngon

tshe bar dga' bar byed do// gsar dang bo DUrma'i rdo leb kyis sa gzhi legs par bsams pa dang/ mu tig bye ma sa gzhi bsams pa'i mtsho/ lha'i chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar bya'o/

rang gis byas pa'i ng sod nams kyis sbrel pa'i lhun po dag la gsar dang/ ba bla dang/ dngul dang/ shel gyi rdo yas mas bar byas pa'i 'i bzang po'i rtse mo dag na mngon par dga' bar byed de/dga' ba dang skyid pa

sna tshogs la gnas pa// lha dang lhags dkrigs pa'i nang na dgod cang rna la g.yor ba/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor bde ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rang gis byas shing bsags pa'i

las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du rang gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par byed do// gang gi las zad par gyur ba dang/ de phyiso lha'i si de nas 'bar gyur te shi nas kyang gal te

lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang dum skyes la/mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/de las de dang rgyu mthun brtag

tu bde ba dang ldan shing re 'bigs byed kyi sman ljongs dag tu gnas pa dang/ rgyal po'i yid ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas gang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha rtag tu
myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas lha yul la 'dod pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo// der soms can dag las gang gis skyabar

'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/soms dang ldan par gyur ba gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung/ mi ldan pa dang/ lta ba log kyang rung/ ma khog kyang rung ba zhig nad kyis

thabs pa la/nad rkyen dang/ snyan dang nad g.yog dag byin la/de'angand sos gyur na/ dolus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lulan dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyura'o// de'i skyes nas
u@#/ kyang 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar shes ba de/ lha'i gnas gzhan dag tumatshod tsang las 'phal pa las bde ba'aphel bar gyur te/ji ltar mar me 'bar ba las 'od 'byung ba de ltar
las 'phel ba las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur// de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rtenan las kyi 'bras bu de laspyod pa rnam par smin bzhin tu nyams dga' ba/ba mod ba thun mong ma yin pa dag 'byung//

legs par byas pa'i las des des skyes pa de/bo zurludang/ nor bu dang/ dngul gyi lhun po gsal ba'i spyi tshomathon po rnams na shin tubade bar gnas pa'i kun dga'i ba dag yod do// skyongamos tshalo dang/

stags du mas brgyan pa'i sa dag la gnas shing tshal dang nyo ba'i tshal rin poche sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/'od sna tshogs kyis lung dunyams dga' bar byed ba rnams kyin ng na lha mo'atshogs kyis longs su

bskorati de dag gis rtsed[]byed ban/doltar dang nga bo lnga dang/ blo yul chags pa de su dga' dgur bde nga la gnas te/ji srid du 'dodapa lhag pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de srid bar 'gyur

pa de srid du lha lul lha'i gnas den 'dod pa thams cad la blo rnam par chags pa de dga' bar byed/gnas bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/las de 'danas de nas lang las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa ji lta ba

bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ mi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i zhing du sa bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/do las de dang rgyu mthun par khyod gzugs bzang bo dang ldan zhing

gar yang 'jigs pa med pa dang/ nor bzang po dang ldan pa dang/ rgyal po'i 'a khor gyis mchod pa dang/ tshe ring ba dang lu 'badrang por skyes te dus kyang tshes bzang bo la dga' ba'i dus su skyabakagyur bam klong ngo/
de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyis nag la rtog par byed de des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tumyosa gnas rnamakyi

gnas chu bsi la gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug ba mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/snying rjecan sems ngas khongs su

bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems can gzhan 'chi ba'i dus kyi tsho/skom gyis gdungs ba'i skom ba bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ram// gshin rje'i mi yis 'jigs la brtan nas 'khrugs par gyur pa la bu

ramatshu 'am chu grang moglang nade legs bar byas pa'i las kyi mthu des gang batsho'atshapar gyur ba de 'tsho/lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil bar gnas zhes bya ba lha de dag nang du slobar 'gyur ro//

der skyes nas kyang bsol ba 'tshogs 'bab chu dang (chu bo phun sum tshogs pa'i sa phyogs dag na de dga' bar byed do// de lha'i btung ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung la 'gyur te/'di lta ste/mthong na chos pa

skyong ba dang dris myos pa skyong ba dang/ reg bas myos pa skyed pa dang/ sgra thos na myos pa skyong par byed pa/myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing snying dga' bar byed pa yin no// yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i btung ba dag
kyang 'byung ste/'di lta sta/btung ba de dag 'thungs nas/lha rnams lha'i stobs bcu'agyur du 'byung bar 'gyur go/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'gro nyams par yang ma 'gyur zhing ltung bar yang

mi 'gyur la/de bzhin du sa la'ang 'byang bar mi 'gyur 'o// de'i brtson 'grus longs su nyams pa'i ng med la/btso dang ga la'i sgra la mngon par dga' zhing lad zin tu dga' ba de rab tu dga' ba brgya gyur du 'gyur

bar 'gyur ro// de'i rna ba la dmanyan par bya ba la thogs pa med de/ shin tubad ba yang dag bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba mtho sa dang 'thun par gnas pa yul gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba dag myong bar 'gyur do nibo

che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul 'di lta bu dag kyang yod de/'di lta ste/tshal gagar byed dang/ tshal kun dga' dang/ tshal dga' b der gnas dang/ tshal yad tshim dang/ tshal rlung bde dang/ tshal sgra lnga 'dun dang/ tshal

'dab sgra rol mo dang/ tshal yid 'thun dang/ tshal bde bar gnas ba de rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do// mig gis kyang gzugs 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ngo// rna bas kyang sgra snyan pa rnam

'thad pa yid du 'od bdag thos so// smras kyang dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba dag rtsom mo// de ltar lcesakyang zhim pa blobatsho ba yid du 'ong bo dag myong ba ste/de ltar rnam pa de lta bu s yid tshim bar byas pa'i

snying dang dbang bo lngayug la chags ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba dag myong bar byed do// de ltar de srid ba'i tshogs drug gi mas nyin gcig bzhin srog pa ru khyed la/ 'dod chags kyi mis kyang nyin gcig bzhin yongs su

0 srog stag 'dod chags kyi ma dang/ bag med pa'i ma lce drug shin tu stobs che bar gyur kyang de dag des mi rig ge bag med pa des yid phrogs shing bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa/bag med nga des nyams ba/
legs par byas pa'i las des yul gyi bde ba la lhag par dga' ba zad pa med pa de ni/ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na bde ba myong

bar byed de// gang gi tshe phrad pan gyur pa dang/ de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chibar 'gyur te/ shin kyang gal te lan grangasagazhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/

dud 'grog zhing dum skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa la mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ la ba dang/ lanyo byung ba'i 'jigs pa yongs mi 'byung la/rtag

bar shin tu bde bar gnas pa dang/ yul ma mthong ba rnams su 'ongs na'ang dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang/ de la bya ba med pa bzhin du yang mal stan dang/ na ba'i gsos sman gyi rgyan gyi yo byad mong bo dgaspyin
par byed pa mthong ngo/ de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'brasabu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/des thos ba las byung ba'i shes bas
lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas brtan dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes bsabartags na//
gang gis spong ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong yid skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/migam/mi re lta bu'i bris ba zhig bzhag na/bde 'gromablos kyi 'jig rten bstan dga'i lha rnams kyi/

nang du skyo bar gyur// ra skyes nas kyang rtag tu brtan dga' de be rudang/ gsar dang/ byuru dang/ an+da rAl dang/ margad lta bu'i mthe risikyi gnas dag na yang dang yang du dga' bar byed cing nyin gcig bazhin

du ba la bar chad med pa 'bum gad ngag myong bar byed do// la mo ga mang po du ma 'bum snyadadag mang du thos na bar chad med par dga' ba la lhag par chags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa deb

byar yang mad la/mkhre sis su bras dang/ skom dang/ gos dang/ ma tog dang/ bris myos shing dga' ba mang po du ma 'byung ngo// der dag 'a ba de lta bu dag 'byung sta/'di lta ste/tshal mthong na dga' ba dang bya sna tsho/
sgra 'byin na dga' ba dang/ la chos dga' ba dang/ lha mo mthong na dga' ba dang/ rgyags par gnas na dga' ba dang/ dri zhim bos dga' ba dang/ thags su ma btags pa'i gos gyon na dga' khang/

rgya spos sna tshogs kyis phog na dga' ba dang/ bza' ba dang btung ba tshogs na dga' ba dang/ rtson bas dga' ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro bas dga' ba dang/ snying du sdug pa mthong na dga' ba dang/ ban bo
cho'i ri'i tsa mo nas ri rtsa mo bstan dga' ste/ de dag la sogs pas mno par dga' la/dga' ba du ma gzhan ms la'ongang shin tu chags te/bde ba zhin tu yid du 'ong ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang/ sa la snyan

yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyas len pa dang/ rang gas byas pa'i bde ba la gnas pa'i bde ba rnam pa dus de dag ji srid du 'dod bskyag kha yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur bde

srid du myong bar byed do// de 'dazhas mang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'achibar 'gyur te/shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'ilis kyis soms can dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i

nang dum skyes la/mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/do las dang rgyu na thun par spyod mos tshal sna tshogs kyin ng na gnas shing shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang khago ba'igos sna tshogs dang/
dga' gtam sna tshogs dang/ spyodabasna tshogs dang/ blta bar bya ba sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ba mthong// dunas ya nga dge slong desargyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas gsum dang/ las kyi

'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnam par can s/gnas bzhi pa la rtog par byed de/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mi ldang can gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams mthong ngo// de rnams kyi gnas bcu po'ang

'di lta ste dro dga' dang/ sgra snyan pa dang/ dol chagasadang khyor chu skyes dang/ lus dkar dang/ ban tshun dga' dang/ yang dag chags spyod dang/ 'khor dang nam spyod dang/ skyil mo krung ba stong du skya ba dang ldan pa

gnas pa dag ste/ lha bi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas ni bcu bo de dag yin no// dge slong de de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par sminab rnam bga' byed pa'i byed de gnas de rnams su lha dag las gang gis skyo bar gyur
zhig gu snyam nas/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/'di ltar las de dag byed na de ltar de dang 'thun par skye bar 'gyur la/las de dang 'thun par rnam par smin pa khu byung ngo//

de la rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang bo dri dga' zhes bya ba der sogs can dag las gang gis rgyu bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'onge shos pas brtags na/sems pa dang ldan par gyur cing/ des sogs
bsgoms pa des lus bsgoms pa gang gis bsod nams bsags pa bya ba'i phyir/dge 'dun dag la kun dga'ir ba'is 'am/bu ram shing gir ba 'am/ 'bra go'a'i ba ma/shing a ma'i kha phu la/de'ang

yongs su spyod pa byed zha/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dringaga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang bde ba du mthob cing spyod ba de lha'i tsan dan dang/ tsan dan sa mchog gi

byug pas lus byugs pa lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba/ gzugs dang na spyod sna tshogs dang ldan pa dgod ba dang/ rtsi ba dang/ sgeg chos la mkhas ba rnams dang lhan cig bats+tsha'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/

yaM nags tshal gyi bar dga'/mo tog gi 'phrang ba dang gos gyon pa/ yid rab tu dga' ba rnams dag par byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de'i lha'i dri rnam pa du ma dag pad+ma'i tshal de dag dang/ lha ma tog de dag brtol

nas dpag tshad brgya bsrung stobs chos 'byung ngo// dri mnam pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de dag thamasad dri shin tu nyams dga' zhing mchog tu mid du 'ong ba rnam pa du mas myos pa rnams gang lha'i ris brgya 'gyur dumyos

bar gyur le/ shin tu myos pa'i lha'is de dag nyid la sems chags pa rnams lha de dag nyid dang/ rnam pa dum brgya khyu du dga' mgur spyod par byed la/de rnams dang lhan cig tachu bo'i drung du 'grob byed do/ chube dodag

gi ming ni 'di lta ste// rin 'bab ces bya ba dang/ zhi bo'idum bu 'bab dang/ gsol 'bab dang/ bang 'bab chu bo dang/ sprang tsa'abab pa'i chu bo dang/ dbub 'og 'og 'bab pa dag ste/nu bo de dag thams cad kyi gramanabya

ngang pa dang/ ka nad ba dang/ ra pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan ba/ byasgra 'khyin pa rnams dang/ nga ljon pas mtha' khebs pa yin la/shing de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi bya rnams kyis kun nas dkrigs shing sgra yid du

bong ba 'byin pa dag lan te/ lha mo'i tshog saklu snyan pa len ba la mkhas ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bya'asgra dbyangs 'byin pa byes nas/tshal gyi nang na rgyaba'i bya gzhan sgra 'byin pa lhalar san pa de dag la shin tu nya'

byed do// yul gyi 'dod pa la sems rnam par chags shing bya'i sgra 'byin ba de la snying shin tu chags ba de dag gis ba re ba de thams cad bor nas/bya'isgro de la nyan pa byed do/bya'i sgra yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang/ thos

nabadeb rnam pa du ma sna tshogs dang/ sgra dbyangs bdun dang ldan zhing rgyun mi drag kha 'byin pa la nyan par khyedado// chu bo gzhan das/ tusgra 'byin bar lha mo'itshogs rnams dga' bar byed/ glu dbyangs len/ dgod par byed la/

lha'i nang chos ba'askyon dang bral ba dag la 'thung bar byed do// dedagari rnams kyis mthong nas kyang de rnams dang lhan cig dga' khar khyod la/baiDUrludang/ dngul dang/ shel dang/ gas gyi ri bo gzhan dag gi rtse mo dang/
brtsa @#// chu bo dang/ 'babachudang/ lteng ka dang/ nags tshal mdzes pa dang/ pad+ma'i tshal bya'itshogs sna tshogs kyis brgyun ba rnams su lha modo rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// gzhan yang

phyogs gzhan dag na bi ma sngon kho 'dumabu lta bu dang/ me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i sa phyogs dgan dga' khar byed de/delta legs khar byas ba'i las de dang rgyu mthun par sil snyan nan lag lnga dang ldan

pas mthoras kyi bde ba yid du 'ong ba rnam bdu mag myong ngo// lha'i bde ba de'ang dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtogs nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad do smras pa rnam bar chags pa'i dbang po lnga/

de ltar yul rnams lnga la chags// 'dod chags skad cig ma 'byung ba'ang// yul gyis tshim par ma byed do// yula rnams kun gyin ng nicig/ 'dir ni bud med khon lta//yul kun zil gyis mnan nas su// 'dod chags

mnachen por 'bar// tshogs pa dang ni ma tshogs dang// 'chi ba dang ni gtam brjod pa'i ng// bud med rgya las kun byang ste// me yis mi 'di sug par byed// man tshogs dang 'bar 'gyur gyi// ma rtogs 'bar bar mi

( 'gyur la// tshogs na'ang 'bar lam tshogs kyang// lha rnams 'dod chags mu 'bar ro// me de'i luladamod pa dang// rgyang rang na go sregam byed// 'dod chags chen ring 'dra// mi bzad dga' bas sreg par byed//
kun tu rtogs pa'i shing skam 'byung// dga' ba ya yo'i shugs dang ldan// srangapa'i mar la bsgugs pa 'di// 'dod chags me yis dgabs sreg/ 'di ltar tshe yi lus gcig na// bsregs nas rab tu zhi bar

'gyur/ rnaming dang gzugs dang ma bral ba'i// 'dod chags chen zhi 'gyur// srag byed mi bzad ma lani// 'byung po dga' bar mi byed la// 'dod chags ma ni ba rno yang// mi rnams yid ni 'byung ma byed// dbang bo

lnga las dbyung ba yis// 'di ni yul rnams lnga yis bskyabs// srid pa rlung gi stobs dang mtshungs// 'dodatshogs ma yis skye dgu srog/ rtog pa'igatsubashing las byung ba'i// tshul rnams kyis ni yongs susal//

lus ni shing ltar srog byed kyang// de ni skyibs mi mthong ngo// ji lta ji ltar 'do chags chog/ thab tu 'bar bas srog byed pa// de lta de ltar 'dod chags dri// bde bzhin du 'ongs su bstan// megaseb tu gsal 'grubal

'dod chags mo ni mun pas bsgribs// de bas dug dang dgra lta bu// brtan pos 'dodachags ma songs shig/ de ltar dge slong sa de dag mthong nas 'dod chags kyi mos srog pa'ilha la snying brtse bar byed la/ lha'i

srid par gtogs pa dag la'ang skyon de dag rtogs nas sred bar mi byed do// de ltar dri ga'i sa phyogasan bde ba rnam ba dum dag/ ji srid du 'dodapa stag pa yid du 'ong ba le gsal byas pa las de zad par ma gyur ba

de srid du myong bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang/ mi dgas dang dud 'gro'i ming du ma skyes
la/mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i zhing du skyes na/de las dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu sa phyogs bde bathob cing shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas la nga dge slong log
kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha pi wang can gsum b rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/des blos ba las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas sgra snyan pa zhes byabaji ltar
'dug ba magleng ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des thos pa lasakhyung ba'ishes pas brtags na/legs bor byas pa'i las spyad cing/ sems ba dang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/

ldan bar gyur pa gang gis lta ba log par zhugs pa dag la tshigs su bcad pa cig bstan la de dag kyang sems yud tsam zhig sangs dadapa skyes na/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi ba jig rten sgra/

snyan ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang dbang po yul la dga' zhing bde bde/lha'i mtsho 'gram na sde ba la ni dga'/pad+ma'i tshal gyi 'phrang ba dang/ gsar kyi ri bo la gnasashing/ lha'i rol mo byed pa

bani dga'/lha mo gzugs dang rgyan rnam ba sna tshogs thogs pa/'dzumazhing 'ango sgrig la mngon par dga' ba/byad bzhin rgya sadad lugasing dbang phyug mtshungs bamad ba la dga' ba rnams kyis ni yongs su

bskor rtag tu ni gcig bzhin bde ba la gnas pa rab tu 'phel zhing/ be rma'i ri'i rtse mo dag na gnas la bde ba sna tshogs spyod pa ma tog gi 'phrang bo dang/ khyu ma dang/ byug pas lus brgyan ba dag de na dga' bar

byed de// gul gyi rnam ba mang po la dga' ba/ ri rab dang/ ri khrod yang ba na gnas pa dag gser gyi ri dang tshal rnams kun ng na dga' bar byed de/den gsar gyi ni 'di lta bu dag yod de/'di lta ste/rimakha' thug

sa bya ba dang/ rigrib med ces bya ba dang/ ri thams cad dga' zhes bya ba dang/ yid bzhin sngal cesabya ba dag ste/ri de dag ni rin po ches rnam par bya zhing mdzes la/ gsar gyi tshalagyisomadzes par byas ba

ba'i rtse mo rnams na lha'i tshogs snying rab tu dga' ba rnams rtag tu glu dbyangs kyisgra ni 'byin/mudang zhing bsil la gtsang ma'i rgyun dag dang/ pad+ma'i rdzong rnams kyis ni rtag tu mdzes par byas/byartag tu chos

shing rnamasnyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa rnams ni da bar 'khod/ mig tu shin tu sdug pa'i ri'i sa phyogs kyi sman ljongs de rnams na rang gi las la spyod pa'i lha de dag dga' bar byed rgyu bar byed/rtse bar byed/dga' mgur

spyod par byed do// lha mo bzang mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing/ bya tshes pa sgra 'byin pa dang/ gser gyi bung bamyos pa mang po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha de dag thams cad reg na bde ba'i lha'i lcag

ma khyim rnams su 'khor dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// de ltar de gnas de na ji srid du 'ded pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lha las ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do// gang gi

tshicad par gyur ba dang/ de lha'i ris de nas 'chibar gyur to/ shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ mi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi 'khor bar longs su 'khyag par 'gyu'o//
gzugs bzang bo dang ldan pa dang/ ris mthunapa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ skyon med pa dang/ bran po dang/ bramo dang skye bo dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang

dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha li thang can gsum ba rnams kyi gnas la rtogo bar byed de/des thos pa las byung ba'ang shes pas lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas de ba chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar/
'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ ngos thos ba las byung ba'i shes bas brtags na/lugs bar byas ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad par gyur pa/de la rab tu chags ba'i

yid sems pa dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis grogs po la skom phor gang tsam blud pa 'am/ 'gronabo rnams la srog chags lu ta dang/ kitadang/ sprang bu mchu rings dag gi 'jigs pa las bde bar bya 'phyi'i khron pa

dag 'gebs par byed de/'di ltar srog chags dug dang 'dre ba 'dapag gi dug chu'i ming du song na de las mgron po lam du zhugs ba rnams kyi srog gi bar chad du 'gyur rosAmanas bya ba'ang med kyis kyang/ byams sems

kyis khron ba la 'thun pa'i spyi bo gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyirag las de g.yog par byed na/skyes bu dge ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rtan lhabi wang thogs po rnams kyi gnas de la chags
pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyura'o// der skyes nas de'i lus ni nyi ma gnyis pa lta bur gzi ni sta/legs par byas ba'i las rnams kyis sa thams cad bskrun/dang/ bo dang/ suladang/ 'bab na gnas ba rnams

'tshado dang dpa' ngang tshul 'thun pa'i lhamo'i gzugs dang/ lang tshodang/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thegs pa rnamA kyis ni yongs su bskor/gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya sdug bdum la rab tu chags shing/

mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa yin no// gnas de dgan rin po tshes bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i ri dang tshal 'di lta bu dag yod de/'di lta ste/nyis bsad pa'itshal de nam ga rnams kyang nyis pa

mad cing/ dridang la nga bral ba med ba dang/ gsar kyi grib ma'i tshal zhes byag gzer gyi lcag chasadra bar bresashing/ bo m+ma bung ba rnams mdzes par byas la/rmabyadang khu byug sgra 'byin to// bya de dag kyang bzhi bo che snaban

gyi sgro gshog dang ldan pa/sgra snyan cing 'jebs par 'byin pa yin te/tshal de na shin tu nyams dga' bar yang bdag nyid kyis mthong nas shin tu bde bar gyur to// dan bya 'di lta bu dag yod de/bkra ba dang sgro gshog bkra ba

dang/ lha rnams kyi snying la 'do bskyod pa gang yin pa de dag des sgra khyin par byed de/sgra de thos nas lha rnams kyang ngo mtshar cher skyes la/'di ltar bya 'di dag ni lha dang 'thun par mthong ste/gang bdag cag gi yid la

'dod pa de dag khyade rnams sgra 'byin par byed do snyam mo/ blachu zhim gnas zhes bya ba de dag gi kha nas chang ro dang dri'i ngo bogatsang ba phun sum tshogs ba 'byung ngo// kha nas byung ba'i chang de la rad bya gzhan rnams 'thung bar

byed de/de 'thus nas bya de dag bcu 'gyur du myos shing yid rab tu dga' nasakhargya 'gyur du sgra 'byin par byed do// lha de dag gi nang na sgra dbyangs phan tshun 'dres pa brgya 'gyur du snyan pa yin te/byad dag gi sgra dang/ lha mo de
0 @#/ dgagi glu dbyangs shes nas/'dod pa la chags pa'i lha yi shin tubade ba rnams bargya'agyur du dga' bskya zhing de dgagi glu dbyangs dang sgra la chags par byed do/byamachu sgyur 'gro shog khyab

gang dril bu g.yer kha'i drab sgra 'khrol ba'i gsab gseb na dga' bar byed pa la/ 'di ltar yin bya'i sgra 'byin nam/tsa dril bu g.yer kha'i sgra 'byin cesagasalab mi mngon pa de ltar de dag dang lhan cig sgra 'byin

tan+taphanatshun 'dres pa nyis 'gyur dung snyan ba yin no//bya 'gramagyi mtha' na sbyod pa zhes bya ba gang/ chang rtag tu chu bo ltar bab pa'i 'gram dang/ gser gyi bar 'i bar bar dgan gsasog/ byakhrib ma'inang na bzhes

'i bya ba gang/ ji tsam du sred pa'i rnam ba dang 'dresan gzugs kyi rnam pa de tsam gyur te/ rnam pa de srid du gnas so// byams pa zhes bya ba gang/ gal te lha shin tu nyams dga' ba rnams dang nye bar lha mo de dag gnas

na brgya 'gyur dums tatshal dang/ nags tshal dum rnams nang na'ang rtag tu bde bar gnas bdag dga' bar byed do//yid la bsams kha gang yin b dadang de dag nyid 'grub par 'gyur te shin tu tshabaragyur cing

dga' ba dang/ stag pa dang/ yid du 'ong bskya'o// lha mo'i tshogs dums yongs su bskor ba'i lha detshal dang nye ba'i tshald rnams zhing na dga' bar byed do// gser dang/ dbuladang/ bot+tam+ma'iri'i mo gzhan dngagazha

ga lerlu'i ts+tsha'i rdzong gis longs su bskor cing/ bya ngang kha dang ka'and pas kyang bskor ba/boDUnusngon bo lta bu'i tshu shin tu dri zhim pas gang ba chad dum 'byung ba/baiDUrma'i dang/ gosar dang/ dngulagyi sha len

[p]pa dri zhim pa rnam pa du mas gtibs pa/kun nas ri 'di lta bu kun yod de/ bsams na sna tshogs 'byung dang/ sa stangs yangs dang/ sa phyogs mtho dman dang/ gzhi 'jam stangasa dga' ste/de rnams su lha mo'i

tshogs kyis los su bskor ba'i lha thams cad nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'bab la/kun nas dga' bar byed cing dga' dgur spyod par byed do// gzugs sdugapa 'bum phrag dum rnam ba du ma dag la lta bar byed do// sgra

snyan ba 'das pa yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma la nyan par byed do// shim pa bro ba che ba yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma dag la snyom bar byed/dbazhin du 'og pasa'eg bar bya ba dag la rig par byed do// de ltar dbang

bo thams cad mul lamyong bar byed de/rang gas byas pa de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas de dag na dga' bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/

shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro blta ba bzhin sems can myal ba dang/ mi rigs dang dud 'gro zhing du 'khor bar gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyamaM

par mi'i nang du skyes na/de bas de dang mthun par rtag par rgyun du bde ba dang ldan zhing/ kun dga' ra ba bde bar gnas pa dang/ rgyal po byams pa dang/skye bo thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ba mthong nge/

de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha pi wang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/des thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas/lha rnams M kyi gnas skyor chus skyes zhes bya ba ji
ltar 'dug pa mthod ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des khros pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/legs par byas pa'i las kyimatha' spyad pa
sems pas mos su bsgoms pa'i snying dang/ snying rjes nuba'isams dang ldan b gang gis sems can 'chi bar 'gyur bskom gyis gdus te/mgul sgrar dar bor bgagasang/ srog cung zad yod pa la

skom blud ma de bzhin du gang gis de'i srog bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir snyan ngag byin na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mthengs kyi 'jig rten bi wang can gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyor nus skyes pa'i

glu gnas su skyabar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de lha'i dbang bo'i lus dang mtshungs shing/ lha mo'atshogs kyis kun nas bskor ta/bde ba rgyun mi 'chad la rtag tu gnas pa yin no//de ltar rang gi las la spyod pa

de tshal dum dang/ chu bo dang/ 'bab chu dum dag kyang rab tu mthong sta/de re 'ga' lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/tshal 'phreng ba zhes bya bder 'dong bar byed do// tshal de'ang chub dang/ lteng ka dang/ pad+ma'i

tshal du ma dag gis brgyan cing/ lha mo'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis mdzes par byas la/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' b rnams kyis gang ba yin no// tshal de na shing ldan pa ma tog dang 'bras bu du mas brgyan pa/lha la

mo'i sgra 'byin ba/ bya'isgratshatsosnyan pa 'byin pa yin no// tshal de ni rin po che snatshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis longs subaskor ba yin te/'di lta ste/rtag tu dga' ba dang/ yang dag bar dga' bar byed pa'i m tog mnaM

ra ba dang/ brgya dang/ dring ltar dga' ba rnams kyis bskor ba yin na// ma rtog de dag gi phyi'i mthun 'di lta bu yin te/lha rnams dri lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar me tog de dag las 'byung lam tog gcig gis mo

tog thams cad kyi dri'i bya ba byed do// tshal 'phreng ba de nyidanalha rab tu dga' zhing bro gar byed ba/ phan tshun grogs sugyurab rnams tshal lo tog lnga pa zhes bya bar 'dong bar byed do// de la'ang bya dus su dran par byed pa zhes bya

ba yodade/des lha de dag mthong nas 'di ltar tshig 'brel ba'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bsod nams dwagani nyams dga' la// de dag 'bras bu mchog tu dge/ bsod nams lta bur sgrol ba mad// de lta bas nabasod
nams sa//bsod nams gnyen gyi mchog yin te// bsod nams gter ni zad mishes// bsod nams mar ma lta bu yin// de bzhin pha dang ma dang mtshungs//bsodoms byas nas 'gro ba'i lha// bsod nams kyis

nibazang 'gror khrid// mi lul bsod nams byas pan// de dag lha yul dga' bar byed//'di ltar bsod nams che ba'i mi// rtag tu bde dang ldan par 'gyur// bsod nams lta bu bde ba med// de lta bas na bsod nams

kyis 'jig rten gnyis la phan byed cing// dga' dang nor gyi rgyur gyur pa// bsod nams yin pa rtag tu mthong// de ltar bsod nams bde mchog ldan// rtag tu bsod nams rjes 'brang ste// de ni grib ma bzhin du 'brang/ de
bla bsod nams bde mchog ste// bsod nams lta bu bde ba med// bsod nams zad pa'i lha rnams ni// rang gis byas pa'i rjes su ltang// 'jig rten dge dang mi dge'i 'bras// de bas bsod nams yang dag spyod//
lha yi yul dubadag cag gang// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas 'thun par gnas// bsod nams ma yin rgyur gyur pa// rang gis dus bas sems rmongs so// gang zhig bsod nams dman pa ni// gdul

dga' rta gzhungan 'gror 'gro// bye mal na mar med ltar// de ba bde ba ga la yod//sems kyis bslus pa'i rmongs ba rnams//bsod nams kyi ni yongs su spangs// de dag la ni bde yod cing/ de dag sdug bsnga'amatha27

mdado/ khang dang yang du skye 'gyur zhing/ yang dang yang du 'chi bar 'gyur// lha dag bde bas myos pa gang// de dag la ni bde rtag mo// las kyi rgyar bcugagyur cing// gti mug gis ni bslus pa rnams// 'khor ba thog ma

mad ba nas// 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khyam par byed// lha dag lha yi 'jig rten nas// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gang// de nadmyal las dmyal bar du// de yi dpa byas yong yod do// de mtha' rtag tu ltung bar go/

'di dag ci zhig mi shes sam// lha rnams 'chi med yul lta bur// bde bas rmongs rnams lta ba'i khyod// skyo dang 'chi ba'i 'jig rten ni/ grangs su bgrang du yong med kyang// sred pas longs su bslus pa yi// mi rnams

rgyu yid ni byung ma byed//de nas lha de rnams lha'i bya de'i sgra de thos nas cung zad cig yid la byas pa dang/ yang bag yod ba de nyid kyi dbang du gyur te/ srod pas srid par skyod ba de dag thams cad ni/sems la rtag tu rag las pa yin

rta'abreng ba'i tshul de na bde ba las bde bar gnas pa de dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan bas bre gang byed/dgado bar byed do// yul bud shing lta bur gyur ba la/bag mdab me lta bur rgyun mi chad par sreg pa na

chu las yul dang nye ba'i tshal nas niyeba'i tshal dang/ 'asong nas mi'i skad dang/ gzhal med kho nas gzhal med khang dang/ bad+ma'i tshal nas pad+ma'i tshal dang/ zhi ba tsho'i ro'i rtsa tshonas rin po che'i ri'i rtse mor rgyud

daltalha mo dang lhan cig mu lagyi spyod pas bdas ban/ lhade rnams risrid du'adod ba sdug ba yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de na dga' bar byed do//de zad nas de na ga la bskyu
bar gyur te/lhung nas kyang las nye ba 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i kho'i bar yongs su 'khya mchog/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nangahU~M

nas sa de dang 'thun par tshor bas tshe rabs su nad yod par 'gyur zhing nyon mongs kha chod ba dang/ skye bo dam pa kun gyi yid du 'ong ba dang/ bkres ba dang/ skom ba dang bral ba'i yul bzang po'i skye ba dang/ me tog
gis brgyan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas nga dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/des thos pa las byungaba'i/
shes bas lha pi wang can gasum pa rnams kyi gnas lus dkar zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mkhong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis sku bar 'gyur snyam nas/ngos thes pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags

na shing dang shing ma yin pa'i rnam ba shes shing yid shin tu dang ba dang/ soms pas yongs sukhasgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa dang/ na ying zhugs shing soms g.yong ba med pa/las kyi 'bras bu mngon par
shes pa gang gis mchod rten nam/dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi skyang nul rlung ngam/nyi ma la/char pas zad pa slar skyang nul byugs la de ltar byas nas de rjes su dag zhing gzhan

dag kyang de nyid la dga' bar byed du 'jug la/lugs bzhin byed du 'jug ste/de ltar byed na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten lus dkar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur//der skyes

nasakyang de dag thams cad dkar bo kho nar snang ste/de'i khyad par ni dung dang/ kha ba dang/ me tog ku mu ta dang/ 'o ma dang bcas pa dag gis ni bcu drugagi char yang mi phod do//de ltar rnam pa de lta bu'i gzhal med

b+hU khang dang/ shing rta dang/ gnas dag dang/ gzhan dag kyang kun nas dkar zhing mchog tu dkar bor snang bar 'gyur te/'di ltar lus kyang mchog tudakar banyid du 'gyur ro//dga' bar byed ba'i ngang tshul can

dag skyed mos tshal du dga' ston byed du 'dong sta/'di ltar bya ru'i tshal zhes bya ba gnas de dag tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing dgong ba dang/ na tu yid dga' ba'i grogs po rnams dang

lo lhan cig tshal der 'dong bar byed do// de ltar do gakhyu ru'i tshal gyi nang du 'dong ste/gang gitsho zhugs pa dang bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing gsar btsoma'i shing ljon pas mdzes pa yin no//shing ljon pa'i bzhi

gyis mdzes par byas pa'i byu ru'i tshal de'am thuni 'di lta bu yin te/ ji ltar kha dog dmar bo gzhan dang mi mthun bar 'byung ba de ltar shing ljon pa'i 'od dmar bo rnam pa de lta bu 'byung ngo//lha de dag thams cad

tshal de'i mthus dkar bo de rnams dang bral nas kha dog shin tudamar por gyur pa dang/ phan tshun gtam dubadag cag gis lus lhan cig skyes pa'i mdzes ba gang yin pa de dag tshal gyi kha dog gi mthus mi
snang la gzhan snang bar gyur to//shing ljonapa de dag kun nas kha dog dmar po kho na yin te/bdag cag ni tshal gzhan du 'dong bar bya'o zhes brjod do// de nas lha de rnams lha mo de dag dang lhan cig

tshal ga la ba der dong bar byed do//tshal de'ang be rma'i mdog des ji lta'adzam bu'i gling gi gnam ltar kun nas sngob yin no// de nas lha rnams tshul de 'ang kha dog dkar po gang yin pa de dag bi ta rlung

ljon pa'i dbyibs de rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mnan te/ shing de rnams la bya gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha dog sngon por gyur la/bad+ma gang yin ba de dag kyang sngon bor gyur to//de ltar sa zla'il de dag

thams cad sngon po nyid yin no// de nas lus dkar ba lha mo'i tshogs mang bos longs su bskor ba lha'i rol mo' sbyadang/ dri dang/ glu dbyangs dang bcas ba rnams tshal de na yun ring du dga' bar byed/rtse bar

byed dga' mgur spyod cing/ lha'i bde ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga myong bar byed do// de nas yun ring zhig len nas lha lus dkar bo rnams rtsi ba'i don du dngul gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal du 'dong bar byed do//dngul gyi

tshal de ni kun nas kha dog dkar po'i snang shing tshal de na ga nga gi yod pa de thams cad dkar ba yin la/tshal de na babang dngul gyi pad+mi na tu nyams dgab nano// bya rnams kyang dngul gyi bu yin te/de ltar lha
lus dkar bo dang ldan ba de dag thams cad tshal de'i nang du zhugs ba ltar 'o ma'i nang na zla ba'i gzugs brnyan snang ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no// tshal de na lha rnams yun ring du dga'

bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed cing/ lha'i dpa med pa 'dod ba'i bde ba yan lag lnga dang ldan pas bde ba myong bar byed do//de dag dor yang dga' bar byas nas/ tshal sna tshogs ga la ba der 'byong bar byed do//

! tshal de yang shing ljon pa snatshogs kyis mdzes bar byas shing/ gsar gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes bar byas pa yin te de bzhin du da dul gyi shing ljon ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du phyi zla'i shing rten
rnams dang de bzhin du lo ma snatshogs rnams kyis mdzes bar byas pa yin no//shing de rnams kyang kha dog sna tshogs kyi lo ma dang/ mdogosna tshogs kyis mdzes ba yin latshal de'i nang na lha de rnams

de dganyid kyi lus rnams rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur to// tshal de na'ang lha rnams yun ring du dga' bar byed/ dga' magur spyod par byed do/ lha mo'i tshog sakyi nang du' khod ba rnams de dag gis glu/

dbyangs nye bar len zhing de na'ang de rnams yun ring du rtsis nas kun tu mthong ba'i gsorakyiri bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// bu'ang rin pochosna bdunagyis brgyan pa yin te/lha ngo dgagis ri kun rta mthong chub dang/

'babachu dang/ lteng kamang bos brgyan pa/tshal dang nags tshal dang ldan pa/pa'i rdzing bu du mas 'khor ba/bya'i tshogs mang bo'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri bo de la'adzegs nas/ rgyal bo re reb drug bris bskor ba/nga rnam

kyis dbus na ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'dug pa de dag thams cad mthong ngo// de nas lha lus dkar po rnams kun nas mthong ba'i la ri de la lha mo dang lhan cig yun ring du rtse bar byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed do//
de nas yang de rnams las babs nas/ri bo phyogs gtsang ma zhes du ba ga la ba der 'dzag par byed de/ri bo rdo la'ang gnas gzhan dag nas skyes pa'i lha rnams dga' ba'i mthus ri bo ngo la 'ongs nas

dga' bar byed do// lha kazhan de rnams dang/ lha lus dkar po de rnams dang/ yang phan tshun lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed ceng dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de nas lha yul gyi

phyogs cha dga' bde rnams su lha de dag yun rang du dga' bar byas nas/mar zad na ma ra mo 'chi bar 'gyur zhing// nyin bar gyis mtha' zad na/nyim nub par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de rnams legs bar byas ba'i

las zad na/mar me ltar lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems nun dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang du rgyu bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams
dang skal ba mnyam bar mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu 'thun par pad+ma'i rtsa lag lta bur mdog dka sham bzang bor 'gyur zhing/ stod phyogs sam rgyal lulalasogs bar skyo bar 'gyur/rtag tu
bde ba dang ldan pa dang/ mi gtso bo chon po'i yid bcugs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// nga nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar smin pa shes pa de/ lha pi wang can gasum pa rnams kyig nas

lo rtag pa'i phyudang la la la rtog par byed de/des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/lha'i 'jig rtenan lha ban tshun dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug ba mthong nge// gnas par sems can dag las
gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/nges smos pa las byung pa'i shes pas partagasan/sems can dge ba phan tshun grogs su gyur ba sems pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa grol ba'i dge 'dun gyi gtso bor

gyur ba gang dag gis sbyin pa byin/tshul khrims bsrungs na/ de dag thams cad rgyud dang rkyen de las lus dang bral nasabade 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phan tshun dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du sku bar 'gyur ro// don

skyes nas kyang phan tshunabade bskyed cing sams 'thun par bskyod pa de rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs de sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i pa'i rje ngan gnas shing kha bras la dga' ba de yul nyams dga' zhing bad ga/

dag myong bar byed de/sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan bas yid rab tu dga' ba dag dgod par byed/ dga' bar byed/rtso bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed la/lha mo' tshogs gzugs dang chu bur sna tshogs dang

ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sagazhi dang/ rida rnams la dga' bar byed do//de ltar rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la sdod cing dga' bde rnams su chu bo'i 'gram la la rgya'i
dang nor bu'i lan kan bres pa dang/ gsar gyi rnam pa'i bya dang pa dang dur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/'graman shing ljon pa skyes pa rnams kyis stag gur brgyan pa'i sman ljongs ngag na/lha mo'i

tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams dga' bar byed do// don de dag dga' bar byas nas/ mu tig 'bab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chu bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de// chu bo de dag na chu gang yin pa de dag ni chang

rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa rnyog pa med ba 'bab be// bye ma gang yin pa de dag ni mu tig yin la/'dam rdza ba gang yin ba de dag ni gsar yin te/ chu bo do nor bu kha dog bzang bo du mas brgyan ba ta rnams kyis
tu mdzes pa yin no// de'i ngos gnyis ka na gsar gyi sha len pa rnams la 'dab ma ni na rma'i shing ljon pa rnams gser gyi 'dab ma yod de/'dab ma yod pa de thams cad la dus tshegs

thams cad kyi 'bras bu dang/ ma tog babrang dgus khebs pa ye ni no// bya'i tshogs rtag par rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis kun tu gang la thes na yid 'phrog pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin te/ bya'i tshogs mthong na dga'/

ba rnam pa de lta bu dag dang/ rtag tu kun nas dga' ba'i lha de rnams dang lhan cig byed pa lta bur dus thams cad du dga' bar byed do// der de rnams kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/phyogs gzhan n snyan

pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//phyogs de na lcag mas g.yogs pa'i khyim yod de/rin po che mchad kyi dum bu ring po skyon med pas phyi ba/ sa phyogs kyi rim pa mthe dman dang ldan

zhing pad+ma'i tshal gyis brgyan pa sa phyogs shin tu rnam par bya ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi bya rnams kyis mdzes par byas ba/ la la dag na yang gsal gyi sa gzhi'i phyogs nyams dga' ba'i turla'i lhag ma'i
@#// du bas gtibs ba/bung ba dang me tog gis kun tu dga' kha/lha dang lha mo'atshogs rtag tu dga' ya ya ste/rab tu dga' po rnams kyis kun tu gang ba/legs pa byas pa'i las
bsod pa' lha de rnams kun tu dga' ba khyed do// de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na chudang/ lteng ka dang/ tshal dang/ 'bab stegs mang po yod par 'dong bar byed do//'bab stags dang tshal de dag na chu
rgya'i khu mdog bzang bo gang yanapa de rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs de dag thams cad bar mtshams med par kun tu bkang nas sgra 'byin to//chad chu bo ltar 'bab pa rog pa med pa rnam pa du ma dag

! 'bab sta/ gsar gyi rdo las dba' rlabs kyi sgra 'byung zhing dbu ba 'khrugs pa'i sgra khro le 'byung la/bya rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa leng leng bo rnams dang/ chu bo ri rnams kyi ngos gnyis kan 'bod pa'i

lha mo'i tshogs kyis longs su bskor ba rnams dang dga' bar byed/rtso bar byed do// lag na gsor gyi bad+ma thogs pa rnams phan tshun brdeg pa na de ltar ban tshun yid gnugs pa lhan cig rtse ba de rnams kyis
sa'ang du 'das so// pa/ dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhagapa kham po nyi shu dgupa////phyogs de nas kyang chos byed tshal zhes bya ba der lha thams cad rtse

ba'i grogs dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do// tshal den sems can gyi rnam ba thams cang myos byed kyis mun bar gyur te/ bya de dag ni 'bras bu re rnams kyis myos po klu'i khung ba dag ma togagi ro rnams

kyis chos/khu byug dag ni dpyod mthong nas myos/'gram na rgyu ba'i bya dag ni chang gi ri rnams kyis myos/de bzhin du lha rnams ni lha'i 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis myos de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyang
lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'dod ba'i ros myos te/de ltar 'dod ba'i ros myos pa'i bud med rnams ni gzhan gyis myos par mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar bud med thams cad ni 'dodab lhur len ba yin la/de la sem/

zhugs de la gzhol/del gnas/de'i rang bzhin no// lha de dag kyang myos byung mong nas brgya'agal du myos pa rnams de na dga' bar byed do// de ltar lha de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i

las zad par ma gyur ba de srid du de na dga' bar byed do// de nas de thad nas lha'is donas 'chi par 'gyur ro//shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ du
'gro'an du 'khor bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na bsod nams gcig ba de dag thams cad yul dang/ ljongs dang/ grong khya'agacig tu skye bar 'gyur zhing thams

cad 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ thams cad rigs che zhing btsun bar skyabadang/ thams cad phan tshun dga' zhing bya ba gcig pa dang/ dge ba'inang du skyo bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/de dag las de dang rgyu
'thun par dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba gang yin ba de dag thams cad kun la 'byung gi/ so sa la ni ma yin no// de nas bang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par snyani ba shes pa de lhapo wang
sman gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/des thos pa las byung ba'i shas bas lha bi thad na gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la de dag nags stod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug ba
mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/des grosapa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/zhal tapa tshul khrims dang ldan bar gyur pa ging gis khyim ba gzhan dag
dga' bar byas/gzengs bstod mgu bar byas/ dad par byas nas sems yongs su bsgoms pa de/ zhang yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa byon du bcug cing tshul khrims kyang srang bcugan/da lus dang bral

nas bad 'gromatho ris kyi 'jig rten yang dag chags spyod ku lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang rang gi mthu 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ las gang gis bdag cag 'dir skyes shig gu
snyam nas/ de dag mir skyes pa yang dag bar dran no/ 'di ni mi'i 'jig rten na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa yin te/'di'i sbyin bdag ni bdag yin no// rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des de
dang bdag bsod nams 'thun bar gyur nas/'dir 'ongs pa lta zhig tu snyam mo/ de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyenanyan thos de'ang skye ba dran te/ 'di ltar 'donabadagagiso sogs dang bas sbyin ba thun du/

cug pa yin te/rgyud dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhidis de nas bdag lha 'jig rten 'di'i sems dang ldan par skyes pa la snyam nas de ltar yang dag tshags spyod kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su skyes so// de nas gzhan du

0 gyur te/pad+matshogs lta bu'i lha mo mang bo byad gzugs dang/ mdog dang/ lang tsho dang/ sdug ba so so du mas brgyan ba mthong ngo// lha mo de dag mthong nas/ lha de rnams kyis mthong ma thag tu ji ltar tshor bas/
ma la byas pa shin tu phra mo'ang ma dran zhing yul la sems rnam par chags pa/ bag med b gnas su skyes ba/ yul kyi bde bas sems 'phrogs pa/de ltar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'phangs ba'i yid
skyabar byed do// de nas yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyis/ lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma byad gzugs dab mad pa dang ldan pa de dag mthong nas/thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i 'dod chags

kyi mas ye de de'ang tu bsregs pa ni/ ji ltar mas bud shing skam po yun ring du srog par byed pa de ltar lha de rnams kyi yid de dag pheb tu sreg par byed do// da lha mo de dag ga lab la 'gro bar byed la/ lhamo

rtag tu 'dod pa la donagacig tu byed pa 'ang kha rlangs dri zhim pos nam ma ba 'gengs shing lha'i na khyad du mthogs la lag nabad+makhyer te/ lhag la ba der 'dong bar byed do// de nas lha de rnams dang lha mor
rnams lha'i 'dod pa bde ba rnam pa dum de dag myong bar byed do// de nas bag med pa de lta burig nas/ dge slong de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam nga bdum las yid phyung nas/ 'di ltar tshags su
bcad de smras pa/ nyin mo gsar du byung ba yis// rnying pa med par byed pa ltag/ bde dang sdug bsngal gsar pa yis// rnying pa nye bar rjed par byed// ngaltar lhayi 'jig rten du// khade ba
'dzan pa'i skye bo dag/ 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi ba dang// mis 'bral ba'i mtha' mi ge/ ji ltar shing dang sbrang rtsir bsres// ji ltar dug dang zas bsres pa// de ltar bde
ba 'di kun gyi// mtha' mi bde ba ma rig go/ lha yul de ni lhag par yang// yul rnams lta bas ga la dems// srid pas ngoms pa med pa de// khyad par du yang ga la bde// shin tu bdo ba'i
stobs las ni// lha yul rnams su ye nas sred// srid mas yongs su gdungs rnams kyi// bde ba nye bar mi dmigs so// gcig tu bde spyod sred bral zhing// nga med re ba med pa dang// mya ngan 'das

grong 'gro ba na// bde gang yin pa de 'thob bo// gang dag sred pa'i bag la nyal// long ye sems la mi 'jog pa// de dag thog mtha'i dril bralo// khed kha'i nang na'ang de bde'o// sems ni shin tu bsdus ba/
dang// khams cad du na'i med dang// bya dang ni bya mchongs pa// bde ba rtag tu rta bar gnas// gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyur 'gyur// dga' bcas 'byung ba bcom pa dag/ brtan po gtsodi pa laM/
'gro bde ldan mya ngan 'das la gnas// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang ldan/ grod pa nas de la bde ba med// gang zhig 'dod chags me las grolo// de ni dri med bde bar 'dong// de ltar dge
slong des bag yodapa la gnas pa'i lhade rnams nyin gcig bzhin srid pa'i cho rab tulephal bar byed ba'i bag med pa rnams mthong nas snying rdzabar byed do// de nas lha rnams kyang lha mo'i tshogs
00dang lhan cig tu tshal du bas 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs g.yar ba la mo dang/ glu dbyangs dang/ gad mo sna tshogs 'don pas lo ngas su bskor ba bde bar gnas pa rnams
skad mos tshal du dga' sod byed du dong sa/ kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bsko nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin du 'gro/ kha cig ni gzhal med khang bya ngang pas btog ba rnams kyis 'gro/ kha
tsogani grogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal mang khang rnams kyis 'gro/ kha cig ni lha mo' tshogs de dag nyid kyis bskor nas rkang bas 'gro ste/ bde bar gnas bde rnams glu dbyangs len zhing lus
ngal ba yod pa de thams cad tshul du bas 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dod par byed do// de nas tshal den lcagazhan sngar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyis lhagazhan de dag mthong nas/
da nas yang rab tu dga' sto/ yid shin tu mgu bar gyur to// de nas lha gsar du 'angos ba rnams dang/ lha ring pa rnams phan tshun 'dres nas/ bo dang rol mo'i sga skyes te/ rab tu dga'/
zhing nyams dga' bskus so// du bas 'khrigs pa'i tshal de kun sgyu rnam pa du mas kun tu gang ste/ 'di lta ste/ gling bu'i sgra dang/ pi wang gisgra dang/ rdza de'i sgra dang/ 'khar rnga'i
sgra dang/ lha mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'i sgra dang/ de bzhin du de na glu dbyangs dang/ dgod pa'i sgra dang/ chu bo dang/ mtsho dang/ chu mang po rnam ba sna tshogs 'bab pa'i dang/ rin po che'i
bya kha dog dang dbyibs rnam ba sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i sgra dang/ lha rnams kyi glu dbyangs kyi sgra thos nasnyan pa dag ste/de ltar tshal de sgra snyan pa kun gyis gang ba yin no// tshal/
1dan lha'i sman dang/ bya dang/ klu dang/ lteng ka dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor ba dag gis lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi dga' slong byas nas

bde ba nyams su myong ngo// de rnamos tshal de nas kyang nas yang lhan po so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ri'i rtse mo ga labader lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs subaskor nas 'dong bar byed de/ lhade rnams der

oM/ 'dong ba naso sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mo dir lhags so// lca'i ba rdzing dang/ lteng ka dang/ nye ba'i tshal phunasumatshogs ba dad ldan pa'i lhun po so sor snang ba ri'i rtse mo de na/rgyal bo chen po 'phagasaskyes
bo lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba gnas te// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don sgrub cing/ mi'i 'jig rten na chos dngachos kyis bskyed ba'i mi chos dang ldan pa ni ji tsam bsad yod/chos dang mi ldan
panitsam zhig yod/'jig rten la phan par sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod/ phan par mi sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod/ dam pa'i chos kyi mthu che'am/ chos ma yin pa mthu che/ bdud kyi phyogs lha ma yin

brtan ba dang/ klurab 'joms la sogs pa thu cho'am mi che zhes rtog par byed de/ da ltor skye dgu rnams skyong ba de'i kun snang de la gnas so// ri'i rtsa mo de dang ha cang mi tab lab kyi ngos la nyi ma
'khor bar byed de de'i 'od la rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes po de tshos da lta'i [']kyi debalagis 5 skye na du nyi 'a rong gtong zhig gu zhes dpyod par byed do// nyi ma 'khor ba'agazhi

la mkhas pa de nyimal rtog ba'abyed de/gal te chos dang ldan pa'i mi chos rjesasu skyong babyung ba ltar tsho de bzhin du nyi ma chos kyis yongs su rgyus ba yin te/ de ltar mdog gsal ba nyid dang/ dus dang
'thun par lhan nor 'char la/de las mi rnams kyi lus la ni nang ma 'byung zhing/ 'bru rnams la nga nad mi 'byung ngo// gal te chos nga la ldan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug ba byung na/de'i tshe nyi ma'i
'od chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par lhan naram 'char te/ de las chos ma yin pa'i mo zu des 'bu rnams mi dang nyams par 'gyur ro// de ltar 'di dag thams cad ni rtos dang chos ma yin pas
byas pa'i dbang gi 'bras bu yin te/ rgyu med pa las ni ma byung ngo// ri di'ang nyi ma'i 'od dang 'brunabs so sor snang ba zhes ming du btags te/ rgyal bo chen po 'phags skyes bo de dag la gnas
nas 'jig rten la rtog par byed do// khong dgachags spyod kyi lha de rnams so sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mor dong nas yid rab tu dga' la/ gsal ba de mthong nas kyang brgya 'gyur du yid rab tu dga' ba
skyes so// 'phags skyes pos 'jig rten de dag mngon par brtags shang rang gis byas pa'i las des/ lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad kun nas brgya 'gyur du gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong ba dang/
'jig rten skyong ba 'phags skyes bo de yid rab tu dga' nas/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/rgyugasum rnam gsum las byung ba// legs byas rnam gsum byas pas na///
'bras bu chu gsum lon tanagasum// gsum gnas sa ni gsum du gnas// khyed rnams chos la mchog tu gzhol// 'tshab yod pa'i sbyin mchog dang// bdon dang bzod dang dul dang ldan// thams cad mtho
sa gnas su lhags/ lha la gnas na lha gang dag/ lha yi rgyan dang lha yi 'phreng// phun sum tshogs pas brgyanab rnams// dga' bar byed ba 'di dag dge khag med dge ba'i skya bo gang//
dge ba spyod par mi byed b// chos la rnam bar rmongs pa de// mtho ris dag tu ga laskya// legs par byas pas mi dag 'dir// lus can rnams ni sku gyur te// lasakyi rnam smin de yis ni// lha yi
khul du de dag skyes// gang zhig bdag nyid dga' 'gyur zhing// gang zhig blo gros bder gnas ba// lha yi yul du sku 'gyur ba// de ni bsod nams chen po khyod// chung dang 'bring dang bder gnas ba//
lha rnams kyi ni bde chen gong// 'di ni chung dang 'bring dang che'i// bsod nams kyi ni 'bras bur mngon// lus can gang gis ji tsam du// bsod nams kyis ni rnam pa byas// rnam ba de tsam de'i bde
ba lha yis 'jig rten rnams su smin// de ltar 'phags skyes po des/ lha de dag mthong sa tshigs su bcad de smras nas/ de dag nyid dang lhan cig 'thun par dga' ba byed de/ri dang donags tshal dang/

0 lteng ka dang/ tshal dang/ lha'i ma tog dang/ 'bras bur ldan pa'i sa phyogs dang/ bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa dang/ kun nas lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba dang/ ri mthon nga nyams dga' ba dang/ dbang

po drug bde bar byed pa rnams su/dbang bo drug don la chags pa bag med par gnas pa'i lha de rnams sil snyan lan lag lnga dang ldan bas mngon par dga' bar byed cing/ pad+ma'i tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal

dang/ chang nultar 'bab pa dang brtum+ma'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/ chumig gis brgyan pa/ phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rnams jisrid du 'dod pa sdug ba yid du 'ong ba legs bar byas pa'i las de zad pa'i
ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do// de zad nas de nas yang lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i
nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mo rnams dngaskal mnyam bar mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par mang du sla ba nor mang ba dang/
ded dpon chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam bar smin pa shesal de lho pi wang can gsum ba rnams kyi gnas la rtog bar byed de/ dus
thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas de dag gi gnas 'bor dang spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i
rgyu (shes bas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing/ soms kyi rgyud sems bas bsgoms pa gang gis sbyin pa khyen/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ chos mnyan pa byas
ba'i sbyin bdag de la lag na sbyin pa po grogs su gyur pa gzhan zhig/ des snying brlanacing dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ dad pas sa mas brlan ba/ 'di ltar ya nga sems la rtog par byed de/ sbyin bdag
'di nibasod nams dang ldan pa zhig go/ dbadag la'ang rdzas kyi rnam pa de snyad yod na/ de ltar bdag gis kyang gzhan dag la sbyin par bya'o snyam sems na/ sbyin pa lags ms pa dad pa des/ de 'dus/

dang bral nas bde 'gro ma blo ras kyi 'jig rten 'khor dang spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang yul du mas snying rab tu myos pa rnams rtag tu ldan par 'gyur te/ sal sAn

sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa'i ba'i tshal dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ nor bu'i lan kan bres pa'i rdzing rnams na gsor kyi pad+mas khebs pa dang/ bya'i tshogs kyi rnam pa sgra 'byin pa'i tshal dang/ nya ba'i tshal de

rnams na/ bya myos pa sgra 'byin ba nyams paga' bar byed la/ kha cig ni shing ljonapa tshang tshang dag gi nang na khu byug dang/ rma bya sgra snyan pa chags su rung pa 'byin pa rnams na lha mo ngag dang lhan
cig dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni bad+ma'i tshal sdong bunabi shun/ 'dab ma ni gsar/ za ba ni rdo rjer 'dug pa rnams kyi nang m dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni rgun chang gi tshal rnams na 'bras bu
na phan gyis myos pa'i lha mo yul la rnam par chags pa rnams dang lhan cig rgun chang 'thung bar byed do// kha cig ni'i zim bo DA 'i rdos gcal bkram pas rnam par phye ba'i sa phyogs rnams
na dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni ci'i thom mu men gyis gtams pa'i chu gtsang ma dri ma med pa 'bab pa'i chu bo rnams kyi nang na sdug pa dag dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni 'bab stegs

dang sa gzhi mu tig gi bye ma brdul ba dag na chu bsil la dang zhing gtsung ste dri ma med pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do// kha cig na ni bo che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i yang thog nam mkha' la thug
pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan bas dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dril

bu g.yogala'i sgra drag tu khrol bas mdzes pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do// kha cig ni dus tshigs drug gi tshal/ shing ljon pa dag dang nye bar rtag tu dga' la yar gyur pa rnams kyi nang na snying du
sdug cing 'dod ba rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// khacig sa phyogs gsar btso mas brgyan pa dang/ ri bo'i zom gyi stang du 'tshogs nas sa phyogs kyi chu bo rnams la'ang lta bar khyad de/
doltar rang gis las kyis sprul pa'i lha'i bde ba dpa mad pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo// de ltar sred pa la rnam bar chags pa'i lha rnams kyi mig gzugs dang kha dog 'dod ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba
@#// rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so// rnab lang yul bde ba/ sgra snyan ba/ gsal ba/ yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so// sna yang yul
/bde ba/ dri zhim pa/ bsrung che ba/ yid du 'ong ba rnam ba du ma rag gse mchog mngeshes so// lci yang yul bde ba/ rozhami pa/ bo chog/ yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes
so// lus kyang yul bdo ba/ reg bya 'dong ba/ 'jam pa/ yid du 'ong ba rnam ba du ma dag gis chog mi shes so// yid kyang yul rtog pa mdab/ 'dod pa/ sdug ba/ yid du 'ong ba rnam pa/
dum dag gis chog mi shes te/ de ltar dbang po drug bo yul la chags pa'i lha rnams chog mi shes pa yin no// ji ltar yul rnams kyis sred pa spel ba de ltar 'bal bar 'gyur te
'bar ba bzhin la/ de'ang yul gyi bde ba ji ltar dmigs ba de ltar rnam pa dumar 'thal bar 'gyur ro// sred pa des bsgribs pa'i lha chog mi shes par gyur ba rnams shin tu bde ba'i mthar dmigs
su med de/ de ltar ji srid du 'dod pa stag ba yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ lha'i bod ba dpa med pa rnam pa du ma myong// de phyis lha'i 'jig rtenades
'chi bar 'gyur te/ gis kyang rang giso byas pa'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang/ mi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i
nang du skyes na de las de dang rgya 'thun bar tshogs gcig tu spyod pa rgyamatshe'i tshong pa 'am/ tshong rdal du gnas pa 'am/ ri bo'i bar na gnas par 'gyur la/ gnyan cha ba dang 'brel ba dang/
dgar gnas pa dang/ rgyal po la rag las par mi 'gyur ba dang/ shin tu'abyor pa dang/ rang dbang du 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam
par smin pa shes pa de lhapi wang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog ba byed de/ sa thos pa las byungapa'i shes pas lhade rnams kyi gnas skyil mo krung gi steng du skyes zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug ba mthong
ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis sku bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags nasnying rje dam pa dad ldan pa gang gis sems can chus khyer ba 'am/ lonyis byung
nas ltogs te srog chad la thug pa la byams pas bats+tshon pa'i yid kyis/ bu bzhin skyong bar byed cing dgos pa med kyang sems pas bsgoms pa'i snying khe nas yang dag par bskyabs na de lus dang srol
nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten skyil mo krung du gnas ba'i lha rnams kyi nang na rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro// den lha dang lha mo gnas la/ lha gzhan yang phyogs gzhan n lan cig nye bar gnas te/

lha'i bu de lha de'i skyil mo krung bcas pa'i stong du skyes so// de la lha de bu'i blo skyo lo lha mo de'ang de bzhin du bu'i blo skyo'o// de nas lha'i'adebang de gnyis la pha ma'i blo skye'o// de dag dang lha'i bu de nyid
[w ]/dang rtse bar byed de/ ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na me shin tu dga' ba rtse ba de ltar de dag kyang lha'i 'jig rten na/ lha dang skyil mo krung gi steng na gnas ba de dang rtse bar byed do// 'di
ltar bu khyod bdag cag gi khur gyur ba 'di 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te/ khyodabadag cag gis lha'i tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ lteng ka thams cad bde ba bskyod par bya'o// mi'i zim dang/ gsar

gyi lcag ma'i dra ba bres pa dang/ mtsho'u dang/ 'bab chu phun sum tshogs pa dang/ lcag ma'i khyim phun sum tshogs pa dang/ pad+ma'i rdzing rnams dang/ gser gyi pad+mas khobasangashing bung bas mdzes pa dag

chu dang ba dang ldan pa dang/ chang chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang/ rgun chang re ma po sna tshogs kyis rgyags pa skyed par byed pa'i mtho ris thams cad du khyod dang lhan cig dga' bar byas te/ der khyod dang bdag cag
lhan cig dga' bar bya'o// nas lha'i bu des pha ma de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la yab yum gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu stsal ba gang lags pa de na bdag bde 'gror skyes pa 'bras bu mchis so//
khadag kyang yab yum la zhus bar bgyid pa dang/ gus bar mnyan par bgyi'o// de nas lha de yid rab tu dga' nas/ lha'i bu de blangs te/ lha mo de dang lhan cig 'dzam bu na da char 'bebs zhes bya ba'i
tshal der 'dong bar byed do// lha de'ang lha mos bskor cing/ lha'i bu de'ang de dag thams cad dang 'dzam bu na dachar 'bebs kyi tshal der 'dong ba dang/ tshal de 'dzam bu pa'i shing ljon pa thams cad

dang / me tog gi tshogs 'phyang ba dang/ kha cig 'bras bu'i tshogs 'phyang ba rnams kyis khebs pa yin no// me tog gi shing ljon ba gang yin pa de dag ni shin tu dri zhim pa dpag tshad lngar 'byung ba'i
ma tog kha dog dbyibs sna tshogs dag 'thor bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon bo dang/ ser bo dang/ ljang khu dang/ mar bo dang/ btsod kha dgage/ dbyibs stsa tshogs pa dag ni 'jog pos/
ltar zlum pa dang/ ring po dang/ gru bzhi dang/ lha'i dga' ba dang 'thun pa'i rnapa'i gong rgyan dang gdub kor 'gran pa lta bur gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas lha des/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad smras
so []bu 'din 'dzam bu chu bo rab 'bebs zhes bya ba'i tshal yin l/ tshal 'din dga' dga' ltar me tog rgyas ba yin te/ shing ljon ba phan tshun rlung gi shugs kyis skyod pa dang/ lca'i tshogs
thams cad la 'thor bar byed do// bu der khyod dang bdag cag lhan cig dga' bar byos shig/ rtsis shig/ dga' mgur spyod par gyis shig/ bu khyod kyang lha mo'i tshogs snying du sdug cing mdzes

ba dang ldan pa rtag tu yid du 'thad ba rnams dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro// de skadasmras nas tshal der yang thams cad rtso ba'i don du 'jug bar byed de/ tshal de nalha'ibya 'bod ba zhes bya bas lha'i bu
gang yin pa de dag la'adi ltar tshigs su bcad de smas ba/ bzang po khyod ni legs bar byon// khyod kyis legs byas byas dang ldan// tshul khrims rnam pa bdun bsrungs pa// de yi 'bras bu
'dir 'ongs so// tshul khrims 'bras bu bde ba ni// lha yi 'jig rten rnams su smin/ sgrol bar byed pa'i tshul khrims kyis// 'khor ba 'di las sgrol bar byed/ rgyu
tshul khrims chun rnam dag pas// sems brtan gang zhig 'khru bar byed// 'dzam bu gser gyi mi tog gis// lha yi yul du de ba khru ko/ tshul khrims sa bano bsrung nas su// tshul khrims/
sna tshogs rnams la ni// 'di ltar lha li yul rnams kyis// khyod ni rtse zhing spyod pas byed// mi kang rtag tu yid dul zhing// tshul khrims kyis ni brgyan pa rnams/ gang na bde ba
zhi mtha' yas pa/ lha yi gnas su bde 'gro'o// legs pabya ba byas pa'i mi// ba de la bde ba mchog tu 'gro/ tshul khrims kyis ni yongs sngal rnams// lha yi gnas na rtse bar byed//
tshul khrims skas la 'dzegs pa yi// ma rnams bde 'gror rab tu 'gro/ shes bas yongs su spel ba rnams/ (yo shes kyis ni mkha' lagazhol// du bas tshul khrims rtag bsrung
zhing/ sbyin shes dka' rtsub nor rnams kyis// dug dang mtshon dang ma lta bu// tshul khrims 'chal pa rtag tu spongs// de ltar tshul khrims legs bsrungs pa// mi ni bzang 'gror
khrid bar byed/ bde gnas 'thob bar bya ba la// tshul khrims lta bu gang yang med// de ltar bya 'bod pa po de rnams kyis lha'i bu de'i sems la gzung du rung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams
[//]kyis mngon par dga' khar byas shing rjes su dga' bar byas pa dang/ lha'i bu de'i bya'i glu dbyangs de dag yid la bzungs nas rjes su dga' bar byed do// rjes su ka'u bar pas sa/ 3
de nas yang pha de dang lhan cig tshal der 'jug par byed do// de nas dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshal de nyi ma ltar gsal zhing rnam par mdzes pa// 'khum
phrag du ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig ba de na/ 'bab chu dang ldeng kas brgyan pa/ ba zlurla dang dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang nye bar mdzes par byas pa 1 nyams dga' ba rnam pa du ma de dag
mthong nas/ lha'i bu skyes nas yun ring du ma len pa de shin tu dga' ba dpachod po thob bo// de nas de'i bar skabs su tshal de na rnam par rgyu ba na lha mo khyim thab sha sta/ yun ring du ma len pa
gzhan dag gis mthong ngo// de nas lha mo'atshogs de dag gis lha'i bu gsar du byung ba'al chung ma med par yang rig/ de byadagazugs dang ldan par yang mthong nas/ dgod par byed//
rtsa bar byed/ brtag par byed/ bro gar byed cing 'ol mo'i sgra dang/ sil snyan dang bcas pa thams cad lha'i bu de'i drung du rgyug bar spyod do// lha'i bu yang pha ma dag bor nas/ 'dod bag

bsgribs ba'i yid kyis lha mo de ngagag la 'khod pa der rgyug par byed do// de nas de dag phan tshun mthong nas/ lha de dang lha mo de dag dga' ba skyes shing bde ba dpa mang pa nya thar skyes so// phan
tshun dga' ba skyes pa de rnams kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas ji ltar bde ba sna tshogs la gnas ba'i lha gzhan dag dga' ba byed pa de ltar dga' bar byed de/ ri/
po[/ ]dang / nags tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ sbug dang/ gser btso ma'i khrom dang/ mu tig gi bye ma brdal ba dang/ dngul gyi rdo dang/ lha'i pas rdzing
khebs pa dang/ bya sna tshogs sgra sAn pa 'byin pa dang/ chubo dang/ 'bab chu dang/ lteng kas brgyan pa rnams su lhamo de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa
de ri nas ri dang/ gyad mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de/ de ltar ngo mtshar gyis sems basgribs pa de/ lha'i 'jig rten rmad du byung ba mthong nas/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug
pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zang par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do// de nas de'i tsho las zad pa dang/ lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur to/
shi nas kyang las nyobar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i nang du skya bar 'gyur ro// gal ta mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/
de las de dang rgya'athun par rgyal po 'am blon po chen por 'gyural/ skye bo thams cad dga' bdang/ byad gzugs bzang bo dbaldan pa dang/ yon tan dang ldan par gyur ba mthong
nga[;]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de ltabal can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/
lcapa wang can gsum pa'i gnas spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug ba mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des blos ba las byung ba'i shes pas
brtags na/ legs par byas pa'i las ji ltar yodapa bzhin spyad pa/ sems can dag 'dzangs te 'thab pa las/ tshal khang stag po'i nang du song nas/ srog la the tshom za ba'achi ba la
thug pa dag thar par byas shing/ sems can la phan pa'i sams dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu bsdams pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi tshul khrims sbyong na/ de lus dang

bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten spyod pa dang ldan par gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// ra skyes nas kyang zla ba'i 'od dang tshungs pa de/ kun nas gzi brjodi na 'bar/ dbang

bo dul ba'i bde ba dang ni ldan/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin du ni rtsi/ lhamo'i tshogs du ma dang ni nye bar spyod/ lha'i 'phreng ba dang gos ni gyon/ yang dang yang du 'jo sgrig

na byed/ tshal dang/ nyi ba'i tshal dang/ 'bab chu'i dngo mang po rnams su ni rtse sto/ de ltar de rtsa ba na/ shel gyi tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed do// tshul de ni shel gyi shing ljon pa thams
