lha'i bdunas tshes bzang dag tuso so'akhod de/'di ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnamos dang lhan cig gang na bzhugs zhes dpyod bar byed de// de nas de ltar b rgya byin lha'i stan la 'dug cing/ lha'i tshogs

kyis lo ngos su bskor la/ gzi brjid 'bar ban/lha yul gyi deb deb med pa dum dang ldan b rlung dang bo nas mthong ngo// de mthong nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mas brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed// don gnas /

kyang brgya byin la gsong por smra ste/ lha'i stana mchog tu nyams dga' ba bzang bo la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas yang stan mchog tunyamos dga' ba bzang po de dag las langs te/ brgya byin ga lab

la legs su phyogs nas 'dug ste/brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon bar brtson zhing chos la dga' ba/ mar 'dzin

ba dang dbang 'dzin pa dang/ go sbyong du 'dzan ba dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus bar brgyud kyis/ lha'i dbang po khyod dgyes par mdzad du gsol/de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin
gyis tshig de dag thos nas 'di skad smasaso// lha dag bdag ni dga' 'o// rgyal po chen khyod cag ni'ajig rten skyong zhing 'jig rten la phan par 'dod pa/ ban gdags par rab tu zhugs pa yin te/bdag
gi dga' ba yang thos sa khyed bde legs sugyur cig/ de nas 'dzam bu gling duchos dang mi ldan zhing chos ma yin pa'i rjes su zhugs zhugs pa ste de dag de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong

po7ba masabargya byin la sa bar byed de/ 'dzam bu'i ban mi chos dang mi ldan zhing chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mar mi 'dzin ba dang/ bar mi 'an pa dang/ dge slong du[ ]'dzan pa dang/ bram zer mi 'dzazhib
dang/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug ba dag mchis te/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'ga' la// ngal ba'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib bzhis bsad do// lha'i rgyal bo ngo gyis de thos nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha
skyo rnams dang sum cu rtsa gsum ba ji ltar phyogs pa rnams la bos nas sas pa/ lha ma yin bstan pa dang/ rab so la sogs pa dang/ klu chos ma yin b dang ldan pa ba 'joms la sogs pa sa'i 'og nas

langs te bdag cag la g.yul 'gyed du 'ong gis/ lha khyed rnams chos shig/ n gnas brgya byin gyi bka' de mnos nas/gang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams brgya byin gyis sa shin tu rings par lag cha dang/mtshon cha sna

tshogs sdam bzhin thogs te/ri bozla ba zhes bya ba'i ri gal ba dong 'dong bar byed do// de nas 'jig rten skyong ba de rnams dong ba dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis ni skor/ lha'i 'phrod ba

dang gos ni gyon/lang tshol bab pa'i gzugs rgyan sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan/ lha mo rnams ni rjes su 'brang zhing lha'i tshog sakyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig thams cad mngon par 'byor ces bya ba gal ba

da' dong bar byed de/ skyed mos tshal gang yin ba de ri rab dang sgra lta bur cung zad 'dra ba'i dper byan/'di ltar zla ba rgyusar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu dang/ nyim gza'i tshogs kyis bskor pa mi

mthun par mthong ba lta bu dang/ ri rab gsar gyir stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang/ shing lcen pa lha'igaser dang dadapal dang/ po rlu dang/ mkhyen ka dang pad+ma dga'i mdog lta burnams kyis nye bar mdzes par

byas pa'i skud mos tshal de lham tog gis mdzes par byas shang/ bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor la/ sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa lha'ipa'i rdzong rnams kyis mdzes pa 'byas pa yin no// lha'i rgyal bo brgya

byin gyis klong po che'i rgyal po sa srubs kyi bu zhes bya ba skyed mos tshal chen po rin rdzong de dag snga ma bzhin yod pa'i nang na ba lang tsho dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/gsar dang phyi ma'i bar 'i 'dam bu'i nang na bal glang

mo dang lhan cig rtse zhing yul der 'gro bar byed do// lha'i rgyal po brlabyin lha'i tshogs dang/ lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba ltar/glang bo'i rgyalapo de la padolta bu yin la/pad+ma gses

btso ma lta bu dang/ nam mkha' la kim chum phrag 'char ba lta bu'i 'od bzang po 'char ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa der/de dga' bar byed/yongs su spyod bar byed/rtsed mo byed/ dud 'gror gyur

kyapalha'i bde ba myong ba yin no// des lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin der song nas lag gnyis kyis byugs shing phyi bdar byed la/ kyi bdag gi glang bo che'irgyal po 'gayul 'gyed pa la rags pa yin te/lha dang lha
ma yin 'thab pa'i tshe/'di'i steng nas bdag rgyal ba thob be// de nas glang bo tsha mchog phyi bdar byas nas/ skyang mos tshal thams cad 'byor ldan na/ khang pazungs mya ngan bral zhes bya

ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed/chu'i zam pa lta bu skas de las 'dzugs nas/ ra lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor to 'jug par byed do// der zhugs nas lha'il po de lha mo bye ba phrag dgu'i mdun na rtogs

ba bar byed/ dga' bar byed do// lha'i rgyal bo de rnams dang lhan cigalha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas rtse bar byed/ga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod bar byed do// lha'i rgyal po rang

gi las dang 'thun par longs spyod 'byor te/ lha de dag dang lha'i rgyal bor ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa dang/ so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rnam par smin//

bad ba so so yang dag par myong nga 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di ltar skyed mos tshalabasad kyis nga rgyan pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos 'brang gi skyed mos tshal de na bde ba kun dang ldan zhing/ lha'i

zla tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo rnams kyis rtsi bar byed/ dga' bar byed do// de dag phyis lha'i'adunas chos bzangams 'chingar 'gyur te/shi nas kyang ji ltar las de dang nye

bar 'gro zhing myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dung 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/de las de dang rgyu 'thun
par mchog tu bde ba dang/ rig pa'i blo dris med pa dang/ phan tshun gyi gtsogs/grongag gtso bo 'am/ yul gyi gtso ma/ grong khyer gyi gtso bo 'am/phan tshun gyi gnyen 'dab dang/ rtsa lag dang/ bde bar

lcan cig 'khod par 'gyur ro// lha'i rgyal po de ni ngan song gi sgo bcad ba yin te/ lha de dag gi 'chi'apho ba la mngon par brtags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ sa gang yin b de dag gis// tshal

nipad+masna tshogs dang// rtsing mo mchog nyams dga' dang// rin po che dang ldan pa dang// mtsho dang 'bab chu rin po che'i// rdob sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ljon shing me tog sna tshogs dang// bya ni sna tshogs

ga gis khengs// gsar la gabyas pa'i dbag bsam shing// kha cig dri mdapi cha na// dngul dang gsar ni gtso ma yin// tshal ni rnam par 'dres babaskyod// bung ba rnams ni sgra 'byin bas// pad+ma rdzong ni rnam
par mdzes// khang bzangs mchog ni nyams dga' zhing// rin po chani cha dang ldan// ma par brgyan ba nyams dga' sto/ lha 'os pa thams cad yod// de dag thams cad dbazhin 'jug/ skyo bo rnams ni

lo ngos su 'gyur// kye ma srid pas bslus pa yin// lha rnams kun gyi bde ba ni// sgyu ma chu bur dbu ba dang// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu yin/ srog la dugadang ma 'drab// 'jig rten 'jig pa'i phyir gnasato//
grong ba'i mtsho ni'akhyag byed cing// skyakho yaM kun 'jig par byed// 'dod pa longos pos chog mi shes// bde ba 'dod pas chog mi shes// 'chi ba'i mi yis rnam bsregasal// lha tshogs do dag ga las
longs srad 'jis 'jig rten gzings pa rnams// ye nas ngan te 'phags pa min// gang gis rnam par rmos pa'i lha// 'ching yi ni dbang du song// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
gnod sbyin sems can dmyal ba klu// 'chi ba'i zhags ba mi bzad bas// thams cad dbang med 'grobar 'gyur// khams gsum pa ste 'di dag kun// 'chiba'i zhags pas sprul gyur kyang// srid pa'i rmos

bas rmongs pa rnams// dbang mdo mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltabargya byin gyis rtag tulhade rnams kyi skyo ba dang/ gzhan mi rtag pa 'chi ba dag mthong nas/ lha dag shin tu goms pa bya ba'i tshigs su bcad de sus

pa/ 'byung po kun la phan bzhed pa// bcom ldamatsho lta phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis sra ba dug 'dra 'di// 'jig rten ba la mang du gsungs// mdor na shes dang shes bya dag/ de yis 'di kun thugs su chud//
gis deng shes bya ma rtogs par// gsum pa dmigs ga mi 'gyur ro// 'din mi rtag sdugabasngal stong/ byed pa po yang sangs pa yin// de nyid lam ni rnam ston pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'khor bar gsung/

doltar dbad bo de phyag rgya 'dis btab pa'i yid dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bstod nas de nas yang lta'abang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed de/ de ltar de lha'i bde ba thams cad myong ba
de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin bshes pa ngos sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas
sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// sems can dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des bros ba las byung ba'i shes/
bas brtags na/ 'di ltar gang gzhan gyis gsod pa po dag nyim gcig tsam du srog gcod pa spang ba'i tshul khrims srung du bcug la/ 'khor ba lasaM thar par 'dod pa rnams ma byin par len pa dang/

rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs nas 'bras bu chung du 'gyur ba ya nga spong du 'jug na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang ma gro ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// gnas mtho

ba de yang ri rab kyi stong namaglob yin la/khyod cag gi las sna tshogs snang ba bzhin gsar dang dngul gyi bkra bas phyu ba yin no// lha rnams mtho ba'i gnas der 'dzags nas/ ri rab kyi drung thams cad lta
bar byed do// gsar dang dngul las byas shing/ bi glu bkra bas rnam par phye ba rnam pa du ma la lta bar byed do// lha'i drang ba dang gos gyon pa rnams gserakyis brgyan pa'i sa gzhi rnams la dga' la

byed/ longs su sbyong bar byed la/ lha mo'i tshog sasna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing sdug pa dang lhan cig bi zurma'i tshal dang/ taba'i tshal rnams su dga' par byed/ yongs su spyod bar byadado// der
de dag girtag tubazo' ba dang btung pa chu bo ltar 'bab lta/ 'di lta ste/ nub ri nam zhes bya ba dang/ chu bo shugs chen 'babaces byang dang/ chubo dga' bcas zhes bya ba dang/ chu bo dga' bcas re
zhes bya ba dang/ nubo brtsigs ba 'bagos khyab dang/ chu bo shugs 'phrang zhes bya ba dang/ chu bo stong 'bab ces bya ba dang/ chubo gar dgar 'bab ces bya ba ste/chu bo de dag ni myos

ba'i skyon dang bral zhing btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab tu 'bab pa yin no// ro sna tshogs dang mdog sna tshogs yod pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/'o ma'i mdog dang/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog dang an da la
gyi mdog dang 'thun pa dang/ bzhurma'i mdog dang/ gser gyi mdog ltar sor ba dang/ kha cig mdog 'dres pa dang/ chu shin tu dri zhim zhing brtan pa dag tu khyad par 'phags pa yang 'bab bo// gzhan yang

! bzang bar dang/ dri dang/ mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ste/'di lta ste/ nga' kha ra 'dra ba dang/ lha'i dri dang/ mdog dang/ mdog skya bo dang/ ro ji ltar 'dod pa dgas/ lha rnams ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du

bza' ba rnams kyi ro de dag kyang de ltar 'gyur ro// tshal dang/ nags tshal sna tshogs dag me tog dri zhim po rnams kyis nyapar mdzes par byas shing/ bya kha dog sna tshogs dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis
mdzes bar byas pa yin te/de dag sa'i phyogs nyams dga' ba der lha dang lha mo'atshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dang/ bro gar sna tshogs rnams kyis rtse bar byed/dga' bar

byed yongs su spyod par byed de// de tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ shing sa la'i tshal dang/ shing sa la chen po'atshol dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i shing ljon pa'i tshal dang/ ma tog rtag tu yod/

0 ba'i tshal dang/ rlung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bde bar 'bab pa'i tshul te/ tshal dga' bde rnams ni/ gsar gyi lcags phyung bas na mdzes/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas na dkrigs/bya 'bum stangasgra phyin pa/

dga' ba lha'idabang po 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i bde ba dag gis lha rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed do// phan tshun grogs su gyuracing phan tshun longs spyod pa gcig bu don du byed ba/nad dang mya ngan dang bral ba/ bkres

ba dang skom pa dang bral ba/lus ngal ba dang bral ba/ 'tshol ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ ci dgar spyod pa la rtsonob/ci dag rgyu ba/ ci dgor bar gnas pa dag tshal gyi nang dang/ sbyong chos tshal dang/ bad+ma'i

tshal dang/ mthong na yid 'phrog rnams su dga' bar byed do// mthong na gnas ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas tsham pa'i lha rnams 'od ni rang gi 'od la/ lus ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin phra'i dang/ sbom pa dang/
mang par bsgyur ba/ci dgar 'gro ba/ gar gar 'gro ba/ rang dgar 'gro ba/ gang 'thob par 'dod pa de 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ thob nas kyang sus kyang mi 'phrogs la thob nas de'i dbang du gyur ro// mtho

ba'i gnas ni gonas bar gyur pa'i lha de rnams la bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang yodape/ rang gis legs bar byas pa'i las rgyudang 'bras khas kun nas bslang bas rjesrid du 'dod cing sdug la yid du 'ong ba leg
bar bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims srog gcodapa dang/ ma byin par len pa spangs pa zabar ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshigs sgoms dang dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// der las zad nas lha'i
sa denas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas las kyis 'gro ba ji lta ba dang/ las la rton pa dang/ 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin skya bar gyur te/samag can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro/

rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par ri la gnas pa do rtag tu bder gyur zhing/ nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang/ rab tu bde ba dag/
mchog tu gzugs bzang bo dang/ 'jig rten gyi bar bzang por 'gro ba dang/ bsil ba'i nyiba'i tshal rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par

sminapa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas lha rnams kyi gnas ri rtse na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can
dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/gang bas lus kyitshul khrims rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba yin te/ srog chags bsad par chad ba dang/ bcings pa

rgyu thar par byas shing mthu rab tu chob gyur la/nus pa dang ldan pa zhogi lam du zhugs te bkres shing skom bzhin du bu ram shing gi lcam ra 'am/ rdza bu'i grong dag tuba'i bcud dam/ bu ram shing gi bcud ma byin par ma

blangasasems can gsad par bya ba dang/ ma byin bar blangs nas 'jigs te 'grel thar par byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang srol nas bde 'gro mtho risikyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas pa'i lha rnam

kyi nang du skye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de bde ba'i le ngas sdod du ma dang ldan zhing/ de lul chu bo lta bu du mas bdas ba yin la/ de la ya nga 'dod chags chu bo lta bu yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod
chags kyi nu bo dang/ rgyags pa'i grong dang/ mgu ba'i gling du chags pa dang/ kun dga'i chu mig dang/ kun tu rtog pa'i rlabs dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dridang/ rodang/ rog sdug pa'i bya dang/ lta

banu srin 'dzani khri kun tu 'khrugs pa dang/ rab tu thogs pa du ma ya yor 'grob dang/ tshal dang nye ba'i tshal chu yis bar khur ded pa dang/ phrag dog gi lA dang/ sngo ba chu las brgal bdang/ phul du mi'i 'i khrod

nas chu 'bab ste/ srod pa'i chu bo'i 'dam rdzab la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dag lasal rnams 'byung bar mi nus so// gzhan yang chu bo gang+ga'i 'ol gyi 'gram gyirlabs mi mngon pa ltar/ thog ma chod pa'i dus
nas rgyun shin tu'ang mor rab tu zhugs b/ 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs mang pa'i khoms na/ skyo ba dang/ nang dang/ na ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ rtsa sngags 'donopa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/

yid bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rlabs lta bu s khyab cing myur du 'gro ba'i sridapa chu klung lta bu de sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu yang yin la/ mi rnams kyis kyang chog bar 'dzani mi nus te/ de ltar sridapa'em pa chu

bo ltabus ri rtsa na gnas pa'i lha rnams rab tu bdas so// der lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ lci'o 'dod ba'i yon tan rtsa rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/ rtsi bar byed//
dga' mgur spyod par byed do// der tshal 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/ tshal rtag turab dga' zhes bya ba dang/ tshal rtag tu mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang/ tshal sprin ltar

dkar brtsegs zhes bya ba dang/ tshol konanas mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang/ tshal zlo ba dra zhes bya ba dang/ tshal gadz+hA'i stang durgyu zhes bya ba ste/ tshal 'di dag ni'i phyi na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yin no// tshal

da rnams kyi nang du lha dag bde ba du ma dang ldan zhing/ bud med kyi dga' ba rnams dang lhan rtse bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// btung ba'i chu bo rnams kyang 'di lta ste/chubo sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang/ chu bo

lag mgril gyis byug cing reg pa zhes bya ba dang/ chubo ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba dang// chu bo me tog ku mud dang/ ut+pa laskya zhes bya bas/chu bo do dag gi 'gram gnyis ka ril khebs pa yin no// dngul dang//

shel dang/ gsar gyi shing ljon pa 'bras bu dang ldan zhing ma tog dang ldan pa rnams kyis lha'i sa gzhi de dag nyams dga' bar brgyan pa'i sa gzhi der dge ba'i las sna tshogs dang/ las byas pa sna tshogs kun

nas bslang ba rnams kyis tshal de dag dang/ chu bo de dag dang/ sa gzhi de dag dang/ zas dang skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa de dag tu/ lha de rnams lha'i rol mo dang/ lha'i gnas chen po dang/ thags su btags ba

ma yin ba'i lha'i gos rnams kyis dga' bar byang do// lha de rnams rang las 'od 'byung la sha dang/ rus pa dang/ rnag khrag dang bral ba/ lus dang/ ga dang/ yid ngal ba dang dra ba/ lus dang yid rtag tu
kun nas dga' ba rnams ji srid du lus dang ngag gi 'dod pa sdug ba yid du 'ong ba/ shin tubasil po rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba/ mtho ris su skye ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i las ma
thad pa de srid du'agros 'chos shing dga' bar byed/ rtsa ba'i byed/ yongs su spyod bar byed do// de dag las zad de lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur la/ shi nas kyang las ji ltar byas ba bzhin
sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'grodang/ yi dgas rnams kyi nang duskyo bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba mi 'grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams kyin ng du skyes na/ de las de dang
rgyu ba thun par do rtag tu longs spyod can du 'gyur zhing/ rtag tu shes pa la dga' ba/ pad la dgod pa dang/ rtsa da mo dang/ rtse ba dang/ yul bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo/ de nas
yod dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan gang zhig yodasnyam nas/des thos pa las//

byung ba shes pas brtags na/blta na sdugana gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnasaji ltar 'dug b mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam nas/nges brtags na/ gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa/
'om sems can gzhan chus khyer ba 'amo/ mtshon gyisagasad par bya ba srog phyung zhing/ nor rdzas sam yang g da la mi lta batshanas phang ba ngo/ bkres pak+shi na 5 du 'gong ma da
ba la rab tu spro ba bskyod kyang len par mi byed/gzhan yang phyogs dben par phyin la 'tsho ba nyam nga bar gyur kyang 'bras bu dang/ rtsa ba dag ma byin pa lenapar mi byed cing/ tshul khrimA

dang ldan pa la gus par bslab pa'i gzhi rdul phra mo tsam ral ba la yang 'jigs par lta na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro grong khyer chen po blta na sdug tu skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer de rang dbag tshad khri yod la/
khyams khris legs par rnam par phye ba yin no// grong khyer de'i sa gzhi 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar las byas pa kun nas khang ba chen po bzumalas byas pa dang/ gzhan yang dngul las byas pa dang/ gzhan

yang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar las byas pa dang/ gzhan ya nga mgron ga sna tshogs las byas pa dang/ gzhan yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag gis bkra bar bya ba yin no// de dag gi srang yang kun nas

shin tu rnam par phye ba yin la/bzhi mdo dang/ ba ma dang/ sgo dang bu shu'i rtse mo dang/ khang bzangs kyis ris shin tu rnam par phyob yin no// khang pa de dag kyang nyi ma gang mod kyang sgron ma lta bur 'gyur

te ji ltar nyim mad na sgron mas gsal bar byed pa de ltar nyi ma med kyang/ khang pa'i mchog de rnams las de ltar 'od 'byung ngo// grong khyer de dag kun n tshal dang/ khatshalange rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa

yin te/tshal dang nye ba'i tshal kha cig bi shurma las byas pa dag la mu tig gi dra bas bres/kha cig gser gyi shing ljon ba dag ladongul gyi khrabs bres/kha cig dngul gyi shing ljon ba dag lags r gyi dril khug lor ba'i sgra
phaakhabyin kha cig gi bo tsho sna bdun gyi shing ljonapa'i dmos tshal bkra ba yin la/ gcig dpag bsam shing yin te/lha gang dag gi yid la bsamasab de tshul de dag la

dang pad+ma las byas pa yin te/de nags kyi blo rnams sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byil/gas ra gyi tshal gang yin b den dngul gyi bu rnams skad snyan ba 'byed cing rtse/mgron ka'itshalagang yin pa de na bya ba dga'i

mdog tu 'dug ba rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse gsar gyi tshul gang yin pa de bya lus sna tshogs 'dres nams skad snyan pa kun ri rtse ste de ltar grong khyer chen po legs par mthong nye ba'i tshal du gyur ba

rnams mdzes pa yin no// srung dang gsar gyi khang pa mdzes par byas pa gang yin ba de dag la dngul gyi kab dang/ tsit+taslar pishing ljonapa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin/gser gyi srang gang yin pa de dag la

bzhurma'i ka ba btsugs shing gsoragyi shing ljonab dang khang bus brgyan/srang dang khyim 'dres bas ches bar byas legang yin pa den bya gsar gyi mdog can yodade/grong khyer blta na sdug pa gang dang gang du snang ba

de dang de dab mod bar mthong ngo// grong khyer de yange kun gs tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par byas ba yin ta/'di lta ste/dra ba'i 'phrib dang/ shing chen bo dang/ 'od gsal ba dang/ mthong na dga' bas so//

tshal thams cad dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de/ tshal de thams cad na chu bo chen po khri yod pa/gsegyi bas khebs pa yin no// chu bo de dag shin tu nyams dga' ba yin zhing/ 'gramaganyis ka zhig pa
ched/de dag gsar dang dngul dang/ shel da dmar ril dang shing ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no//tshal chen po de dag bung ba 'dab ma nga sla la/lus dngul du/

'dug ba'i tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/ gang bung ba rnams kyi sgra snyan pa'i drung na'i gling bu'i sgras bcu drug char yang mi yod do// bo cha m+maTishing nab rnams la 'bras bu gsar gyi mdog can

'tsha shin tu dri zhim zhing khar sI ba bas ches lhag pa'iri dag bod la/ 'bras bu rnams dri gang yin b dpag tshad du 'byung ngo bya rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rgyags de yin la/de nas yang drigang yin pa desabargya gyur du

nyin tu rgyags par gyur// gsar gyi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de rnams la dngul gyi 'bras bu lha'i dri dang/ ma rig dang/ rolnga dang ldan pa dag 'byung/ shing ljon pa baiDUrma'i sdong bo dang/ gsar gyi' dbam bod

kha gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu kha dog sna tshogs yod pa dag 'byung ste/de ltar tshal kha dog rnam ba du ma/ rnam pasna tshogs dpo med pa gzhan dang mi 'dra bas grong khyer chen po blta na sdug yongs su bskor

nas rnam par gnas so// kun tu rtogaba'i ri mo bris pa ltar lha'i las rnam pa dum byas shing las rnamag du ma sna tshogs byas pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang sna tshogs su byung ba yin no// de ltar 'bras bu rgyu dang

thun par rgyu'i 'bras bu yin no// ji ltar sa bon gyi rnam pa ji sridi yod pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rnam pa yang byung bar gyur te/da ltar grong khyer blta na sdugan gnas pa'i lha rnams bde ba mang bo du ma dag gis

0 thogs pa yin no// grong khyer de ngob nyid kyis legs mthong nyid yin te/tshal khang bgrangs gser dang/ byu ru dang/ sug dgagis brgyan cing mdzes bar byas pa dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba sna tshogs kyi dkrigag/

gser gyi dril bu gter kha sgrasnyan pa 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa'i tshal nyapa'i tshal dang skyed mos tshal de dag tu blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer gyi gnas 'phan dang/ la mo dang/

sil snyan rtag tu sgra 'byin pa rab tu 'byin cing/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis kun tu gang ba de na btung ba dang 'brangang dgogis mdzes bar byas pa rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dge rlung gis

ba tu skyod do//yang rirab kyi stong gi grong khyer du lha'i tshogs bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dag gis kun tu gang zhing las che bo rnams kyis mdzes bar byas pa de na/'di ltar lhamathub tu re bamachod par 'os pa min po

'phrulatshol/skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod la rtag tu yid mi dga' ba/lha dang lha mo'atshogs 'bum phrag dums kun tu gang bas yu phrog gsum 'khodab rnams bar byin gyis ma lus bar yongs su shes so// gang

gitsho lha de rnams gal te lha'i grong khyer tshon so skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod de nas skyed mos tshal du dga' skyod byed du 'gro ba de'i tshilha rnams shing rta 'bum phrag dum rnams dang 'gro ste/lha de rnams 'gro ban/rgyal

mtshan dang/ ru mtshon sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas b shing rnamo ba sna tshogs dang/ kho dog sdug gu rnam pa snatshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs su 'dug pa bye ba phrag stongadakrigs pa rtagabyungo/
'di lta sta ]an las byas pa'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de la shing rta'i ma ra pad+ma rA ga las byas shing/ de la shing rta'i steng gi khang pa rin po che las byas/nga ni ga las

byas phyi rol khi klu las byas nas ri nagasar las byas la kun nas dril bu galar kha'akhrigs pa'i sgra byin pa yin no// de nas yang lha rnams gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan gyis 'grol byed de

'di lta ste/gang lta'i tshod bzhi gar las byas/ shing rta'i stong gi khang pa brla lasabyas/sa sa ni skyug las byas/mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs/ pha rol ni bo tshimargad lta bu las byas/ngos na byu ru las
byas srog shing ni dngul las byas ba yin no//kha cig shing rta'i mchog rnamakho gzhan gyis 'grobar byed/'di lta ste// kununas shing rta'i mda' gser las byas/ sanamu tig gis g.yogs sa'is ni

rAgs shin tu rnam par bya/srog shing ni dngulalas byas/ kun nas bya rus nimadzes par byas pa yin te/ shing rta'abum phrag mang po gsal ba mtshan nying dub song ba de dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas lo sasu
bskor ta/khum phrag rnam pa dumade rnams la lhadag nyid zhon nas tshol la'anyin bo di rnams ga lab der 'dong bar byed de/ rgyal mtshan la la de chu las byas/rgyalamtshan l gsar las byas/ yu dral la

dngul las byas/rgyal mtshan la la'i du ba pad+ma ga las byas/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ru mtshonal la'i mdog dum yod pa dag gis nam mkha' bar med par byas nas/skyod chos tshal du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/yid/

'og tu dga' bsu tshal chen po bzhi bo ga la ba der 'dodabar byed do// de ltar lha re rnams 'dong ban sil snyan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma sgra 'byin cing/ rol mo' sAnab sna tshogs phan tshun rtog par zhugs pa dag yod

de/gnetu bzang zhinganyams dga' ba'i khyad bar chob nano// jiltar las byas ba ngan pa dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po byas pa bzhin las bde ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa na dod par byed de/lha de rnams so so la lha mo'i

tshogs brgya'am/stong ngam/bum rnams gar byed/glu len/rab tu dgod cing lan khag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo'i snyan pa dang bcas pa rdzob pa zhes bya ba kun tugapazhing byed la lan bogi la dar 'dang bar byed do//

lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor tsang ldan par gyur pa'i lha mo de dag thams cad lha de rnams dang so so'i phrang nas de ltar brogar spyod/dgod par byed/rtsed mo byed do//'di ltar lha de rnams 'dod pa la rnam par zhen

bzhes bya bas dga' bar byed de/ lha'i sgra snyan pa tshang tshing gi nang na/ lha'i snyan pa de dang ga'angaga' gur 'gro ba'i lha de rnams lha'i dod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis de skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de/ lal

ma mkha' lasprin nag bo'agro ba lta bureb glu'i mdog can de rnams 'grobar byed/lha'i mchog de dag kha cig ni 'di ltar rgyan sna tshogs dang/ gos sna tshogs dang/ chabyang sna tshogs dang/ dga' pa'i gtam

sna tshogs kyis dga' gtam sla zhing nam mkha' khyab par byas nas tshalachen bog la ba der dong bar byed do// lha'i mchog gzhan kha cig ni gser gyi sa gzhi'i lam nas ba tu 'grol/ 'gro ba de rnams kyi shing
rta 'bum phrag du ma'i mu khyud kyis gser gyi rdul bslangs te/ nam mkha' khyab bar byas nas 'dug go/ gang gis nam mkha'ade skya bor byed kyang/ lha rnams la 'go bar mi byed la/ lha

gang 'chi ba dang nye bar 'gyur ba re rnams kyigadong ngam/gos de la ni 'go bar byed do// lha gang gzhan dag gis rdul de mthong nga 'chi ba'i ltas mthong la/de 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' med bar gyur pa man

pa ra mthong nas/desnying rje rje lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de s+sas nga/ bud shing lta bu'i yul 'byung dang/ mas bsregs lta bu'i 'chi 'gyur bog kham 'a dinas ni lha rnams dag/ khargya

'am yang na stong du 'dong// 'tshab gzhan gyis mthong 'gyur la// bdag nyid kyis ni ma mthongs// phyi nas nyon mongs phrod ba dang// bdag nyid kyis ni sdug bsnga larig// bag med pa dang 'dres pa'i soms//

lul la rtag tu mngon par dga'// lus can lhan cig skyes gnas ba// 'chi ba brtanapa mi ga go/ ga mod pa la mngon dga' zhing// bde ba nyams dga' byed po na// 'chi bdag sde yis 'di drangs pa// rab tu'adzom

sto dug dang 'dra// 'chi ba'i zhags pas bzungab yin// khyod la skyob pa byed mang do// sman dang sngags dang las mi skyob// de bzhin lha min lha me skyob// rdul rnams kyis ni gdong g.yog pa// bdag nyid kyis ni mi

rig ste// 'di ni 'chi ba'i ltayin// shi ba phyi nas thob bar 'ong// gang zhig bde ba'i don ma mthong// skye bo rtag tu brkam chags shing// sred pas ngomasaM na mo myong ba// glo bur du ni 'chi bar 'gyur// 'chi bas

[o/]btangab chen po 'di// khyod kyi bo nya dang bo ste// 'di yi 'og tu 'chi ba yang// shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/tshal nga nyaba'i tshal brgyanab// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu spyad// sems can ri bo mgade nas//

dbang med bcings te khrid par 'gyur//myos bas rtse bar gnas pa dag/ bde bas ngoms nimi myong zhing// rmongs nga srid pas ma ngoms pa// dbang modas stong ltung bar 'gyur// ji ltar rtagatumo dag las/ du

ba sngar ni 'byung 'gyur ba// de ltar 'chiba'i rtags byung ste// phyi nas 'tshib gnas par 'gyur// ngo ltar lha de dag bag med pa chung ba la gnas shing/ sems sngon nga ba'irtsa ba spyad pa la goms pa yin la/

lha de bar ched de mthong nas bdag nyid dang lha de rjesaM su ston par byed do// de ltar lha po'i gtam sla ba na shing rta la zhon pa/ shing rta sna tshogs la zhon zhing/ shing rta'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas dkrigs pa/lus

khyad du mas 'bar ba/ mig rgyas pa lta bur 'dun ba/lha'i drang ba dang gos gyon ba gsar btsoms rnam par brgyan pa/gang ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo stong snyad duphye mar glog cing 'ong ngo// de nas lha'i tshogs de rnam

rtogatsang 'ong ba na/de bzhin du la' ni nam mkha' la/la la nis la/la la ni bya'i shing rta rnams kyis/la la ni lha mo rang lhan cig glu len khro rung zhing 'ong ste/tshol dang nye ba'i tshal dedag lha'i pad+madang/ zhing ljon pa

dang chu bo dang/ bya dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ma tog dang/ rin po che sna tshogs dang/ kun nas mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i tshab dang/ 2ba'i tshalagyi phyogs ga la ba der 'dengobar byed do// blta na sdugan gnas pa'i lha

[n ]/ de rnams nga rta'i mchog de dag la zhon nas gser gyi shing ljon pa nyi ma lta bu med pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo// gang gzhan bar snang la sgrubade dag kyang bar snang de las babs nas skyed mos tshal/

ga la ba der 'dong ngo/ de ltar lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'dus nas sil snyan gyi sgra dang/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed yongs su spyod par byed de phan tshunagrogs su gyur cing/

ba phan tshun 'gyed pa dang/ phrag dog la skyo ba med pa rnams bro gar byed// dgod par byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// sil snyan lan 'dug lnga dang ldan ng la/ 'di lta ste/rgyud mangs dang/ rdzad ng/ sil

sgra dkrol dang/ gling bu'i sgradang/ glu ste/ rnam pa 'ang lngas kha zas chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang/ btung ba chu bo 'bab pa'i ngogs su lha dang lha mo'atshogs de dag phan tshun dga' zhing lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal der rtse sa/

zi nas le rgya dang/ gser gyi 'bras bu lo dang/ 'bras bu mdog dang/ dri zhim pa ro mngar ba/ spyang rtsa lta burnams kyis gzugs mdzes par byas pa yin te de shing ljon pa'i drung de dag tu 'ang 'dod pa nyams

dga' ba'i lha mo mdzes pa mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu'i sa skyes nas yun ring du dga' bar byed do// de nas de ltar bde ba la gnas shing rgyags pas myos pa'i lha dang lha mo'i

tshogs rnams bro gar dang/ klu dbyangs dang/ dgod pa'i sgra de dag thos shing/ gang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rjes su 'gro la phyibazhin du 'brang ba de rnams sgra de dag thos nas/ lha'i rgyal po brgyabyin ga la ba der

'dong bar byed do// de ltar de dag thams cad []rgya byin gyi drung dudong nas/ brgya byin la gsong por smras shing/ thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo gtugs te brgya byin la bsad pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ltar blta na sdug nags

pa'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du dga' sod bgyid du mchan/ lha'i dbang bo de dag mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas brgya byin de dag las tshag ngo bres nas/ lha rnams la 'di ltar blto na sdug na
kanas pa'i lha dag gang nas dong ba'i skyed mos tshal dubadag cag kun dang gas/khyed rnams 'dong bar shoms shig ces bsgo'o// de nas bskyabyin gyi tshigs de thos nas chos bzangs na gnas pa'i lha rnams

kyi shing rtargyal mtshan sna tshogs can la zhon/la la gser gyi shing rtasrog shing u0f8brgya las byas pa/ba dan btags pa rnams la zhon/la la'i klu'i shing rta srog shing gser las byas pa rnams la zhen la la ni po

chosna bdun bkra zhing ba nasna tshog kyis mdzes par byas pa rnams la zhon/la la gsar gyi bya sgra snyan cing shin tu 'jebs par byung ba'i bya'i zhing rta rnams la zhon/la la na khra bo 'gros 'cham zhing bde ba dag la bang

blangs nas/shing rtar rnams ltade rnams la btags te/rtaTishing rtas 'gro bar byed/ de ltar gzhan yang gsar gyi bya ngang pa rkang po ni+i cha rma/ sgron pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta burnams kyistang du zhon nas lha'i dang nga ngo brgya

byin dang lhan cig tu blta na stag gi grong khyer chen po gal ba dang/ skyed mos tshal ga la ba der yang 'dong bar byed do//yang lha gzhan dag ni po che sna bdun gyi rma bya'i gzugs dang lamazhing/ mngos kyi tshogs lob
kya/ pa gangami'i 'jig rten mang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin la/ lha'i 'jig rten na lha gzhan dang mi 'dra ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mngon par brgyan ba lta smos

kyang ci dgos te/de dag gi mdog sdugatsang dbyibs legs pa dpa' bya bar yang mi nus pa'i stang du zhon no// rnam pa de dag lta bu dang ldan pa de dag la gzhan dag zhon nas blta na sdug gi skyed mos tshal dang/

'tsha pa'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed byed de/ lha tshogs de rnams la mo'i sgra dang/ glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyis dgod cing rtsi la longs su spyod pa dang/ lha gzhan byas shing 'khed po rnams skyed mos tshalag

zla la ba der 'dong par byed do// lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi shing rtala'i yang 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang legs par ldan pa/shing rta rin po che sna bdun las byas ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ an nIl dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/

gru ga na tu gsal ba dang/ bo rmadang/ byu ru dang/ rdo rje dang/ shel la gser gyi khye'u rnams kyis mngon par brgyun ba/ shing rta'i mchog de la brgya byin zhenanas/zinabo che sna bdun gyi bya ngang pa gsegyi pad+ma ltar

klu rgyas shing/ dbyibs dang cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa/sgra che zhing gdangs snyan pa 'byin pa de'i drung na lha mo'i dbyangs kyang snyan par mi 'gyur ba song gis khrid de ba byin shing rta rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa dang pa

rnams kyis khrid par byed do//shing de la yang tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bsgyur ba'i 'phan ldebasgra/ 'phan shing bo DUr+ya dang/ gsar dang/ dngul las byas pa las btags so// 'phan gyi kha dogo ni 'di lta ste

sa sngon po dang/ ser bo dang/ btsong ba dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar pos mdzes par byas pa yin la/shing ltade la lha'i rgyal po de yin nas/lha mo'i tshogs du ma ni nye ba naglu dbyangs len/lha 'bum phrag du ma yang

mdun du song nas glu dbyangs len zhing nam mkha' la rang lang dang yang du 'gro/ sa la'ang gang dang yang du 'gro sta/gar dga' bar 'gro/ tsadagar byed pa/ lha'i bde ba de la nye bar spyod cing sil snyan lan ga lnga dang

ldan pas nyams dga' bzhin dugrong khyer blta na sdug dang/ skyed mos tshal ga la ba dera'adong bar byed do// der 'dong ba na lha'i tshogs gzhan ngag gis mthong nas bro ga' byed/gad mo bgor/ rtsed mo rtse/ rol mo byed

cing pad+ma sna tshogs sdong bu'i rlu las byas pa dag log tu khyer nas/ lha'i rgyalapobargya byin lha rnams dang lhan cig gang nas mngon du 'ong ba der blta na sdug pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyis kyang skyed mos tshal

nas byung nas 'ong ngo//nas bor byin gyis bdag cag gi nga 'dir 'ong gis/khyed kyi 'di dag dang rtse ba de bya ba'i rigs so zhes kyang bsgo'o// de nas brgya byin gyis kha nas tshig thos pa'i spyi bos blangs nas/bltan

sdug na gnas pa'i lha ga la ba der chu blang ba'i phyir brgyags so// lha mo'i nang nas lhamo de dag kyang blta na sduka na gnas pa'i nang du nu blang ba'i phyir brgyugs so// blta na sdugana gnas pa'i lha mo dang/ chos bazang

na gnas ba'i lha mo dag kyang gang de nas phan tshun rgyug go/ de ltar lha rnams phan tshun du gser gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag blangs nas skyod mos tshal ga lo ba der rgyug la/ de dag phan tshun lhan cig tu dgod cing rtse la

rgyu'o lha'i rgyal po brgya byin bar snang la rgyu zhing 'gapas kyang lha dang lha mo rnams ma tog ku mu das rtse ba de dag mthong ngo// lha de rnams chu la yun ring du skye ba de byas nas/ de nas yar nga

mchog sta/pad+ma la rtse brtsom par byed do// lha dang lha mo de dag phan tshun pad+ma la rtse bar byed de/la lags r gyi pad+ma rnams kyis/la la be DUr+ya dang gsar gyi sdong bu rnams kyis/ lal sdong bu sna tshogs rnams

ba/ kyis rtse ste/ de ltar phan tshun rtsod mo byed do// de ltar phan tshun yun ring du stags shing rtsos nas/'bras bu tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do//de dag gis 'bras bu snyi ba rnams blangs nas phan tshun stag/

snya 'dod pa 'phagapar byed do//'bras bu la rtse ba de yang byas nas chang gi tshal ga la yod par der 'dong bar byed do// tshal der song nas myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing 'khrug pa med pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'o zhim pa lha

ji ltar byas pa bzhin du zhim pa ga la 'thung bar byed do// lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas lha'i kumangaga' ra ba ga la ba der 'dongs ngo ga gi nang du 'dug go/ lha'irgyal bo dri mas
kyis mthong nas phan tshun kun yid dga' sti/lha'i rgyal po la mchod pa byed do/// dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bam po sog nyis pa/ de ltar kun

gyis thal mo sa zer sbyar te mchod pa byas nas/'di ltar lha'i dbang po bzhugs pa bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin migang bdag cag gi pha ma dag pas lhag par srog
nade ba de rnams kyis legs pa rim tshod de// de nas yang lha de dag la 'di skad kyis khyed ni bdag gi bu dang 'dra/ sman dang 'dra zhes smras nas/ de ltar de dag phan

na legasang ra mchod pa byas te/ de nas yang bag med pas ra zhugs nas bag med pa de nyid la gnas so// de nas ya nga tshal dang nye ba'i tshul dag bya'i tshogs rnams kyisgra 'byin pa 'bab chudang/ klung tshang tshig

rnams kyis brgyan pa/gsar gyi chu beng d+ma'i tshal dang/ nyeba'i tshal mdzes par byas pa/ sa gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la mi rtsub ba/mtho dman gyis brgyan pa/baiDUrludang/ gno/re dang dngul dang/ shel gyi shing sngon/

pas brgyan pa/ bza' ba dang btung bachu ltar 'bab cing// 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa// ma tog man da ra dang/ pad+mal sogs pa ma tog chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ tshang tshing rnams kyi nang na 'i/

mi dang/ bud mad dgod dgod/rtse tsa/rgal rgal/ yongs su spyad pas bstan pa'i tshang tshing gi tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal rnams su lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang/ lha'i kha zas dang/ lha'i yul lnga 'byor

cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed do// de nas yang blta na sdug pa na gnas pa dang/ chos brdungs na gnas pa dga' ra byed pa rang gi gnas gnas su zhugs so// de dag der zhugs nas kyang ji

srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong byas shing bsags pa de thang par ma gyur pa nge song nga dka' ba zer lodo nge ngag les lnga'i sange nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dma' ba dang/
yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyabar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par ma'i nang du gsan/lasad dang rgya

'thun par de rtag tu nin tu bde bar 'gyur zhing/ rig pa'i blo drim med pa dang/ rol mo la dga' ste bro gar dang/ klu dbyangs dang/ dgod pa dang/ rtse bal dga' T/ rtag tu spro ba la dga' zhing bza' ba dang/ btung ba

dang bca' ba dang/ baphra' bar bya ba mang po la dga' ba dang/ yams kyi nang med cing rims nang mang la mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur pa mthong ngo// de nas ya nga dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa

shes pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/sa khros pa las byung ba'i shes bas lha rnams kyi gnas phyogs gcig na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der soms can dag

las gang gis skyo bar 'gyur snyam na/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan ng 'byor pa yang shin tuchung zhing dman par gyur pa gang gis gzhan dag las nor rdzas kyi rnam pa'i m/

kha gras dag blangs te/shin tu stagabasngal yang bu dang chung ma 'ba' zhig la mi sbyor bar/ sems longs subasgoms pa'i yid kyis nor rdzas sam/kha zas sam/ khazas de dag gzhan sdug bsngal zhing pha rol gzhan

dag nyon mongs pa dang/ longob dang/ dbul ba dang/ mgon med pa rnams la bgo bsha' byas nas sbyin par byed pa dang/ srog chags gzhan gyi chu ma la 'khrig pa'i dga' bas rab tu chags po dag/ gzhi ngesa mngon par

bzung sa srog chad pa'i nyon mongs pa 'thob cing gshed ma'i la gzhu bskur ba lho phyogs kyi sgo nas khrid de srog gcod par 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa'i rnam ba de lta bu'i nang du chud pa las thar par byas na/de lus dang bral nas

bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skabang gyur ro//del skos nas kyang legs par grab byas ba// dge ba'i las shin tu rgya mib byas shing yang dag par sprad pa de nga gi lus

las kun nas 'od 'byung ste/dper na nyi ma'i 'od 'byung ba bzhinano// yang 'od de dag kha dego sngon ngo dang/ gser po dang/ btsong khangang/ ljang khu dang/ dkar po'i 'byung sta/ lce de'i 'od des sna'i'ajig rten gyi 'od

gsal bar de dag thams nga de nas yang bcu 'gyurobs lhag par gsal bar byed do// la ldan gadra' dang skar ma'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'igling gsal bar byed la/de nas yang zla ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du/

lha de'i rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis lha'i gnas de dag thams cad brgyan pa bzhin rnam par gsal bar byed do// 'od des gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha de la lha de bkagis mtshonaparab gs te/ ma

pa de lta bu'i khyadang ragang gis drung na/ lcagazhan de dag srin bu me khyer bzhin gsal ba med do// lha'i ris der lha de skyes ma thag tu lha mo de dag thams cad lha de ga lab der rgyugaming/ skyes ma thag tu rgyan thams cad byang bar

'gyur te/'di lta ste/gang gi g.yus kyi nor bu mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis dang ga tshad ngag tu 'od snang bar byed pa bzhin ni// 'od gang gis gzhathamatho ris na gnas ba'od de dag thams cad dang phyi rol gyi nor bu de dag thams cad

de ltar zil gyis gnon par byed do// ji ltakhanyi ma shar bris srin bu me khyer rnam sa kyi 'od zil gyis gnon par byed pa bzhin du lha de dag zil kyis gnon par byed de// ngoms skyes ma thag tu rin po che

sna bdun gyi cod pan dpag tshad brgyal da 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/'od kun gyis brgyan cing 'od zer 'byung la/gang gis 'od sngon bo dang/ ser po dang/ btsod kha dang/ ljang khu dang/ dkarapo rig byung bar 'gyur ro/

de'i 'ogo tu ni po che sna bdun gyi mgul rgyamadapag bsgyur 'ong bro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan 'phrang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'phreng ba 'phyang ba rdo rjesaM brgyan pa byung

bar 'gyur ro/de'i 'og tungo'i rkang ba'i 'brang rgyun ji ltar 'ja' kha dog lta bur skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de'i lhas rin pomasna bdun gyis spras pa/ 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur te/ag

gang gis rim pa 'di ltar 'gro ba ni/gang gi tshe lha de 'di snyan du 'di ltar ngangag che ge mo zhig tu nam mkha' la sa 'gro'o snyam du bsams na/ sems bskyang ma thag tu lha yul du 'byungaba'i lhom desalharibategaso/
nam mkha' la khyer nas gnas der 'groste/lus ngal ba mod cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang de'i 'og tu po'i gos klags su btagos pa ma rinapa rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa 'od
gsal ba byung bar 'gyur te/gang 'od kyis lha'i ris nyams dga' ba de de nas yang shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur ro// lhade skyes ma thag tu 'ji snyam du sems te/ las byas pa gang gis bdag 'di skyes
[zo]shig gu snyam nas/ des brtags na/las legs par byas pa dang/ nyes bar byas pa'i gzhi 'dzam bu'i gling de nas bdag shi ste/der ga bya ba legs par byas pa 'am/nyes par byas ba des 'di'i skye ba

spyod par 'gyur te der bdag gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi rgyu des la re skyes te/rgyu med pas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de de ltar bsams pa dang/ thar mig tu lha mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/

rdzoged pa thams cad nye bar long par byed de/dengag gi rgyan gyi sgra ji ltar ma yu lan sil sAnaM yan lag lnga dang shin tuldan pa de dag kasgra 'byung ba de ltar de rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do// de dag gi dri yang dbag

tshad gnyis su gang ba 'gyur te/ dwi gang gi ma tog thams cad kyi dri bral gyis gnon par 'gyur/ dengag gi gzugs dang lang tsho sngon ma byang ba 'byung bar gyur zhing 'dzum po dang dga' ba 'byung bar gyur la/sngon

gyi gos kyi yon tan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha de'i legs par byas pa las des/ 'di lta ste nyi ma shar ba'i nyi ma 'a'id kyis me tog thams cad rab turgyus pa la 'gyur ba de ltar lhu po'i 'od byung bas

lha mo de dag thams cad kyi gzugs rab tu rgyas par 'gyur te/de dag dang de phrad na 'dzum zhing dga' ba dag gis rtse da go byed de// de dag gis de pang du blangs te tshal dang/ nye ba'i lo ga la ba de nyid du 'gros stsal gus

khyor zhing lha de'i mdun dusil snyan sna tshogs dang dgod pa'i sgras dga' bar byed pa de dag lha la lta zhing tshul dang nyeba'i tshal de dag ga la ba der 'deng bar byed do// lha de'i gnas su tshol rang ga 'bang bar 'gyur te/

[n ]@#// 'di lta ste/pad+ma rmad byung gi tshal yod de/tshal de na gang ga tshilha de 'jug pa de'i tshe gom pa 'dor ba'i sa dag 'a/ pad+masdong bu ni'i/ myu ku ni rdo rje/snying po nags gra/leg drangs
7 zhing 'bam 'jam pa dang/ bung ba tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dag 'byung bar gyur la/ de dag la lha de'i rkang pa gnyis 'jog par byed do// de nas rkang pa bteg pa dang/ bad+ma gzhan dag

'byung bar 'gyur zhing sna ma zhum par 'gyur ro// de pad+ma'i tshal de nas sbrang rtsi'i chu'itshol zhes bya ba sprang rtsi'i chu'i tshal ga la ba dera'adong bar byed do// tshal den lha'i shing ljon pa gsor rag

byas pa de dag thams cad las lha'i rgun chang 'dzag ste/lca'irong/ dri dang ldan pa'i rgun chang de dag la lha'i mchog de 'thung bar byed de/ myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sprang rtsi de dag la lha de rnams 'thung

khar byed do// dri dang ro sngon ma byung ba de dag la 'thusanas tshal gsum madzes zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// der gsum ms pemad pa 'byung ste/ 'di lta sta/ bya dang bung ba'i tshog sasgra

'byin pa dang/ gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i sgra dang lha mo rol mo byed pa 'byung ngo// lta'i mchog de tshal gsum madzes den skyed mos tshal nasaskyed mos tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshalanas nye ba'i tshal dang/ pad+ma'i

rdzong nas pad+ma'i rdzong dang/ lteng ka nas lteng kar dga' bar byed/ rtsol byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// bya sgra sna tshogs 'byon pa la nyan cing dbang po lnga yul lta la tshim pa med pa'i yid sridapa'i
[ra ]mar srog pan/ jid du der legs par byas pa'i las ma zad pa de srid du dga' ra byed do// de las de da nas de nas de yang lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ste/ shi nas kyang las kyi thag pas bcis pa
gis byas pa'i las rnams kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi'i so so'i yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i lasakyisami rnams kyi
nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu mthun par gzugs dang/ rigs dang/ yon tan phunasum tsho kununas mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang/ rang dang 'brel ba las 'tsho zhing gzhan la rag ma las pa
dang rang 'dod pa bzhin spyod cing nad med pa dang/ gnod pa med pa dang tsher ma med pa dang/ ani tu 'byor pa nga/ de bzhin du gsum ldan gyi dus su ma/ de bgazhi du gtso bo'anang du ma/ bzhin
durgyal sude phyed la dbang ba 'am/ rgyal tshab bam/ tshong du 'byor pa'i mchog nor dang/ 'bu dang gser dang/ dngul thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dag grong
las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin nga shes pa de sumanurtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas nig shing gseban
gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos ba las byung ba'i shes bam brtags na/ gang gis rkun po chad pas gcod
bar 'os pa gzung ba gang 'jig rten la la'ajigs pa'i bsam pas de chad pas mi gcod nang gnod par ma byed pa dang parol gzhan gyis rkun po bzung pa de yang sems
can la phan par 'dod pa byams par gzhol ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i bsamapas thar par byed pa dang/ ma la yang mal cha dang/ na pa'i rkyen gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad sbyin par byed cing/ gang ma'i
rdzas bsgrubs pa de dag rku ba'i mas kyis mi rku ba dang/ tshig 'jam zhing tshig nyung la phanapar sma ba dang/ nyin gcig bzhin sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal zhing/ sangs rgyas la spos ma/
zla ma tog gom/ bdug pa dag phul te phyag 'tshal la/ de'i yon tan yang rjes su dran pa dang (bam la lus kyis kyang gus par byed cing/ myur du ldang ba dang/ gus par phyag 'tshal ba dang/ rtag
dusAn par skye ba dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po mthong na shin tu 'dri bar mi byed la/ de dag dang lhan cig dag rab dang gro ba dang/ phrad pa dang/ mngon par smra bar m byed/ mi nyon mongs pa'i sems dang
ldan pa/ 'bags pa ma yin pa 'jig rten bas spangs pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed la/ thad kar lta shange 'dug par mi byed pa dang/ rgan po la legs par lta ste/ rgan po shes pa dang ldan pa

sems can la byams shing pha rolagadung bar mi byed pa/ 'jig rten kun gyis bkur ba/ snyan par smra ba/ 'jam por smra ba dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing yang dag par rnam par 'byed pa'i tshul khrims kyang yod pa der

bran pho dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la rgyu med par 'atse bar mi byed pa dang/ bza' ba mang du mi za ba dang/ 'dod dgur 'gro ba'i tshul dus byed pa/ gnod pa'i tshulatshad/

pa dang/ glo bur du mi la thug pa dang/ shan pa dang/ na 'tshong dang/ khyi sa 'tsho ba dang/ ris 'tshol dri ma dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang/ nyo 'tshong la sogs pa ma yin pa dang yang dag par 'brel bar

mi byed pa dang/ chang tshong gi mi du dga' bar mi byed pa dang/ bud med la ga las shing sdig pa byed pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ rtab rtab por mi 'gro ba dang/ sgrub nagazhan gyis gsad me shor ba dang/

grogs po rnams la grags lta 'ang gsang ste dgra mi byed pa dang/ gnad btsal te rgyal po la mi smra ba dang/ gzhan gyi zhing rnams la skyo ba'i lhamar mthong na bdag nyid kyirami byed pa dang/ yul mi'i dpya nar ma
drug cha gcig 'bul ba las lhag pa mi 'bebs pa dang/ gzhan gyi zhing dang/ chu dang skal ba byin pa mi 'phrog pa dang/ mtshan mo ma/ nyin mo gzhan gyi 'bras bu mi 'phrog pa dang/ rkun sogs thams
cad dang bral ba 'am/ de dang bral ba 'am/ nyung dur bral ba yin// ji ltar n nyung dur bral ba yin zhen/ las kyi nyer bsdogs mi byed pa dang/ las ba ma dang bral ba yin te/ gang byas pa 'tshogs
par byed cing/ skyon du ni lami byed pa dang/ chen po dang bral ba yin te/ las kyi nyer bsdogs mi byed pa dang/ de gzhan byed du mi 'jug cing gzhan gyis byas nas kyang 'chags su 'jug pa dad/ so sor
der 'dong bar byed do// de nas yang shang gseban gnas ba'i legs par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthuni lha dag lha'i bar la 'dug nas gang du 'gro ba de nam mkha'ade las
lha'i btung bas gang ba'i lca'i snod dag lag tu 'ong ste/ btung ba de dag lha dang lha mo de dag dang lhan cig 'thungashade dga' bar byed/ glu dbyas len/ mongs su spyod par byed la/ phyogs gzhan gang
du 'dong ba yang 'gro'o// de nas gzhan yang shing gse bana gnas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthun rtsa rnams gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang do thams cad 'byor da ra 'gyur zhing/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas
nas gnas gzhan du rnam pa gang gzhan gyis 'gro 'dod pa'iri dang/ ri'i rtsa mo de dag tu yad lha'i mo tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ chu bo phun sum tshogs pa dang/ tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dun sum tshogs
ba dag nam mkha' las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lta gnas pa de rnams lha mo dag gis yongs su bskor la/ lhan cig tultarisil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye ban len cing/ de dag
de dang/ yul nas yul du ma mkha' la 'gro ban/ de nas chos bzangasan gnas pa dang/ bstan sdug pan gnas pa yid dga' bas gnas mthon po mthong ste/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling na mi rgyu
ba dag lha gzhal med khang gsal ba na gnas pas mthong ba bzhin/ de ltar chos pa zas na gnas pa'i lha de dag dang/ bstan sdug na gnas pa de dag phan tshun du/ kyi 'di ltar ng kang gseban gnas
ba'i lha de dag bde ba mchog dang ldan te/ bdag cag pas khyod ches bde la lta'i nader snyan pa 'a ga la la/ ka dag kA kur rgyu ba/ gar 'dod par 'gro ba/ ci bder gnas/
thogs pamed par 'tho ba/ yul nas yul du 'gro'o zhes brjod do// de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa stong du lha'i gsor dang/ pho rlas byas pa'i steng du 'dug nas/ lhamo

bzang mo dag dang lhan cig nam mkha' las 'gro'o// legs par byas pa'i las kyis sbra gang legs par me da nga nyams dga' ba 'di lta bu na/ 'dab ma thams cad la lha mo'i lha'i 'phreng ba dang/ gos gyon pa

gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa thams cad yid rab tu dga' ba/ thams cad sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dga' bas myos pa thams cad brgya byin la phyogs la/ so so gzugs dang lang tsho dar la bab pa'i
drags bsamyos pa lnga 'khod de/ de dag thams cad lha'i rgyal po brgya byin dang lhan cig tushing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do// shing gsab na gnas pa'i lha

de dag gis kyang brgyabyani de mthong anas/ phyir zhang yid rab tu dga' la yang ji ltar bshad pa'i kha nas de dag las kha pas nas/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do// deng nas brgya byin de la
spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig gis kyang bstod do// brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba dang/ shing gsob na gnas pa'i lha snying dga' ba rnams kyis brgya byin de lo ngas su bskos/ brgya byin mnobar 'dod
[r ]@#// rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa dang/ nganang de rnam par sbyong bar byed la/ chur du dong/ 'bring dang/ chen po byed pa de chung du dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po'i 'bras bu la spyod pa yin/

te de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa nyes par byed pa rnam par sbyangs ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho si kyi 'jig rten shing gso ba na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye khor 'gyur

bo/ u0f7c ra skyes nas kyang lha'i lus sha dang/ a pa dang/ rnag khrag dang bral ba yin te/ gang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba de'i dpe khu bar yang skya ba ma yin mod kyi/ cung zad cig dper byan 'di lta ste/
sems can gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos su skyes pa dang/ gang gser gyi 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i khyad par gang yin pa dang/ lha'i bde ba myong ba'i mi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo

gling bzhi pa'i rin po che sna bdunadang ldan pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'i khyad par de ni shing gsol na gnas pa'i lha de'i dpe cung zad bya ba yin no// shing gseb na gnas ba'i lha de'i rab kyi stod dpag

lha tshad sum stong yod par/ dbal dang ldan pa 'ani bo che sna bdunagyi lha'i shing ljon ba dang/ chu bos mdzes par byas pa lta bur phyogs de na tshal kun spyod ces bya ba gser gyi shing ljon pa yod pa der 'di
ltar lha rnams kyi sems la gang du bdag cag 'gro bar bya ba der shing ljon pa dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du de ltar 'ong bar shog cig snyam mo// desems bskyedam thag nyid du shing gso ba na gnas pa'i

lco rnams gar 'gro ba de dag gi phyi bzhin du de ltar 'os te/ deng na 'a khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sems bskyod ma thag nyid du 'a kho'olanam mkha' la 'gro ba de ltar lha rnams kyis sems khaskyed ma thag nyid

du shing ljon pa dag namamakhar las 'od ngo// lha rnams gar 'dod pa der yong sa'i stod du 'bab par 'gyur te/ dper na bya dag sa'i phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro zhing gnas pa de dang de dag nyid du gnas pa

'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shing ljon pa de dag thams cad de ltar 'gyur te/ 'di ni shing gso ba na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mthu gcig yin no// de nas yang mthu ba byung sto/ de ltar

legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi mthun lha rnams gang du 'dong ba der bya dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byin bzhin du phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dod ngo// de nas gzhan yang legs la
byas pa'i las rnams kyi mthun lha rnams nam mkha' la 'do pa dang bcas par 'gro ba'i lha dag pa'i rdzongan bung ba myos pa sgra 'byin pa dang/ gser gyi bya dang pas mdzes par byas shing/ bya ka'and/
khadang/ dur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do// de nas gzhan yang shing gsob na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis legs par byas pa'i mthuni lha lta'i 'phrod ba dang/ gos
gyon pa dag nam mkha' gang la 'gro ba'i ma ma khab der sa'i pad+ma sdongabu po ru las byas pa'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'dab ma stong yod pa'i 'dab ma de re re la lha mo 'bodonas lha ga lab
[Prs] ]@#// kha ri gnas sam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ ri bo'i sor ga/ tshal lam/ nye ba'i tshal lam/ bats+tsha'i ljid la/ gnas gzhan ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do//

mo brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba de rnams der yun ring du rtses nas/ de nas yabang ga gnas ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/ brgya byin gyi sngon du 'grob rnams ji ltar song ba de ltar slar 'ong bar byed do// de
nas brgya byin yang lha'i 'dunas chos bzad s ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do// gzugs dang/ sgra dang dridang/ ro dang/ reg bya sdug gu'i myos pasamyos pa'i rtsa de dag kyang ji srid du sdug la
'dod pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do// de phyis lha sa de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shin s kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems
na dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur// gal te mi rnams dang skal bamanyam par mi'inang du skyes nas/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu bde ba mchog dang ldan
zhing/ rtag tund med pa dang/ gnod pamed pa dang/ noradad shin tu ldan zhing mchog tu bde ba dang/ de bzhin du sde gzhan gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i bar gyi gling dag gi rgyal por 'gyur ba'am/ rgyal tshab
du'agyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dag slong las kyi 'bras bu rnamapar sman pa shesapa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes
bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing rtasnatshog san gnas pa zhes bya ba jiltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// derasems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i
shes pas brtags na/ mchod rten gyi gnas rnams su sngon yo byad sbyor ba rnams rgyal po mi rigs pa 'am/ blon pomigs pa ma/ migs par chags pa la bkam pa/ las la 'jigs pa med
pa/ gang gis bcod par byed pa la skyes bu dam pa yid dang sems bsgoms pa/ sas rgyas kyi yon tanaman par dran pa 'am/ shan tu tshig snyan cing gsal bsasangs rgyas la bstod nas phyi'i zlog

par byed dam/ tsho bar byed na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mthongs kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi na shing rta snatshog san gnas pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyashani/
chu dag pa'i las byed pa de/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed/ rtsi bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed/ gnas par byed do// sa der las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis kyang skyo bar 'gyur
pa ni/ srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin pa len pa/spangs pas 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ khyis 'tsho ba las ra dgas thar par byed la/ bdag nyid kyang mi byed/ byed du yang mi 'jug/ gzhan gyis byas pa la
rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa dang/ ji ltar mkhyen par len pa mi byed de/ ma byin pa len pa ji ltar spangs pa yin zhen/ bdag nyid yul gyi bdag po 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon por gyur pas pha
la la tshad pas wacod pa'i m byed cing/ gzhan byed pa yod zlog par byed l/ chos sam khrims la 'jogo ra byed pa de dag ni shing rta sna tshogs su skyabar gyur ba'i lasa rnam pa

gnyis pa yin no// tshal gyi rgya dpag tshad sum stong yod pa de na/ lha dgashing rta sna tshogs rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ des na shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ming du btags la/ shing rta sna tshogs der

la/ gnas pa'i lha rnams rtsa bar byed do// shing rta dang/ shing rta'i nang na gser dang dngul gyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhum shin tu bstan sdug pa/ dri mchog tu yid du 'thad pa'i rdzong 'byung la/ bung ba po'i

mdog lta bu'i tshogs lding ba rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// tshal der bkra ba 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de brjod pa pad+ma'i rdzing rnams su pa dbakrab 'byung bzhi 'di lta ste/ pa la la pad+ma
byed mathon ka las byas la/ phyed po bla las byas pa yin te/ bkra ba gcig yin no// yang bkra ba gzhan ni byed pirma las byas l/ khyod gso las byas ba yin te/ bkra ba gzhan yin//

spyi gang bkra ba gzhan ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa thams cad kyipad+ma la/ pad+ma byed kyi brtsi 'dab mnag ser las byas la/ gzhan ni bdarA ga'i mdog lta bu yin no// mang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni/ pad+ma

bzhum+ma'i 'dab ma dag la bud ba gser gyi mdog can rgyu la/ dadu'agyi 'dab ma dag la bung ba pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can rgyu'o// yang bkra ba gzhan 'gyur bzhi ts+tsha'i bad+ma'i sdong bulazhigasoragyis mos
su dkris/ gsogyi ba'i sdong bu la zhi bo ches yongs su dkris/ dngul gyi pad+ma'i sdong bu lanasdug gis yongs su dkris/ ni bo chogargyud kyi kha dog lta bu'i sdong bu la ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser
gyis mos su dkris so// bung ba sgra 'byin ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa rnams kyis ba'i rdzing bu de dag khebs pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzam bu gling na me tog tshul sa'i dog pa la
bung ba rnams kyis rtag tu khebs pa ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi yang de dang 'dra go/ de nas legs par byas pa'i lasa rnams kyis gnasasnyatshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzam bu gling na
lag bzo mkhas pa 'am/ lag bzo'i slob mas las pa zhig gis rtsig ngos la bkra ba 'dab ma snatshogs bkod pa/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bris pa ltar/ tshal gyi gnas de na yang de lta bu yin no//

mdang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan ni bya sna tshogs kyi spyodang/ nang pa dang/ mgo dang/ lto dang/ mag bkra ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ bya gang gi lto gser du 'dug pa de'i rgyu dngul ldan
la rgyab barmanug ri ma ga dang/ mig rin po che ka ru'i mdogo/ de bzhin du gang dadu lagyi ltar 'dug pa de'i sgro gser la/ mig bai rlu'i mdog dang/ mig gi 'bras bu pad+ma rA ga'i mdog la/

rgyab bkra bar 'dug ste/ zhi bo che sna bdun gyi mdog lta bu'i bya snatshogs rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so// 'di ni shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan yin te/ 'di lta ste/ri'irtsi mo 'byung
[q]ga kha dang/ 'di lta ste/ mthonakha dang (pa dang/ drug dang/ na po cheka ske ru dang/ gser te/ de rnams kyi yod kyis tshal de smras shing brgyan pa 'an no// tshul de phan
tshun gyi 'od zer 'khyil bas shin tugang la lhanodo zemathus shin tu rdzos par byas pa yin no// yatshal snatshogs bkrab/ gzhan ni lcag ma 'phyang ba dang/ shing gol ba sna tshogs
da dag ban tshun 'dzas par 'dug la/ kha dog gsum 'byung bzhi'adi lta ste/ bima'i lcag ma la pad+ma'aga'i mdog gis 'bras bu de 'phyar bar 'gyur zhing/ anArAl gyi mdog lta bu s lhan tshig
rgyudakris pa yin/ dngul gyi lcag ma la pad+ma rtaga'i mag giso 'od kyis lcan gi bskor ba yani/ de bzhin du phyag dang/ gsar gyi lcag ma la gser gyi lcag mas lhan cig dkris pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/
zhi po che ka ke ru'i mgo lta bu'i lcag ma la dngul gyis yongs su dkris pa yin te/ de ltar lcagam kha rog gnyis pa 'phyang ba yongs su dkris pa yin no// lcag ma 'phyang ba kha dog gsum pa
rnams la yongs su dkris pa ni 'di lta ste/ bo ma'i smyug ma la gser dang ka ke ru'i mdog lta bu s kun nas dkris pa yin/ de bzhin du lcag ma ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu la gsar dang dadul lta bu s
yongs su dkris pa yin/ de bzhin dudadul gyi lcagamo la pad+ma sbag dang/ mthon ka lta bu s yongs su dkris pa yin te/ de ltar lcag ma re la gnyis gnyis kyis kun tu dkris pa yin no//
yang shing rtasna tshogs la bkra ba gzhan gyur ba ni/ gser gyi lcag ma dag las me tog gi ma'i mdog lta bu 'byung/ de bzhin du dngul gyi lcagam dag las me tog mthon ka'i mdog lta bu 'byung/
de bzhin du gsar gyi lcag ma dag lasam tog ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu 'byung/ deb zhin du sprug gi lcagam dag las me tog bzhuslarimadog lta bu byung ste/ de ltar lcagam snatshogs dag las ma tog sna
tshogs 'byung ngo// las sna tshogs kyis skyed pa/ sams snatshogs kyis bslar ba (rgyu sna tshogs dang 'thun pa ni yang dag par skyes ba snatshogs dag yin te/ de ltar las rnams kyi rgyu dang gzhi

des de lta'ashing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal thams cad bakra ba yin no// jiltar s bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba de bzhin du/ rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung ste/gang 'dir las byed pa rnam pa gang gis ji
ltar 'aphangs pa dang/ gang gi zhing gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang/ sems pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu nas/ snatshogs suslong bar byed pa'i bar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa ni 'bras bun ltar rgya'i 'bur
lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mgro'isi sam sems can dmyal ba gang rgyamadapar 'bras bu 'byung ba rimed de/ gzhan gyis byas la rnam par smin pa gzhan la byung ba de ni gnas med do// de nas yang

dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshom bkra ba dang/ 'tsho rten bkra ba la yang rtog par byed de/ sumachu rtsa gsum pa'i shing rta sna tshog san lha rnams las ci zhig/
byed tsagi gu snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ 'di ltar dus gang gi tshe/ michos dang mi ldan pa chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/ mar mi'ani
pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa// dge sbyong du mi' dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzanang/ gas kyi rgan rabs la gus par mi byed pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mi 'dzin pa/ las dang 'bras bu la yid mches pa/

'asha yang dag pa'i lta ba med pa// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sngon du 'gro ba med pa de 'tsho/ bdud sdigacan dag dga' bar 'gyur la/ de'ichos dang chos kyi rjesasu 'jug pa'i 'khor bzhi po de dag 'jig rten du
'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi rigs 'dzagi rten skyong ba 'thab pa zhes bya ba dang/ bdud kyi sa 'jig rten skyong ba ga med byed ces bya ba gang chos skyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems
g.yor bar byed pa 'am/ dam pa 'chos nyan par gnyid log par byed pa dang/ gsum pa lhag par chags par rmongs pa zhes bya ba sbyin pa dag gtong ba na sbyin pa po dang/ spyin bdag rnams kyis mas

chags pa skyed par byed de/ 'di ltar bdag gis gang dag sbyong dang bram ze zhing du 'gyur ba rnams la sbyin du bu dang chung ma ci bza' ci bgo snyam du sems par byed do// bdud kyis 'jig rten skyongab gsum

pa dag sems can rnams rnam bar chos byed tsang/ 'jig rtenan rgyu bar byed do// bdud kyis 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi pa 'du shes 'og pa zhes bya ba de 'jig rtenan rgyu zhing de rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyi

sems rab tu mi 'byung bar bsgyu'o// dang po nichags pa dang/ sbyor ba dang/ grong du 'jug pa dang/ tshong zong nyo tshong byed pa dang/ bud med la lta 'dod pa dang/ chang 'tshong gi khyim du 'jug pa dang/ 'thab rtsod/

dang/ dge 'dun 'byed pa dang/ rmi lam gyi gnod pa'i sems skyed par byed do// bdud kyis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bo de dag gi tshe chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu 'dzam bu gling du byed pa nus pa dang ldan pa 'ad
ba de'i tshibadud sdig can dag la lha dag dam pa'i chos kyi phyogasani 'grib go/ bdud kyi phyogasani 'phel tedagyes par mdzod cig ces bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas bdud sdig can dag gi rjes su/
'brang ba de dag la bdag cag gi phyogs ji ltar 'phel/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ji ltar 'gris zhes dris so// de dag gis lho 'dzam bu gling na mi chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa/ chos ma yin pa'i rjes
su 'jug ba/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ bar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du ma 'ani ba/ bram zer mi 'dzin ba/ rigs kyisan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa// bdag cag gi 'dod chags kyi chags pas
zal gyis mnanatsad dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la yang gnod pa bgyid do// de nas rab tu 'byung ba'i blos lache rab tu byung ba rnams dang/ khamin gnas pa sdom pa blangasashing tshangs par spyodang
rnams kyi rmi lam du yang bud med kyi gzugs su sprul nas/ rmi lam gyi gnod pa bgyid du stsal/ sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa gtong ban bu dang chung ma la rag las pa'i[]mas kyis yid
chags par gyur par bgyis/ yid mdza' ba dang 'khrugs par bgyis/ rab tu byung ba yang nyo tshong gi zong la sems brtson par bgyis/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'dud pa la/
lo1 dga' bar bgyis te// de ltar bdag cag gi thabs 'di rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs nasnyal/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyogasani bshig go zhes sa so// bdud sdig can gyis de thos nasalha ma yin sgragan
dang brtan pa dang/ rab dgod dang/ gzhan dag dang klu rab 'jom la sogs pa dag la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yongs su dmasaso// bdag cag gi phyogs ni 'bal te/ khyod
dga' bar gyis shigaces bsgogo/ de ltar yang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag nyid yang sa'i 'og tugatong bar byed do// sa'i 'og tu song nas/rab dgod dang/ thags bzas sa la stam bzhin du
bsnyad do// de thosanas lha ma yin rnams rab tu dga' ste/ klu rab 'joms la sogs pa chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams la bsnyad do// longs spyod ldan na gnas pa ni klu de
rnams kyis thos nas kyang shin tu dga' ste/ de dag mi rnams la snga ma bzhin du bgags byed do// de dag kyang 'phags skyes po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyod pa gzhan dgalas de dag thams cad snga ma

bzhan du thos nas/ lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'jug par byed do// de zhugs nas lha rnams bos te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten skyong
ba 'di dag na re/ 'di ltar bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams rab tu mthu dang ldan te/ lha ma yin thags bzas ris dang/ rab dgod la sogs pa dang/ klu rab 'joms la sogs pa mthurab tucher zhes
gyis/ de la lha khyed cag gas lha'i tshogs thams cad 'dir bsdu ba'i rigs so// 'dus nas kyang bdag cag lta'itshogs thams cad lha ma yin dang g.yul spyad pa'i phyir/ ni po chos brgyan pa'i dbang
pa brtsigs pa sna tshog sasu 'dod do// de thos nas lta thams cad kyis de ltar 'tshala' nas smras nas/ radagi gnas ga la ba der 'dodogo/ dong nas lha gzhan thams cad bsdus nas mdor
bsdus te/ shing rta snatshogs kyitshal ga la ba der dong ngo// dos skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs kyi gnas nyid du 'khod cing/ sil snyan sgra dbyangs snatshogs dang/ gludag rin bzharang

rta sna tshogs kyis bkra ba rnams su dga' bar byed do// gang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshalan rtag pa rtag ba nyid du 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni skyodachos tshal gang yang mi 'grogo/ donas lha'i dbang po
sa lha de dag bsdusanas shing rta snatshogs kyi tshal de nas dong ngo// shadi rta snatshogs kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'od ba byas shing bsags pa'i las
zad par ma gyur po de srid du de na dga' bar byed do// de zad nas lha ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shis kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhisems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/
dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur go/ gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na bas de dang rgyu 'thun pa de rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing na tshod thog ma nas 'chi ba'i bar du me tog ga/
'phrod bstag gu thogs shing cha byad snachogs dang/ shing rta sna tshogs la dga' ba dang/ skye bo kun dga' bar 'gyur/ gal te de rab tu byung na desang ga'i khri la 'dug gnas chos dang gtam snyatshog
skya ba dang/ gtam sna tshog sakyis 'khor kyad kun nas shin tu dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo/ de nas yang dag slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum curtsa gsum
pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas dga' ba na gnas ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo//
ter sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ skyes bu dam pa'i bsam pa dag par 'gyur ba gang gis srog gcod pa mi byed
cing ma byin par len pa yang mi byed la/ byed dum bcug/ parol byed pa yang bzlog/ bdag nyid che khyod/ byed du mi 'jug/ byas n yad 'chags par byed cing/ skyon du bgrang bar byed
la/ sdig pa'i grogs po de yongs su spong bar byed do/ de la srog gcod pa dang bral ba ni gang yin/ rnam pa ni du khod cig gu snyam nas/ 'di ni bya na 'u gzung ba thar par byed cing/ sdom pa len/

(du bcub gnas bdag nyid mi byed la so sor 'chags par byed pa 'a pya nga sa lu bzung banor rdzas kyis blus te thar par byed la/gzhan yang de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed/rab tu dga' bar byed/ rab tu spro ba byang ba dang//
ma byin par lenab spyongs pa ji lta bu yin/ ma byin par len pa spangs pa gang zhage yin zhig gusnyams/ 'dir sdud pa por gyur nas grong rnams 'dzinatam/ tshong rdal lam/ bong rdal lam/
phyugs kyi lhasa'adzin pa 'am/ rgyal pos 'di ltar lug dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu la sogs pa sdus shig ces bsgo ba las/ de yang sdom pa'i 'jigs pas skrag nas ma dri na par len par mi
khyod na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho sa kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro// las gzhan gyis kyang 'gyurati/ chos 'chad pa yang chos
nyan pa po rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ tshes grangs dang/ ul dang/ dus dang ldan par byas la de dgakyang dga' bar byas te/ de dag yid 'ab tu dga' ba sams rtse gcig gis chos nyanan//
dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i slob dpon de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur// sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na sbyin pa'i mchog 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/

chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ba// rgyu 'dis kyang lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de lta'i
shubya// bde ba phun sumatshogs pa/ dpa med pa/ brgya phrag stong du ma myong ba na/ 'di ltar gang du tshal de'i phyogs kyi cha ni 'di yin te/ dpag tshad sum stong yod la/ rin po che

[P]sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin te/ der lha rnams rtag tu dga' bar byed cing/ gzhan gar yang mi 'gro ste/ de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan gyis de dga' ba'i
tshal zhes bya'o// de gshing ljon pa thams cad 'dod pa dag gang lha rnams kyi yid kyis yang dag par sems par byed pa de dag nyid lha de rnams kyi shing ljon pa las 'thon par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar lha

rnams kyi yid la bdag khyim zhagi 'dod dosAman/ de nas de ltar lha des yid la byas m thag tu shing ljonang de yal ga de'i rtse mo la 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shing ljon pa de'i khang bzangs rin po che sna bdun/
@# dung ldan zhing nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ ka ba stong yod pa'i khabazasa mthong bar 'gyur ro// khang pa de'i ka ba so sor phyogs phyogs baiDurla las byas rashing/ la la gsar las byas/ la la dngul
rgyu las byas/ la la shel las byas/ la la ka ka ru las byas/ la la sbug las byas pa yin no// de nas khyim gyi mchog de shing ljon pa'i rtse mo de la yod pa mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
nga ni bdag lam 'jam zhing mtho dman du gyur pa nas khyim 'dir 'jug par bya'o snyam bsamasam thag nyid shing ljon pa de nyid la lam mthong ste/ der 'jug par byed do// de ltar lam de nyid nas shugs

pa dang/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gi khyim 'dir khyim gyi nang du pad+ma'i rdzong zhig yod na rung ngo snyam mo// de sems bskyod ma thag nyid du pad+ma'i rdzong rin po chosna bdun las byas pa/ bya dad pa dang

ka ban da ba dang/ dur ba snatshogs kyis nye bamadzes par byas pa'i byung ngo// de nas sad lha de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gisal snyan dang glu dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig snyam

mo/ desams bskyed ma thag nyid du gang rlung ngad 'jam ba rab tu ldang bar gyur te/ rnam pa ji srid du phan tshun reg pa na/ sgra 'byung ba'i rnam pa de sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung ngo/ lha ni

'disnyam sems te/ shing ljon pa'i nang gi khang par da ni bza' ba dang btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab par gyur cig snyam mo// desems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa'i yal ga de dag rdol nas bza' ba chu
bo snyod dang/ btung ba chu bo sod kha dog dang/ ro dang/ rig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o sAm mo// de sams bskyed ma thag nyid du

bdud rtsi lha'i ro dang dri dang/ mdog phun sumatshogs ba 'byung ste/ de de la za bar byed do// de des shin tu tsam pa dang/ de nas yang lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rtsi bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed de/

de ltar dga' ba'i tshal du lha dag shing gi drung du song ste/ bdeb nyo bar spyod par byed do// de gal te yang shing ljon pa'i mchog de las 'bab par byed de/ desa'i stod du song nas sa de la 'chags par
shag/ byed do// de 'chags pan po zhurma'i sdod bu dang ldan pa'i pad+ma gser gyi 'dab mamatho isu 'os pa// 'jam zhing 'phar ba kun s mchog tu nyams dga' zhingan du dris pa dag

'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la rkang pas 'gro zhing lha de 'chag par byed la/ lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs len pan/ de ltar lAde rkang pas 'chag pa'i bde ba nye bar myong ngo// de rnam
par rtog pa 'bum snyad du ma dag 'grub cing bde ba myong stodabang po lnga rnams kyi yul lnga rnams la myong bar byed do// dbang po kun rang gi yul gyi rim pa mdang/ra 'gyur te/ 'di ltasta/ mig gis
gzugs gang mthong ba de dag zlos pa med par mthong la/ gang mthong ba de dgasna tshogs pa nyams dgab mig tu 'os pa yin no// mig dang bas 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba 'dzin cing mthong
ste/ de ltar mig gzugs rnams kyis tshim par byed do// gang na bar mnyan pa yang nyams dga' ba/ gzhan dang mi 'dra ba yin te/ rna ba yang sgra rnams kyis tshim par byed do// de ltar snas

kyang dri snom par byed de/ de gad snom pa de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la snom lta/ sna yad dri rnams kyis tshim par byed do// de ltar rtses kyang ro rnams myad bar byed de/ gang

rlud bar bya ba de dag kyang shin tu 'dod pa dag la myang bar byed cing/ yid du 'ong ba ga la myang bar byed do// de ltar lus kyis kyang reg bya la reg par byed do/ gad reg par bya ba de dag kyang 'dod pa/

ba0 sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag myong bar byed do// de ltar yid kyis gang bsams ra bya ba de yang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag la sems par byed de/ de ltar sred pa'i tshogs drug la lus rnam pa la/
chags pa dag tshal de na dgod par byed/ dag/'a bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed/ rtsi bar byed kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis mapa med do// de yul 'og ma dgon pa lta bu la dbang po mthon
por khyud 'i rnam par rtog parlung lta bu s skyod pa'i dge ba med pa shin tu byang ba'i mos nyin gcig bstan srog kyad/ desrid pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim ngang skyod par mi byed do// de ltar de dag
dga' ba'i tshal na rtsi shing yul du ma la dga' ka myongapa kun u ste/ dga' ba myod ba na lca ma 5ni las rnam par rgyal ba/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yad snga ma bzhin du ra brtsigs pa sna tshogs ga
la ba der 'gro bar byed do// der song nas kyang lha rnams l bos te/ lha dag dga' ba'i tshal du dga' ba gyis shig/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis sa
shig/ 'di ltar bdagarda bdud kyi sde thags bzas ris la sogs pa las rnam par rgyal te// bdag dga' ba'i tshal du 'gro yas/ de ltar lha thams cad lta mo'i tshogs dad bdag cag
rnams kyi dbyar zla ba bzhir gnas pa'i skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba gal ba der dong la myu'i 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis nges par dga' bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o// des lha'i rgyal po brgya
byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la bsgo nas/ shin tu dga' ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan pa glang po ches srungs kyi bu bos te/ 'di ltar glang po che'i mchog chos
shig/ da skyed mos tshal du dga'i spyod bya ba'i phyir dga' ba'i tshalan skyed mos tshal gyi dga' skyod ga la ba der 'gro ste/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor la dga' ba'i tshal
ga la ba der 'dong gas/ khyod kyis ji ltar ston yang yongs su sprul bcus ba de de ltar khyod kyi rgyab tu bzhin pa dang/ mgo la bzhon pa dang/ so la bzhon pa dang/ tsi legs la bzhon
ba dang/ gdeg pa dang/ tshal dang/ mtsho dang/ ri dang rtsi dang tshal dang/ 'ba'i tshal dag sprul pa gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de nas brgya byin gyi tshig thos nas/ glud po
che'i mchog sa srungs kyi bu bdag nyid chen por sprul te/ lus chen por byas so// de mgo brgyar sprul te/ mgo ralo la so gcu su'o// so ni rol pa'i rdzong ga bcu'o// pad+ma'i rjong bu re re la

sgyupad+ma stong stong ngo// pang stong stong la napo chesne bdun gyi 'dab ma yod do// 'dab ma stod stong lan po che sna bdun gyi bung ba yod cing/ 'dab ma stong stong la lha rnams 'khor kyang lha mo'i tshogs dang phan
tshun nyam da ba med do// de dag glang bo che mchog gi mgo la zhen pa ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor de ldan par gyur pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong ngo// glang po che'i
mchog gi rtsib logs na yod tshul gnyis sprul te/ tshal rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang/ tshal gnyis pa 'do bde zhes byago/ tsha gnyis po de shing ljon pa dang/ 'bab chu dang/ lteng ka phun sum
tshogs pa dang/ na po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dang ga bsam gyi shing ljon pa phun sumatshogs pa yod do// tshal de na gnas pa'i lha rnams dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod/
la/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lha rnams kyis dga' ban/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu rab gas nga lta bu dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byon/
dodo/ glang po che mchog gi rgyab tu yang grong khyer mnyam zhing 'jam pa'i sa zhes bya ba bstan sdug pa gnyis pa lta bu sprul te/ srung dang/ bzhimado dang/ sum mdo dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ shing
