sngon pa dang/ na po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so// de'i dbus su khang ba sprul te/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ka ba brgya yod pa'i kab rnams
kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so// deredabus sumatsho 'byung ste/ der rtsa'i rgyal po lcamo'itshogs rnams dang lhan cig bar byed cing sali snyan lan lag lnga dang ldan pas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin/
dga' bar byed la/ dga' dgur spyod bzhin du dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/ de 'gro ban yang 'gyur ba med de/ ji ltar rab la gnas pa 'gyur bar mi mngon pa de ltar glang po'i
u@#// mchog 'gro yang mi mngon no// de nas yang glang po che'i rna ba la pad+ma'i rdzi nga gnyis sbral te/ rgyar dpag tshad bcu gcig go/ gnyis pa yang dpag tshad bcu yodado//

gcig ni zab pa zhes bya'o// gnyis pan dang ba zhes bya ste/ chu yon tan yana' ga brgyad dang ldan pas nagashing tshugang ba yin no// den ut+pa la pho chu'i 'dab ma dang/ rin po che'i sdong bu dag skye la

kha cig pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu la bung bas nye bar mdzes par byas shing me tog rgyas la lha'i dri phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ ut+pa la de dag gi nang gi ze ba'i stan la/ lha dang lha mo gang dag lcan cig/

'khod de dga' bar byed la/ lha kha cigami chus rtsi zhing pad+mas rtsa bar byed kyang/ lha rnams kyis ci glang po che'i mchog 'di 'gro 'am mi rig go/ glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i stong du rdzing ring po sprul
te/ srid du dpag tshad lnga yod pa/ khang bzangs yang thog can yongs su bskor la/ lha'ishing ljon pa dang ldan pa/ ma tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa// me tog mnar bas khebs pa/ bung bsgo
[>di'i re 'byin pa dang ldan pa/ lca'i tsan dan gor shi sha'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa// gser gyi shing ljon pa dang ma tog rnam pa snatshogs gzhan rnams kyis shin tu khebs pa yin te/
ma tog de rnams kyi nang na 'bod pa'i lha mo mo tog gi zeba'i stangan 'dug pa dag rol mo byed cing dedag klu dbyangs len la/ lha'i rgyal po de la yad tshag dge ba rnams kyis stod par byed de/ de ltar

glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i stong du yang rdzing ring bo sprul to// de nas yang glang po che'irgyal po sna'i thor to la rdzong chen po rgyaradapagatshadatsam yod ba sprul te/ 'dab ma rgya che babum phrag dum shan
du lam pa yin la/ gang ltar dri de dpag tshad bcur ldang ngo// pad+ma chen po 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dab ma re re la/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams nye bar glu dbyas lenang
rtsi bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang/ rtsa rnams rtse zhing yodas su spyod pa phan tshun mi mthong la/ de bzhin gnod pa dang bral ba yanano// de ltar yang sna'i thor te la gnas pa sum

cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/ de ltar ri rab kyi stong du 'gro yang/ glang po che'i mchog 'gyur bar lha rnams kyis mi rig go/ de nas yang glang po che'i
mchog gi sna rin po 'byung khung gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba smral te/ ri de nyid la 'byung chung sna tshogs kyis brgyan/ lha'i shing ljon pas nye bar ms par byas pa/ 'bab chu dang/
lteng ka dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ mtsho dang/ bats+tsha'i rdzong gis brgyan par lha gzhan dag kyang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dgod par byed de/ glang po che'i mchog ma tog gis bkrab de'i mgo

la yang ra sprul to// de nas ang glang po che'i mchog giso'i thor te zla ba tshes pa lta bu la nye ba'i tshal dag sprul te/ me tog dang mtshos sa gzhi rtag tu par thang lta bur bkra bar byas ngashing 'dab masakyang/
nye bar mdzes par byas/ bung ba lang long 'khrigs pa dang khu byug gi sgra di ri'i 'byin pa dang/ skam la rgyu ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya dang/ shang shang te shin
katu yid du 'ong ba du ma dang/ gzhan yang lca'i bya rnams kyis lasngal pa nye bar mdzes par byas so// glang bo cha mchog lus chen po'i gyur bas dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/
lca'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing ngal ba med la stobs dang ldanopa 'gros mdzes pas rab tu 'gro'o// de nas yang glang po che'i mchog de'i sna gnyis kyi nang nas sna chu'i rgyun 'dzag ste/
'di lta ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling na mtsho gang+ga dang/ ya mu Ari chu 'bab pa shin tu dang zhang rog pa ni da la bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa bzhin no// de bzhin du cung zad dpa' bya na ji ltar mi'i gnas gzhi

! rtag na snyan dang/ rtswa dang/ nags khrod dang/ nas dang/ gro tsha bas gdungs shing bsams pa rnams de nas yang sos par bya ba'i phyir 'bru dang lo ma rnams kyi steng na chu 'bab pa mngon pa de ltar

glang po tsho'i rgyal po de'i rab tu dbye pa'i ng rtag tude lta bu yin no// gal te chu 'bab pa de rlung gis nam mkha' la 'thor bar byed nga/ nga gsi rgyad ring du skams par byed pa de'i zil pa 'di yin
te/ mi'i gnas gsum na snang ngo// de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de'i sna sgro 'bud pas 'byung ba de ni namam/ ba'i dbus na lho rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du 'bab pa/ 'od dkar por rgyu ba
mngon pa 'di yin te/ gang mu stags pa gzhan dag na re/ 'di ltar 'dzin dbang po'i lamamo zhes brjod do/ 5 nga gzhan dag skule/ 'di ltar 'di ni glang po ches spyas kyi bu'i ram na no zhes barjod/
kyang de ltar chu dkar po'i ngo bo nyid de mi shes so/// dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bam po so gsum pa// de dag rlung gis gter ba dang/
'phrul la 'bab cing/ de nyid ra dgasazhom pa lta bur mthong l/ ngo bo gzhan du 'gyur te/ ngo bo dag ni mi gsal ba'i ngo bor snang ngo// de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po mchog de'i spyi bo'i
ra yin pa gang yin pa de'i spyi bo thams cad la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog pe rma'i gdub kor dang/ gser gyi gdugs la ji ltar nyi ma gnyis ba lta bur de de ltar rnam par mdzes so//
glang po che'i mchog de'i stod na ba dan yang sprul te/ di khyad dang ga tshad tsam mo// ba dan de kun nas 'od dkar po 'byung ste/ gang mthong nas lha man rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams phan tshun
du 'di ltar 'di ni lha rnams 'ong ba yin te/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi ba dan rgyal byed ces bya ba snang ngo zhes zer ro// de nas glang po'argyal po'a mchog de dga' 'i tshal ga la ba der
'gro bar byed de/ tshal de rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas lha rnams la smras pa/ khyed cas thams cad du nyams dga' ba chen po de nyid la ltos/ tshal chen po kun nas mthong na dga' ba gang
[re]// du lta 'di dag lha ma yin las rgyal ba thob pa// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu zla ba bzhir dga' bar gyis shig/ de nas lha de dag gis tshig de thos nas
bo sgyu de dag gis smras pa// ji ltar bdag cag la brgya byin gyis bka' stsal pa de ltar bdag cag rnams kyis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de skad smras nas brgya byin gyi glang po che sa srungs kyi bu dga'

ba'i tshal du nye bar phyin no// de nas gar lta gzhan gyi dga' ba'i tshal de na rtsed mo byed pa de dag dga' bar byed cing/ yongs su spyod par byed la lta'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga khyobatsang ldan par

b+ha gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang/ glang po che'irgyal pos srus kyi bu nye bar mthong nas/ dga' ba'i tshal gyi ri la rtse zhing gnas pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing/ lha'i
rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ lha'i rgyal po la mgor thal mo sbyor te mchod nas/ brgya byin gyi mdun du sil snyan dang/ sgradabyangs dang/ lamo sna tshogs kyi dga' bdang/
brgya byin gyi mdun na bro gar dag byed bzhin du dga' ba'i tshalachen po ga la bdo'adong bar byed do// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang glang po che sa srungasakyi bu las babasanas/ lha'i tshogs dang
lhan cig tu dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'jug go/ stong du zhen pa'i lha kun dang/ de bzhin du mgo la zhon pa dang/ de bzhin du so la zhon pa dang/ de bzhin du rtsib lags la zhon pa de dag
[2 ]ngas cad glang po chos spungs kyi du las babasanas/ dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der rtse pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo// de nas gang dga' ba'i tshal chen po na/
sngan 'bod pa'i lha de dag dang/ gang brgya byin dang lhan cig lham yin gyi g.yul lasa rnam par rgyal ba thob pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur ba rnams dbyar zla

ba bshi'i bde ba dang med pa de rjes su myong ngo// lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor/ de dag kyang lha dang lha mo'itshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas dga' bar byed/
dgar dgur spyod pa'i byed do// bde ba dang med pa de rjes su myong ba na skabs der ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do// las dang tshozad
pa'i lha gang yazhi pa de dag phyis lha'i 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal de nas 'chibar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nye ba 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud
'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de dngargyu 'thun par rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing/ sgyu rtsal gyi blo dri mamed pa dang/
gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa dang/ skye bo thams cad kyi yide shin tu 'thad pa dang/ tshal dang/ 'bab chu dang/ ri dang/ lteng ka dang/ nyi kha'i tshal yod pa ldog 'bo rnams kyi nang du skyo ba
'gyur la/ der yang skye bo mang po dga' ba dang/ dbang che ba dang/ shin du 'byor pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dag slong las kyi 'bras

[//]bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu'i las dang/ 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/ 'di ltar de las kyi rnam pa gang gis rdzu 'phrulache ba dang/ 'thu
chab r gyur nas/ lha chen po lha ma yin gyi g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob cing/ las gang dang rnam pa ji lta bu zhig gis dud 'gror skyes snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas
brtags na/ 'di ltar 'di ni sngon sems can tshe lo bdun khri thub pan/ bram ze chen po rig byed dang/ ga byed kyi yan lag dang/ sngon byung ba dang/ sngon gyi rabs shes pa zhig byung ste//
des sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams byas/ dman pa dang/ mgon med pa med bdang/ sdug bsngal ba rnams la rtag res 'khor yang byas/ sems shin du dge zhing/ 'jig rten kun la phan

par byed ngas yin no// de'i tshe rgyal po lags mthong zhes bya ba de'i dga' sprodachen po shin tu nyams dga' ba ji ltar lha rnams dang/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i lta bu byed de/ glang po che brgyad
bri bzhi stong gsar gyi dra bas g.yogs shing/ dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba brtags pa/ kun nas gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa dang/ rta brgyad khri bzhi stong kun nas gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'isgra
'byung bas brgyan pa dang/ de bzhin du bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor cing rjes su 'brang ba dang/ de wAn du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis yongs su bskor te/ nye ba'i
tshal gyi 'phrod bzhes bya ba gzhal med khang ga la ba der dong bar byed do// rgyal po legs mthong gi mchog tu bde ba kun tu rgya che ba'i 'byor pa de dag la bram zed kun nas mngon par brtags na//
bram ze'i 'byor pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pas kyang rgyal po de'i dgar spyod byed pa ga la ba der song ngo/ bram ze de'i mingan skye bo kun snyoms zhes bya'o// de nas bram ze skye bo kun snyoms
rgyal po de dang/ de'i 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang/ rgyal po de'i rtag tu bzhon pa glang po che sprin brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i lus de kun nas dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas brgyan pa// mu tig gi
'brang ba rnams brtags pa/ kun nasabazo mkhas pas brgyan byas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ sil snyan gyi skrunum ba sna tshogs nye bar 'byin ban/ skyed mos

tshal du 'gro ba'i glang po chashin tu rgya che ba/ mchog tu bltan sdug pa rab tu bde ba mthong ba dang/ bram ze skye bo kun snyoms de kyi a ma glang po che 'di ni mtshog tu bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ lha de

bzhin du bdag kyang dani lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rtag tu bzhon pa'i glang po che'i rgyal por gyur cig snyam du sems skyes so// desbyin pa de'i mthu dang/ de'i las kyi mthus/ lus dar bral nas bde/
'gro mthorasikyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i sasu lha'i rgyal po brgyabyan gyi rtag tubazhon pa glang po che'i rgyal bor skyes so// de nas de'i tshe dge slong des 'di ltar
tshags su bcad de smras pa/ las 'di ri mo mkhan lta bu// gang dang gang du 'dri byed pa/ sems kyi dbang phyug chen po yis// dedang der ni 'di 'dri byed// yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis//
kha gang dang gang du sbyor byed pa// khams gsum 'khor bar rgyu ba rnams// de dang der nisims kyis gtong/ []/lus can rnams kyi las kun ni// sems la rag las 'jug par 'gyur//
de ltar rtag tu sems dul ba// 'chi med gnas su 'khrid par 'gyur// bsnyen par dka' zhing yang ba dang// gang yang rung bar ltung ba yi// sems ni dul na legs pa yin// sems
pa/ du la bde ba thob par 'gyur// gang gis rtag tusems dulakha// de yis rtag tu nyes pa bcom// nyes pa bcom pa'i brtag po la// sdug bsngal nyid kyis gnod mi 'gyur// gang zhig/
'dir ni sdug bsngal zhing// gang zhig gzhan du sdug bsngal/ de dag thams cad mi bzad pa'i// sems 'di yang zhing g.yongs ba yis// lha dang lha min shazaklu// lto'abu srin por
gnas pa yi// gtso bo mchog gcig sems yin te// de nisaM da gsum rgyal po ba shin sems ni lha yi yul rnams dang// sems mi yul rnams su khrid/ sems ni ngan 'gro/
rnams su khridi// soms kyis skye dgu 'khyamapar byed// ngan pa med pa'i yul rnams kyis// 'khrul cing nyams par gyur pa'i sems// srid pa mes na bdas pa na// sdug bsngal
mtha' med pa la gnas// spyod pa cig la rtag tu sbas// bsnyen par dka' la stobs po che// nyams par byed lami mngon pa/ de ni mi brtan myur du 'gro// de 'dra'imasazhigang yin pa/
mkhas bamasani 'dul bar byed// de dag bdud kyis bcings las 'das// pha rol bde ba 'byung ba 'thob// rnam rtog mi zad g.yon na te/ de ni gting dang ga dka' zhing g.yo//
de lta bu la rten pa'i sems// dmyal ba'i g.yang sar nye bar ltung// nyes pa de dag las 'grol zhing// dbang po don gyi dbang mi 'gro// sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa// 'chimad
gnas su 'khrid par 'gyur// sems ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes// de ni rnal 'byor mchog la 'jug/ myur du gyur pa'i dbang gisasu// de bzhin de ni shin tu 'jug/ de ltar lasani byod
pa yis// 'brasabu de ni sna tshogs 'byung// gcig tu phra mo gcig spyad pa/ skad cig gnyis pa mo 'dug ste// de yi lus dang 'gro bani// 'jig rten mtha' na gang du khrid//
lamani ga n gnas 'gro 'gyur ba// thams cad du ni shes par dka'// gang du lus na 'gro ba dang// 'dug pa dang ni las byed pa// de yi las ni mthong 'gyur na// rnal 'byor de
[n ]/ni mi mthong ngo// de ni gdul bar dka' ba ste// de yi lus kyang mi rig go/ sems can kutagyi rtogs mi bzad// yang bar spyod lamig kyang med// sdig dang/
mo ga mi byed pa mthong// de ni sgyu ma lta bu yin// de yi rtog pa mi'i gcing// 'gro ba med pase mthong ngo// tshe rabs dag ni khargya snyedadu// skye bo thams cad khrid byed pa// 'di ni
pa'i mtshon gyis mchod cing// mi yis srog par mi byed do// skye bo mgemed thams cad ni// gcod par byed cing sreg par byed/ las kyi thag pa dam po yis// skye bo bcing ba
h+pha sdug bsngal che// tshorabs dag ni stong snod du// khrid par byed kyang mi mthong ngo// skad cag tuni dag byed cing// skad cig tu ni mi deg byed// dag dang mi dag byed pa yi// sems
du ba ni bde bar 'gyur// sgo drug nas ni byung ba yis// yul rnams la ni rab tu brkam// 'jig rten mthar ni soms khrid pa// nyon mongs pa yang merig go/ de ltar dge slong
sku des legs par byas pa chen po de chud dur bsgyur ba mthong nas/ yid la legs par byas pa shes bya ba'i las kyi phal lam lha gzhan du 'gyur ba shagan/ 'di ltar do sems gtso bo'i
dbang dang/ soms yodas su 'gyur ba'i dbang gis dud 'gror grub pa la zhes brjod de/ de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum rtsa gsum
[s;]pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sa rnam mdzes na gnas pa zhes bya baji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skyo gar/
'gyur snyam nas/ sa thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ gang bdag nyid tshul khrims bsrungasashing/ gzhan yang bsrud du bcug/ bdag nyid sdig pa mi byed cing/ gzhan
yang zlog par byed/ skyon du bgrang bar byed la// tshul khrims la'ang rab tu bkod/ de dag nyid kyang tshul khrims dri ma med pa brtan pa dang/ skarab sdogs yongs su dgapa srung bar byed pa dang/
srogagacod pa dang/ mabyin par len pa spyas pa yin te/ srog gcod pa rnam pa du spangs shin/ 'dir sdom pas bsdams pas sems can mang po dang/ grog spur mang bo dang sdig pa
mang po dang/ sprul pa mang po dang/ srog chags nag pa mang po dang/ no'u lamang po gnas pa'is brkos pa gang gisasems can la gnod par 'gyur ba skyob mi byed la/ gzhan sdom pa
blangs pa 'am/ sdom pa ma byas pa yang phyir zlog par byed/ skyon du bgrang bar byed/ 'gog par byed/ 'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o// ma byin par lenapa spangs pa'i tshul
khrims ji ltar 'dzinicin/ 'di la rdza mkhan nam/ gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la rkusems kyis cung zad tsam yang mi lenal/ gzhan lenana'ang phyir zlog par byed cid/ tshul khrims la
0 thug rab tu 'a ldog par byed la/ rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa yin te/ de ltar srog gcod pa dang/ mabyin par 'an pa rnam par spangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims l
spyod pa de/ lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho i kyi 'jig rten rnam par mdzes na gnas pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dga' zhing glu dbyangs dang/ bgad pa dang/ rtsis pa dang/
sgarab tu rtsis pa dang/ dga' dgur spyod pa skye bo rang gi 'od dang ldan pas rtag tugang ba'i tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal gyi gnas rnams su skyabar 'gyur te/ tshul khrims
bzang po bsrung ba mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// las bya ba legs par byas pa de'i yul shin tu nyams dga' zhang les spyod dang ldan pa'i 'byor pa 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ tshal
de kun nas gsar gyi dra ba'i skud pas nye bar sbrelacing dril bu g.yer ka'i sgrasi li la 'byung ngo// de la dril bu g.yer kha'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gang las kyis byas pa'i ba rmas
dril bu g.yer kha rgyang ring po 'di nas mthong nas/ 'di ltar las bya ba legs par byas pa zhi ba khyod byon pa lta zhes sma zhang/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ yid ni shin tu dang ba yis//
tshul khrims dag ni gang bsrungs pa// de ni tshul khrims bsrung ba yis// bde ba 'dir ni nye bar gnas// tshul khrims legs par bsrungs ba dang// goms pa du ma byas pa yis//
yongs su 'gyur ba bde ba dang// mya ngan 'das pa'i ng rtogs par 'gyur// tshul khrims ngan 'gro rnams las skyob// tshul khrims bzang 'gror khrid par byed// de ltar tshul khrims rtag tu
srus// yongs su 'gyur ba'i bsil ba yin// 'chi dus yang dag byung ba'i tsho// tshul ldan g las 'jigs pa med// ngan 'gro las skyob bdag las med// tshul khrims skyob pa'i
mchog yin no// den khyod de tshul chen gyis// thams cad du nibasdus pa yin// lha yi gnas su 'os pa dag/ shin tu bag med ma byed cig/ de ltar lha de legs par byas pa'i
las kyis dril bu g.yoraka'i sgra de bag med pa'i nyes pa rnams khong du chud par byed do// de nas gang lca yul ring bar tshul khrims bsrungs pa de legs par khong du chud nas/ skad cig tsam
du'ang shin tubag med par ma byed do// gang gis tshe rabs mang po shin tu goms pa med pa de ni de'i tshos rnam par 'byin pa yi khed du mi chud par 'gyur la/ de ltar de phyir zhing shin tu bag med
bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar de yang dag pa khong du chud nas/ de nas yang gzhan du 'gro bar byed de tshal dang/ nyapa'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i gnasa rnams
ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do// rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'ang kun nas dpag tshad sum stong yod pa/ sa bzhi po 'di dag ste/ tshal chen po'i sa gzhi dang/ grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya
ba thams cad che ba yin la/ sa lhag ma gzhan dag ni chung ba yin no// tshal de'ang kun nas gru bzhi po yin te/ tshal de'i ngos bzhi la zhusashin tu dri ma med pa'i dpag

lobasamagyi shing chen po bzhi yodade/ shing de dag gis bod rgyar kun nas dpag tshad tsamal/ 'di du dpag tshad lnga stod du 'byung ste/ shing de dag gi 'od nyi ma bzhin dusnang ngo// shing de dag gi yal
ka gdang lo ma rnams la lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rtse bar byed ming/ yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa de/ de dag las 'thob bo// shing de dag gi dbusan/ rnam mdzes kyi tshal de kun nas gsar
dang/ dngul dang/ bozum+ma'i pad+ma'i rdzing rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas/ gser btso ma dri ma med pa'i gang ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas/ kun nas zhang ma rmos pa chen
bo si tu dri ma med cingagIn tu gtsang ba dang/ shin tu ro shami pa dang/ brtson 'grus chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas/ bya dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu mthong na yid du 'thad pa/ thosan nyams
dga' ba/ sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes bar byas go/ tshal ren gang bya dngul gyi sgro yod pa de dag gi mgo gsaral/ lto ba bo nyan/ mchuka ka ru/ mag pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu yin/
ta/ de ltar bya thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dbye'o// gshing rnams kyi kha dog dngul lta bu de dag gi stod na gser gyi bya rnams gnasagang gsar gyi shing ljon pa de dag la dngul gyi bya rnams
gnas/ gang po sla'i shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga'i gsab gsob na bya pad+ma ru ga'i mdog lta bu gnas/ gangashing ljon pa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu de dag la bya mthon ka'i kha dog lta burgyu ste//

'bras bu thams cad la za zhang sbrang rtsi dag la'ang 'thung ngo// gang kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams la rin po sna bdun gyi sbyo bkra ba'ibya de dag kyang rtsa bar byed/ skad 'byin par byed
do// de ltar bung ba'itshogs kyang pad+ma mang po rnams kyi nang na/ lasasna tshogs byas pa/ lus bkra ba/ dus kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yod pa/ pad+ma'i gseb tu zhugs shing the ba'i gsab
gseb na gnas pa rnams dga' bar byed/ phan tshun rtse bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// de ltar shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i grib ma yon tan kun 'byor pa'i stong na lha rnams lha mo/
tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// tshal de'ang lha thams cad kyi yon tan kun shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gang gi tshe lha rnams lham yin rnams dang
g.yul 'gyod par 'gyur ba de'i tshelcari rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di ltar/ lha rnams sta gon gyis shog/ ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'di dag lha rnams la mngon par gnod par byed
kyis chos shig ces bsgo'o// de thos nas sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang// brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba dag
rnamams kyi tshal du 'jug go/ de rnams zhugs nas kyang phyogs bzhi dgag phyogs ga la ba de rnams ni/ lha'i ba cha ma'ishing ljon pa chen bo shin tu dri ma med pa
bzhi yod// de dag gi sdong po gang yin pa de dag lam long bzhin du lhan ms kyi lus mngon no// de dag rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba dang yang lha gang dag lha dang lha ma yin gyi
kha g.yul 'gyod pa na yan lag dang bral ba'am/ chad par 'gyur ba rang gi spyod pa gzugs bar n gang 'byung ba shing de rnams kyi nang na snang// gang lA'i yan lagachad par 'gyur ba
zla de dag de nyid du 'ang phyir skyo bar 'gyural/ gang de'i mgo gcod pa 'am/ nad pa gcod pa na ma gtogs te/ deltar lha de dag phyir sa bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar lha mgo na
pa 'am/ rkad pa gcod par 'gyur ba de de bzhin bdag nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bdag nyid de mthong nas lha de dag la bsnyad do// rtsa de rnams de 'chi ba'i dus yodasau
tsho grang ba'i don du brgya byin la 'di ltar l 'di dag ni lham in nams dang g.yul 'gyod pa'i tsho'agum par 'gyur ro zhes bsad do// de thos nas brgya byin gyis grogs po khyed g.yul 'gyur
ram 'gro 'gi/ khyod kyi tshe'i bar chad du ma gyur cig ces zlog par byed do// 'bras bu de gang gi yin zhig gu snyam du dag nod de sems par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i sa
bad pas brtags na/ soms dang yid snying rje dang ldan par gyur pa gang gisan pas bsad par bshams pa las/ thar par byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des rnam mdzes u shing ljon

pa'i rnam pa de lta bu skya sto/ ma long lta bu'i gyur pa de la gzugs bar nasnang ngo// de nas yang lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga lakha der 'dong ngo// stong nas kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'idabusan
tshal yod de/ de'ang 'dod pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nyi bar mdzes par byas pa yane la/ der zhugs nas kyang lha rnams gros byed do// 'di ltar lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi dpung cho
chung la ams par byed de/ lha ma yin rnams dpung gang dang ldan zhig/ lha rnams dpung gang dang ldan 'gaces lca de rnams phan tshun spyod par byed do// de nas lha'irgyal po brgya byin gyis/ lha rnams
la smras pa/ chos la rton pa dodag ni chos kyis lha rnams kyis lha rnams kyin ng du skye bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tsha'adzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi rnams rtsod pa'i dus su dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
gtsakhor 'dzin cing/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te spyod pa dang/ pha rol yang spyod du 'jug pa dang/ lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims rnam pa bdun yang mural bu dang/ ma
zhig pa dang/ ma nyams pa dang/ bstan zhange tshul 'chos pa med par bsres pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skyobar 'gyur te/ ji ltar skyo ba
dbye mas bkang ba kha thur du bstan pa'i bye ma'i shugs 'bab pa bzhin du de ltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nad du skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar lha'i dpunga mngon par 'phel la/ lcam
yin gyi dpung yongs su 'grib lta/ lham man gyi brtson 'grus zhan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ ri bo khrub la gnas pa'i lham yin kyi dpung lha rnams kyis zlog pa nyid du byed do// des dus gzhan du
'a7 las kyi lam dri ma can spyod pa'i mi rnams dge ba'i las kyi lam ral ba dang/ zhig pa dang/ nyams pa dang/ brtan por mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas
[= ]lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa a cha rab tu smin pa dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas yon du sgul bar byed do// den duskul ban ji ltar sa cha ltung ba
doltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyobar 'gyur ro// de nas yong dus dmas pan ]dag bshan tu drimatsan spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba rnams lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims mi bsrung zhing shin tu brtan
tshu por mi spyod shin tu dkar ba ma yin/ rtag bar ma yan pa de dag 'chiba'i dus byas nas/ lcashin tu dman pa rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa bal sbom po brtanang

'bras bu ma smin par gyur pa la ma stobs chung ngu'i 'dom gyis 'khyud nas shin tu skul bar byed pa de tshogs chen po shin tu skul bar byed do// gang skul bar byed pa de dag kyang shin tu zhan pa yin te/

0 de sgul ba nu b.li 'bras bu gang zhig 'bab pan smyon pa nyung zad cig 'bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ da ltar gyi mi tshul khrims dri ma can de lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur// lha khyed cag kyang
bal bshade bag med la gnas la// shin tu bag med pa la gnas pa de ni bag med pas chog ste/ lha ma yin gyi dpung ni 'thal la/ lha'i dpungan 'grub bo// de ltar chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i
mi rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul dang/ lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims rnam pa bdun mi spyod cing/ ma rungs pa// pha rol gdung bar byed pa/ mar mi 'dzan pa// na mi 'dzan pa/ chos m
yin pa dang ldan pa// chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyobar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ spro ba bye
mas bkang ba'i kha thur du bstan nas/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas ji ltar khas blugs te gtong ba de bzhin du/ da ltar gyi mi rnams sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ lha ma yin
rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal tedag ba dang mi dag ba spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba dag de ltar tshul khrims phyogs gcig ga pa cung zad dang/ lus cung zad/ ngag gi cung zad bsrung ba
de'i tshe/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ khacig ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nad du skyo la khacig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ 'di lta ste/ shangeljon
phug/ ba am smin pa dag la/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'dom gyis 'khyud pa dag gang a ma rab tusminapa'i 'bras bu de dang de dag ltung bar 'gyural/ gang ma smin pa de dag ni/
ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dge ba 'dres par spyod pa'i minams khacig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye la/ khacig ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du/
skyo bar 'gyur// gang gi tshathamasacad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba/ mar mi 'dzin/ phur mi 'dzani/ dag sbyod du mi 'an/ bram zer mi 'dzin/ rigs kyi rgan rabs
klu kyirjes su mi 'jug pa// lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims tsud zad kyang mi bsrung ba de'i/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sam can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang//
lcam yin ms kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de'atsholta ma yin gyi stobs ni 'phel lo// lha'i stobs ni yosasu 'grib bo// de la nga'ang lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyod par 'gro ste/ da nyid
ngas rgyal bar nus kyi/ lha gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// de ltar 'di yid 'byosal/ lha rnams chos la 'bad par gyisashagi/ chos la yang dag par dga' bas ni'ajig rten de dang nga go
can du bsrungs bar 'gyur ro// mthu rnams kyi nangan ni ches mthu che ste/ gzhan mthur mi snang ngo// de ltar yid la bya ba 'di mde la byos te/ lha ma yin pham par bya ba larab tu 'bod cig/
de skad bsgo ba dang/ brgya byin la 'di skad lcasaso// ji ltar khyod kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du sgrub cing mchisatwaM/ ji ltar brgya byin gyis bdag cag la bka' stsal pa/bzhana'o zhes smras nas

go ma tshal ga la ba der go cha bgo ba'i don du 'dong bar byed do// de nas shing de dag las lha rnams kyi go cha mi spyod pa dag rab tu 'byung ste/ gang gon nas lus mi byed pa rnams de ltar thams cad rnam

'a spyod ngo// ji ltar ri bo'i rtse la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'od dmar po 'char ba de ltar brjid pa na ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der g.yul 'khyodapa'i don du 'dong bar byed de/ de nas yang lha dang lha
ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa snga ma bzhin du de rnams g.yul 'gyed do// de nas gang lha de rnams rnam mdzes su so sor gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyi de dag phan
tshun grogs su gyur pa// yid 'dod chags kyis rab tu myos pa kun 'di lta ste/ bai DUrma'atshal dang/ gsaragyi shing ljon pa'i tshal dang/ rAni po che ka ke ru'i tshal dang/ lha'i me tog dang 'bras
bu 'byor pa dang/ bya sgra snatshogs 'byin pa dga' ba rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo// de nas yang dag so la lus kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa desum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha'i bya rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rjes su sems par byed do/ bya 'di dag las gang gas kha dog dang cha byad sna chags su 'dug pa dang/ sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang//
na po tsho'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi nang na bde bar 'khod cing tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed/ rtsi bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed snyam mo//
las kyi de khon zhib mor shes pa de las kyi 'bras bu la rtogs par byed de/ des thos ba las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ ri mo mkhan glu za ba sems la g.yo med pa gang gis
yod gzugs sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mos tshal tshon rtsi kha dog bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dri ba 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang/ sor po dang dmar po dang/ 'dres pa
rnams kyis rtsig des sam/ gtsug lag khang dam/ mchod rten gyi khang pa'i nang dusaargyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi gla zabasashing ljon pa dang/ bya dang/ mi dang/ stag dang/ rta dang/
grong khyer dang/ tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/ skyed mos tshul dang/ pad+ma'i tshal dang mtsho dang dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ grong dang/ tshong rdal dang/ gzhal med khang
la sogs pa bris pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yon bdag rnams kyi lung bzhin du bzo bo gla pa las byed pa rnams kyis gzhi bsnyams pa dang/ byugs pa dang/
gsaradang/ dngul las byas pa'i m/ zas las byas pa'i m/ de dag la sogs pa gzugs gzhan dag tshon rtsi bzang po dag gis snatshog sasu bris na/ de dag lus dang bral nas bde
'gro lha rnams kyi nang du 'dra ba de bzhin du byar skya'o// tshul khrims spungs pa// las sna tshogs byas pa des/ ridags dad bung bar gyur nas/ dga' bar byed do// de ltar lha rnams kyi las
dang 'bras bu 'thun par 'gyur te joltar blun po de rnams kyi las de dag sems pa la'ani byas pa de bzhin du/ de dag blun por gyur nas lha rnams kyi tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal bde ba dang/
shing ljon pa dang/ ri'i rtsa mo rnams su bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur// gang gis jiltar gzhi sbyangs pa dang/ byugs pa dang/ bal gling giso'am/ dngul lam/ gser la sogs
pa la gzugs ji lta ba bzhin byas pa ni/ las rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i gzugs rgya'i 'bur lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro// lha de dag kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de na jisrid du 'dod pa sdug pa/
yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so sor yang dag par sbyong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha dang lha mo'i tshogs yongs su bskorab/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur/
spyod par byed/ rtsi bar byed de/ lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro// de zad nas/ de nas yang 'chi bar 'gyur te// shin s kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can damal
ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba legs par byas pa'i las mi dang soso yang dgapar myong bar 'gyur
]bas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/ legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba/ bde bar gnas pa'i bde bas//
rgyal po 'am/ rgyal tshab tu yang dag par 'grub la/ skye bo du mas mchod par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu skyed mos tshal la dga' ba dang/ rtag tu dga' ston la dga' ba dang/ rtag tu yid 'ab/
tsha du dga' zhing/ gzugs dang/ rgyan dang/ cha byad bzang ba dang/ rtag tu bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kha zas gzhan bca' ba bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang/ rtag tu mal cha dad/
skyed mos tshal du gnas pa// bde ba dang ldan pa dang/ bran po dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ zhashas 'tsho ba dang/ 'khor ba dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo/
de nas tshang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes ba de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rtsa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung bar shes pas lha rnams kyis
zla mos 'dun gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gas skyobar 'gyur/mnas/ des thos pa las byung ba shes pas brtags na/ skyes bu dam pa
shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa// gang gis pha la gos dang/ zas dong mal cha dang/ na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad yongs su byin la/ gzhan dag kyang dgaba'i las de nyid la 'jog par byed
cing/ yang dag par 'jog par byed la/ so sor 'jog par byed de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang/ srog gcod phra mo'ang bsrung pa yin te/ 'bras bu smane pa rul bar gyur
pa'i na ngan srin bu yod par bag tshanas za bar mi byed la/ gzhan dag za na'ang zlog par byadang smod par byed la/ de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims bsrung/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims lo rab
tu 'jog par byed do// ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spangs shen/ 'di la ma byanapar len pa 'di lta ste/ mtshamasasu byas bar bya ba dang/ 'bras bu gsar pa shugasakyis khyer ter
ba 'am/ kun dga' bor lhung ste bor ba'ang sbyor bar byed l/ gzhan yang zlog cing len pa la smod par byed/ dag ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed pa// bdag dang gzhan la ngan par zhugs
pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas/ shi ba'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhan ms kyis skyabar 'gyur te/ yos 'du na gnas ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du smyo bar 'gyur ro// shing ljon
ba gcig bu de lhag par mdzes pa yin te/ gang gi tshachos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjesasu 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ban/ 'di ltar yang lha'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi bya ba legs par byas pa dang/
nyos par byas pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi spyad pa legs par byas pa dang/ nyes par byas pa'i nang na de dridang mdog dang/ me tog dang/ lo ma dang/ 'bras bu phun sumatshogs
pa yin no zhes de rjod par byed do// gang gi tshi 'dzam bu'i klad du chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/ shing mos pa 'dus brtol ma tog rgyas pa/
[D]'byung zhing dpag tshad brgyar dri 'byungal/ 'od kyis rnam pa mdzes te/ gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar ba de'i tsho/ sum nu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid dga' nas/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol
yongs su bskor te 'khod la/ am 'di ltar yos 'dus brtol rnam pa thams cad du ma togargyas pa 'di gor ma chag par 'dzam bu'i glarig mi rnams dag sbyong du 'dzin/ bram zer 'an/ shis
kyi rgan rabs la mchod pa byed/ gas kyirgan rabs kyi rjes su zhugs pa lta zhigasto/ 2diltar bdag cag gi shing ljon pa 'di rnam pa thams cad du me tog rab tu rgyas so snyam sems so// lcade

dag de dang nye bar dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis gnas par byed do// gang gi tshashing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog gi rnam pa phud rgyas pa de'i
lci sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shin tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ om 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams gor ma chag par tshul khrims 'dres par spyod pa la zhugs pa de'i tsho shid yongs 'dus
brtol gyi ma tog gi rnam pa 'dres par byung bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba de'i/ shing yodaso 'dus brtol thams cad du lo ma dang 'dab
mas par 'gyur 'di/ de bzhin du mdog kyang mi sdug/ de bzhin du drirang mi zhim/ de bzhi yod kyang mi gsal te/ dper na dgun khug rna dang sprin gyis 'khrigasan/ nyi ma'i 'od rapa tu drob
dang ldan pa med la/ 'od kyi mthu nyams pasems tsana rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shing yos 'dus brtol gyi 'od chung la/ dri'i rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhid
'od kyis gnas par mi 'gyur ba de'atshi/ shing yongs 'dus brtol na gnas pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la lha skyemangashing yongs 'du sa brtol 'od chungazhing dris bdar la/ ji ltar sngon mdzes
pa dang ldan pa de ltar mdzes ba ma lags te/ gor ma bkum par 'dzam bu gling na skye dgu chos ma lags par bgyid pa/ nag sbyod dum 'dzan pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ gus kyi rgan rabs
kyi rjes su mi 'jug ba dag mchis so zhes bsnyadado// ltari rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thosanas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs blos te/ shang yongs 'dus brtol ga la ba der lha'itshogs dang
lhan cig yongs su bskor nas 'dong bar byed// sangs rgyas la shin tu gus pa skyes shing/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tanaman par dran pa na/ lha rnams la 'di ltar shing yodas 'dus brtol
'di thams cad du lam rAsi bar gyur par shing yongs 'dus brtol la la ba der lo'i 'gro yis/ lha gzhan de dag chos shig/ 'di ltar bdagazhi shin tugasal bar gnas pa'i mchod rten
khyer bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs thogs te/ shing gi rgyal po de ga la ba der song la/ shing de'i drung du bdag bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/

[R]1 byug pas mchod pa bya'o bas de skad smras so// de nas brgya byin gyi tshig lha rnams kyis thos nas/ lha brgya phrag stong du ma dag lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin ga la ba der dong ngo// brgya byin yang sangs rgyas/
kyi sku gzugs spyi bo la khyer nas/ shing yongs 'dus brtol ga la ba der dong ba dang/ shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung du gnas pa'i lhagazhan dag gis rgyang range po nyid nasa mthong ste/ na
yongs 'dus ba rtol gyi lo ma rIs par gyur cing 'od mi gsal la/ dpal dang ldan pa med nas/ yid shAn tu lhag par mi dga' 'o// de nas brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de shing ga
pa/ drud du gser btso ma lta bu'i sa gzhi la/ brturma'i gdan gyi steng du bzhag nas/ lha'i tshogs dang bas pa dad pa skyes pa dngabs pa'i ma gro thamasacad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
zla sridang tshal gyi ma tog mali ka dang/ man ra ba dang/ pad+madrug ste/ rnam pa de lta bu'i spos dang me tog rnams kyis bkrus shing mchod pa byas nas/ brgya byin gyis lha rnams la/ ji ltar
lha dag dad pa yang dag par skyes pa nisorasna dang bral zhing bag med pa dang bral ba la gnas par dga' ba yin te/ de ltar sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ 'phags pa'i tshogs ni khams
gsum pa'i bla ma yin la/ bdag cag gi bla ma'ang yin no zhes skyas so// de nas lhadad pa skyes pa thams cad sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'abyed do// de nas de'i tshabargya byin gyis 'ad lta8
tshigs su bcad de smasapa/ samasacan kun gyi gnyen gcig pa// srid pa'i dug las namagrol khang// srid pa'i snga rol yad dag rgal// thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
brgya byin thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor cing pus mo btsugs nas/ 'di ltar tshags su bcad de smras pa//
sems can kun gyi gtso gcig pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcom// ramisand mad cing mtshungs med pa// thams cad makhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha'i tshogs de dag
thamasacad kyadangashang gi rgyal po de yongs su bskor nas 'khrid de/ thams cad dar ba yang dag par skyes pa thams cad dbang po gzhol ba'i lha kun ji lta ji ltar sams dad yid dag zhing/ sas
rgyas dang chos la phal cher mchod pa byed pa de lta de ltar shing 'dab ma bye nas kha 'bye bar 'gyur// de nas de mthong nas/ de ltar phyir zhingashing yongs 'dus brtol rim gyis sngonabazhin du
ma toga rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur la/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'od kyis dpag tshad brgya dag tu mdzes te drisan khyab/ 'dab mni sbyin gyi mdog ltar dkar/ bung bas ni
nye bar mdzes par byas/ grib mnabade/ kun nas lha'i tshogs kun zhigang/ nyi ma gnyis pa ltar ni mdzes te/ de'i sngon gyi dpal de dag mthong nas lha rnams dga' bar 'gyu
ro dpag tshad brgyadag tu dri 'byung ba lngal/ myud yang dpagatshad brgya dag tu rab tu ldang sta/ dri yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhishigargyal po 'od kyisamadzes pa yin no// dper na ri bo stong phrag
drug cu thams cad kyi nangan pa'i rgyal po ri rab mdzes pa de bzhin du/ shang ljon b rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol de bzhin du nam par mdzes shing kun tu snang la lhan n
ba yin no// de nas dpal rdzogs shing dpal shin tu rgyas la/ dpal 'bar te/ kun nas kyang dpal 'bar ban/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// phan
tshun du 'di ltar lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi spyan mtshungs pa med pa'i mthu la ltos/ gang du sangs rgyas kyi mthus shing yos 'dus brtol 'di sngon gyi mdog dang/ dri dang/ 'phrang ba dang//
la ma dang/ 'od rnams yod de/ ji ltar 'od 'phel ba de ltar sum nu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang gor ma chag par stobs dang/ mthudang/ rdzu 'phrul byas pa'i ng chobar 'gyur/ 'dzam
bu'i gling gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang chos la blo gros 'jug ste/ chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa de dag da ltar nyi bar 'jug pani/ bdud kyi sgrub pa'i stobs 'batu chod par 'gyur zhing/
bdud kyiris kyi lha ma yin dang/ klu 'jig rten skyong ba chos ma yin ba dang ldan pa dang chos la bag gas byed pa mi 'gyur/ chos la smod par byed bar mi 'gyur la/ lhamo rnams kyi nad du lha/
bdag cag zil gyis gzhon pa mi 'gyur te/ shing gi rgyal po 'di mthong bas/ bdud kyi stobs nyams shing/ lha'i stobs rab tu 'bal ba'akhyod cag gis shes par gyis shigaces
saso// de nas brgya byin gyi nang du sngon du 'gro ba'i lha rnams de ltar tshun gtam yang dag par brjod pan/ de nas yang chos dad ldan zhang chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'jig rten skyong babazhi
dag 'dzam bu gling nas sum cu tsagasum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dunas ga la ba der dong bar byed do// de nas shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang ba dang/ yid rab tudang ba dang/ rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba gsal bsamachod pa byed na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gsargyad dang po nyid nas
mar de// de nas de dag gi drung du phyin nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la spyi bos phyag 'tshalasmras pa/ 'di ltar lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs ba
dgyes par mdzod cig/ da ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams chos spyod/ chos ma yin pa ni mi srod de/ mar 'dzin pa dang/phara'adzin pa/ dge slong da'adzin pa/
grubya// bram zer 'dzazhing/ rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams chos spyod kyisadagyes par mdzod cig/ de nas de dag las thos sa lha'i gtso bo brgya ban la sogs pa'i/
yid dga' ba mchog tu dga' sto/ de nas yang 'jig rten skyong ba dag la mchod nas 'di ltar mi'i 'jig rten na mi chos dang ldan pa rnams 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi kun dga' ba'i skal bar gyur cig/
pa'i de nas lha de dag thams cad kun dga' ba skyes par rig nas shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung dusaargyas bcom ldan 'das blangs pa de nas yang mchod nas/ lta'i 'dunas chos bzangag 'du ba de/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyer// lha gzhan lcagam gang yin pa de dag ni shing yongs 'dus brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin/ brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba 'de rab tu dga' ba rnams shing
ngas 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ shing gi rgyal po de'i drung du dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed/ yongs su
sprod par byed de/ lha yid rab tu dga' ba lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongasasu bskor ba dag dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed cig/ bdeb dang med pa nye bar myong bar byed do// de ltar
don gnas pa dbyar zla ba bzhir 'das pa dang/ de dag gi nang nas las dang u0f7czad pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba
0 ba zhin sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyin du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi dad so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas
mid gdar skal ba mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/ las ded da rgyu 'thun por de rtag tu gzugs bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdug ba dang/ yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ rtag tu bde zhing byad
bzhin kun gyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang/ rtse ba la dga' bar 'gyur rtag tudagod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rtsib la dga' zhing bud med thams cad kyis blta bar mngon par dga' bdang/
na tu bde ba dang ldan te/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ba mthong ngo/ de nas yang dag spyod las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha mas
kyis la rtog par byed de/ des thos las byung ba'i shes bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa rilha 'dres ba'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes myus ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der soms can dag las gang gis
skyakhar 'gyur snyam nas/ sa thos pa las byung ba rigs ngas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing/ sems can gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i sams yosasu bsgoms pa'i snying
da ldan ba gang gsi yon tan mchog dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab dang ldan pa 'am/ nad pa la zakatshig mi na pa dang/ bdag nyid kyang srog gcod par mi byed la/
[r/ ]@#// shing ljon pa'i gseb na grog sprum/ srog chags ma ko ta ka 'am/ sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bu gzhan dag la/ ba lad rje'am/ phyags 'a/ rdza mo rje'am/
glang bo'i rdzi 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan bong bu'iN+Di 'amaM/ rta rdzi dgun gyi dus sam/ dgun smad kyi dus su grang bas nyen te/ 'brog dgon pa dag tu phyin nas me busanaM/ skyes bu dam pa sems
can la phan par zhugs pa des/ mde chu 'aa thal bas zhi bar byas nas/ srin bu de dag thar par byed pa dang/ gzhan srog gcod par byed pa yang phyir zlog par byed/ bdag nyid kyang mi
[ ]byed la/ gal te byas pa zhig yod na'an de smod par byed/ so sor 'chags par byed/ gzhan la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/ skyon du bsrung bar byed/ 'jog par mi byed/ lam bde
ba la rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de ltar rnam pa de dag dang/ tshul de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no// ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin snyam na/ 'di la ma byin par len pa mi len/
zla pa yin no// ma byin par len pa mi len pa'i rnam pa du yod snyam na/ 'di lta ste/ dgun dang/ dgun smad grang ba'i dus su shing skam po med pa/ shing ljon pa med pa'i dgon par lam du
zhugs pa de na/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ glang po che'i rje 'am/ rnga mo'i rdzi gang bas nyen pa dag gis ma bud pa'i phyir ma/ mtshan mo bsro bar bya ba'i phyir ba leng gi lciba'am/ glang po che'ilci ba
'am la ma 'am/'dab ma 'am/ shing bur dag sbyangs te bzhag pa de dag la lam du zhugs pa de grang bsangashin tunyin par gyur kyang/ pha rol gyi yin nosnyam du bsams nas/ rkuba'asams/
kyis len par mi byed/ pha rol len pa'i ng zlog par byed/ gal te bdag gis blangs na/ de'achags par byed la phyir zhing mo byed/ gzhan dag kyang lam dge ba la rab tu 'jog par byed/
gzhan gyis blangs pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/ las kyi nyer bsdogs dang/ las kyi mjug ma byin par len pa las byung ba zlog par byed cing/ bdag nyid kyang mi byed pa yin te/
sdig pa'i las rdul phran tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa/ralta ba'i skyes bu dag ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lca 'dres pa'i 'graman gnas pa'i lhan ms
kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sa de2na 'di lta ste/ dngul gyi sa gzhi la gsar rnams kyis bkra bar brgyan/ gsor rnams kyis 'gram de 'ang bkra bar brgyan
dngul gyis bkra bar brgyan pa'i ng de bzhin bkra bar brgyan/ de bzhin du ka rus bkrakhar brgyan ba dang/ de bzhin du rdo rje mang pos bkra bar brgyan pa yin te/ de ltar s de las kyi 'bras bu dang
'thun par rnam par mdzes pa/ na po chesna tshogs kyis spras pa// shing ljon pa'i rgyananam pa sna tshog sakyis brgyan pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas ngashang/ sdug par byas pa/
kun nas ri dgas dang bya sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ ri dgas dang bya'i kha dog sna tshogs kyis 'gram lebs nga// tshal dang nye ba'i tshal yang rinapo che bdun
rnam pa du ma dag gis nyebar mdzes par byas pa yin no// de nas tshal de na 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa lcashing gsoban 'khod pa rnams lus kun gser btso mas brgyan cing/ lha mo brgya
phrag gis yongs su bsko ba/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lta 'byobacing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ de dag rnam pa ji srid du 'gram gang dang gang du gnas shing/ rin po tsho'i
'od gang gis brgyan pa'i rnam pa de sude du lus thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'gyur te/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa de rnams kyi 'od kyis lus thams cad brgyan pa nyid yin no// shing ljon pa de dag
gi drung du song nas bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// de ltar de dag gis dga' bar byas nas/ lha mo de rnams dang lagacig tu 'bab chu'i
tshal ga la ba der dong bar byed do// 'bab chu'i tshal de'ang kun nas gsar gyi shing ljon pa 'gram na skyes pa rnams kyis khebs pa yin te/ shing ljon pa de rnams kyis lo ma ser pos
khebs pa'i 'od kyis 'bab chu kun nas ser bo'i 'gyur te/ de dag drag tu 'bab kyang de dkarapo nyid du mi mngon no// shing ljon pa rnams kyi gsab gsob na lha gang dag lha mo dang lhan cig
dga' bar byed/ longs su spyod par byed pa de dag 'di snyam dusems te/ 'di ltar shing ljon pa rnams kyi yal ga dag rdol nas/ bdag cag rnams kyi chang zhim po 'byung bar gyur cig snyan
mo// de nas sems bskyed ma thag tu shing ljon pa de dag rel nas/ lha rnams kyi dgo ba'i las des chad ro dang/ mdog dang/ drisnyatshogs dang ldan pa dag byung nas/ gang ldan pa'i la
ga dag las 'bab bo// de 'bab pa na lha dag gis mngon par mthong nas/ snod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcus te/ rin po che'i snod rnam pa sna tshogs thogs nas/ de dag 'thung bar byed de/
lta'i chad bde ba des brgya snyad du myos so// chang des myos pa rnams bud med mthong ba'i bde ba srid pa'i mas kun nas srog par byed kyang bgrogs so snyam du mi sams te/ bde bas bsgribs pa
rnams sems pamed do// de nas yar lha de rnams 'disAm sems te/ ji lta ji ltar lha'i thos pa nyams dga' ba/ rtag tu dga' bar byed pa'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bdag cag gis mnyan
par bya'o snyam mo//dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bam po so bzhi pa// de ltar sems bskyedam thag nyid du dge ba'i las des la
mo'i sgrungashing ljon pa rnams la dang de dag rlung gis skyod par byed do// de dag bskyod pa na/ lam de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/ jiltar sil snyan yan lag lnga
dang ldan pa'i sgra snyan sam zhes byed pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de lta bu'i sgra kun tu thes par 'gyur ro// sgra de dag thos nas kyang lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di/

lo1 ltar dgashing dag lasabadud rtsi 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo// de ltar sems bskyed mal+lag nyid du ji ltar bro ba kha thur du bstan pa rnams kyi nang nas kha 'am kha la'i dum bu 'dog dpe med ba dang ldan pa
'byung ba de bzhin du/ shing ljon pa rnams las bdud rtsi 'byungs/ de dag lha rnams za bar byed do// des tshims nas glu dbyangs dang/ sil snyan gyi dgra 'byung ba rnams nyibalen bzhin du rin po che'is
ga laM ba der lha mig mi 'dzum par rgyu ba rnams 'dong bar byed do// de dag rin po che'isar dar nas natsun grogs su gyur/ 'dod chags lhura'adzan par soms pa yin te/ der yid zhugs ra/ der
dga' bar gyurapa// de dang 'thun po'i spyod pa dang/ dga' ba lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byoratsang ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// tshal de nas yang kun

nas tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed/ 'dong bar byed do// tshal de na bya'i rigs bdun la 'di lta ste/ gser gyi ngang pa khacig 'an po che sna bdun lta bu dang/ ri tsho kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa kha
cig an+darIl lta bu dang/ bya ka rand ba khag ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu dang/ kha gan biT+Tharma lta bu dang/ dur pa kha cig an+darIl lta bu yin la/ kha cig sdug lta bu dang/ rma bya kha dog bzhi po
0 chosna bdun lta bu yin la/ khacig mthon ka lta bu dang/ shang shang te'u sna tshogs su 'dug ste/ khacig byu ru lta bu dang/ byaka la bderani po che sna bdun lta bu yin la/ khacig dngul gyi mdeg/
lcabu yin no// de dag thams cad mthong pa'i bde ba sgrasnyan cing 'dzebs pa 'byin pa la mkhas pa yin te/ kha cig nam mkha' la bdag nyid phan tshun 'khor lo bzhin byas nas/ rtsi bar byed de/

jiltar lha rnams kyi yol mo'i sgra 'byung ba de ltar yongs su 'byin par byed cing/ ji ltar lha mo'i tshogs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la shin tu chags par 'gyur ba de ltar gzhan dag 'byung bar byed do//
(gzhan kha cig pad+ma'itshal bung ba'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa rnams su bya mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed/ skad 'byin par byed do// gzhan dag kyang skams la 'dug nas/
bu mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyodangar byed do/ gzhan dag gsar dang dngul gyi shing ljon pa 'dabam sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams kyin ngaman/
da'i grib mas lus mno par brgyan pa rnams rtse bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de ltar bya de dag dga' bar byed do// de nas bya de rnams yongs su rtsa ban lhade rnams kyis mthong nas/ de nas

yang rab tu dga' ba'i yade dang/ rnar snyan pa'i yid kyis bya'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byin bdo bar thos so// de nas lha de dag dang/ lha mo de dag kyang nam mkha' largyu ba de dag gi nang du zhugs nas/
nam mkha' la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do// de bzhin du bya chu nargyu b rnams dang lhagacig chu'i nad rgyu skam la rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig skamal rgyu shang rtse bar byed do// lha de dag
kyang lha mo rnams dang lhan cig bya de dag dang de bzhin rtsa bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de nas dag slong des lhade dag dang (bya de dag mtshungs par 'dod pas sems phrogasashajimyos
pa rnams la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa// dud 'gro 'dod la spyod pa dag/ gti mug gis ni skyod pa yin// de lta bas na lha rnams ni// lha dang dud 'gro mtshungs pa yin// skal
ba bzang po theb pa'i mi// bag med rnams la mi spyod na// de ni mkhas pa zhes brjod de// de las bzlog pa gzhan yin no// lha rnams bag med pa yis phrogs// sems can dmyal bar ba
tu 'gro// de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams// bag med du'o dang 'dra bar brjod// blo ldan bag med rnam dag gis// sngar ni bde ba lta bura mthong// bag med las byung 'bras thob nas// don med de ni phyis
gdung ngo// skye bo mkhasapa phag med pa// don kun med par byed mthong nas// de ltar de las gzhan dge ba// gang yin bag med mi ston to// bag med gzhan du sdug bsngal 'de// bag yod gzhan du bde ba
ste// bag med pa dang bag yod dag/ mtshan nyid bsdus te gshad pa yin// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'dod 'gyur ba// de ni bag medazhin par byed// gang zhag shin tu bag med pa// rnams kyad bde ba
[s]mi 'thob bo// bag med bral ba dman// 'chib med nga'i gnas tshu 'gro// nang gin tu bag yodapa// dmal ba'i sdug bsngal mi myong ngo// gal te blo zhan lha rnams dang// dud/
'gro mAtshudas par rtsa byed na// lha rnams dang ni dud 'gro dag/ khyad par med pa nyidi yin no// lha dang lha ma yin dang ni// yi dgas de bzhin dmyal ba rnams// sa 'thun blo dang 'gro ba dag/ kun
tu mi mthun tha dadad/ blo mamathun la laAmamathun// la mi'athun las de bzhi gro// lasaamathun pa sna tshogs las// 'gro ba rnams kyang snang ba yazhi// lasa rnams snatshogs tha dad pas
lha rnams shin tu bgamod de// lha yi 'jig rten las ltung ba// khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro// gang tshe yi 'jig rten las// ltung bar 'gyur ba de tshowa// khyed kyi sdug bsngal nye ba yin//
bdag nyid bde ba shes par gyis// de ltar rtog pas naamasaMr nyams// bag med kyang bslus pa 'an// sred pas gdungs pa'i lo rnams ni// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur//
lha dag dmyal bar gang song ba// 'di shin tudabyab yin// rtsed mo nyams su len 'gyur mos// gnod pa mikhazad nyams su myong// srog chags sems ni rmos pa dag/ 'khor ba las ni
yadi mi 'byung// srid pas yongs su bsdus pa rnams// sdug bsngalasanosdugakhan la 'thob// de ltar dge slong des lha de rnams kyi shin tu bag med pa kheng du chud nas rjes su ston par byed do//
0/ @#// de nas lhade rnams yul gyi bde ba thams cad nye bar myong yang ji ltar mging la 'tshed pa ltar/ yul nams kyis tshim pa nyid medade/ ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de
po[ ]zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed la/ de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'od babade ba rjes su myong bar byed do// dezad nas de nas yang lca'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ gnas kyang
ka/ las lta bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhan sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgasadang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams

dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thunangar de rtag tu shin tu bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang skom mang ba'i yul du/ nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang po 'byor pa dang/ rgyal po 'am/
blon po chen po byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dpe klong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin nga shes pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des
thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas lha rnams kyi gnas tshang tshang gi 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa
las byung ba'ishes pas brtags na 1 somasacan skyes bu dam pa sems dge ba bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gas bsam gtan dang po thob pa'i dag slong dag la bsod snyoms byin zhing/ gzhan
0 dag kyang sbyin du 'jug/ byin bal rjes yin bshad/ gzhan dag kyang de 'debadudagakhar byed/ 'dzud par byed rab du 'jog par byed de/ de ltar sbyin pa la bdag nyid mngon
par dga' ba yin/ srog gcod pad/ mkhyen pa lanapadagadad labalta bzhig yin/'dimam byin ra'i napa spangs pa rnam pa du yod/ rnam pa ji lta bu yin zhen/ 'dun lam du
zhugs pan/ khron pa dang/ lteng ka la/ 'babachudag tu'agron bo rnams laphan par bya ba'i phyir chu rdzo'am/kham phor sbyar ba gang yin pa de dag la gzhan gyis 'di ltar dbye/'di ni rgya
zhing phyogs gzhan na'ang chu med la/ bdag cag la'ang na snod chu 'am/ bub khyer ba med de/de gal te bdag cag gis khronapa'i phyogs de nas ma khyer na/ skom pas bdag cag srog chad
par 'gyur re zhus bsal kyang/ de len pa'i byed pa yin hi/ bdag nyid som par shes kyang ma byin par len pa'i 'jig pasachu rdza 'am/ kham phor len par mi byed la/ gzhan len pa
la'ang rjes su yi rang ba'i mi byed/ phyir ldog par byed/ dgaba'ilam la rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de ltar man par len pa las pa yin zhing/ rnam pa de dag yin te/ srog chad par 'gyur yang
ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no/ srog gcod pa sangs pa ji lta bu yin/ rnam pa du yod ce na/ 'di la bdag nyid srog gcod par mi byed la/ gzhan byed pa dang phyir zlog par byed/ rab tu mi
('jog par byed/ byas na'ang skyon du bgrang zhing mad du skyod par byed pa yin no// 'di'i skar khung nas 'ong ba 'am g.yogs pa'i steng na 'dug pa ma/'a mnyam/ dud/
pas gdudas pa na/ srin bu bro'u'am/ grog spur phra mo dag la'ang kun nas gnod pa'i sems kyis gnod pa mkhyid/ srog dang bralakharami byed/ gzhan byed na'ang phyir zlog par byed//
skyon du bgrang bar byed/ dag pa'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed/ dgo ba'i mi bdag nyid dag ba byed cing gzhan yang rab tu 'jog par byed pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten/
'a sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dres pa'i 'gramanags pa'iskyob gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de dge ba'i las la spyodang/ las byas pa'i ma

parasmin pa las byung ban 'di lta ste/ dus kyi tshal rgya che zhes khyab 'byung ste/ tshal de na yozhi po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsalab/noro chesan+dal dang/ bod+harma'i drim med cing gsalal/ bya sna tshog sasgra
'byin pa// rnar snyan pa// dusatshags drug tu rtagab shing ljon pa/ mi tog mchog dutu rgyas pa/ 'bab chu dang/ chu klung dang/ lteng kasabargyan paM/ na pochi an+darAli dang/ bi d+harma'i pad+ma
nyams dga' kha/gsar btso ma'ir bo mthon pos brgyan pa/ tshu rgyu ba dang/ skam rgyu ba'i byar bo mthon po'i gsab gseb dang 'gram na gnas pa/ gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs su 'dug pa/
slaskad chen po 'byin pa rnams kyis brgyan pa/ dgaba'i las kyi sadus sngalaban lha de dge ba'i lasakyi 'bras bu la skyod de/ yuna'ang du bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par spyod do// lhamo'i tshogs
rnam pa snatshogs stong snyad kyis yongs subasotsa/ sgyu'i phreng bad gos gyonal/ dpala rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugasaMdang ldan pa de/ lha mo de dag nye bar glu dbyangs len cing yongs su spyod/
pa na tshal der rnam par rgyu bar byed do// de sgrub na dge ba'i las desabar ba'i bya rnams kyis 'diltar tshigs subacad de smas pa/dge ba'i las kyis skye bo dag/ myu yi yul du mchod par 'gyur//
de ltar mi dgas dmyal bo khrodi// las kyi 'gyur ba de'ago/ lta yo'ajig rten tho bzhi masu/ lha gang khyad du gsod mo byed// gang dusrid pas mi gnodapa// don bde las bde bar 'gro// las
kyi thag pa ring po yis// srid pa rgyu ba bcings pa rnams// dgra dga' khor los bcings pa ltar// dbang med las kyis 'khyam par byed// ji ltar mkha' la rlung zhugs kyis// phyag
dar dum bu gtor ba ltar// de ltar srid pa rgyu ba rnams// stongang thad kar 'khyamabar 'gyur// ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen dag las// pad+mabyung bamadzesapa ltar// de bzhin dge ba'i las kyis su//
lha yul dun byung mdzes// ji ltar nun bo dongasha// ji ltar nam mkha' ba dang ltar// de ltar sems narab dang ba// bde ba mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis lta dag bsrungs pa yis/
rtag tu bcing ba gsum las grol// chos gcig las rab 'das pa// lha yi 'jig rten mchod par 'gyur// de tsha med mang khrel med dang// rgod dang sdig pa'i grogs po na//
'di dag dug dang me dang 'dra// mkhas pas de dag srung bar gyis// bden dang sbyin dang de bzhin du// bzod dang rtag tu dge bshes gnyen// 'byung po rnams la rtag byams pa// lha yul gyi
niyam brgyags yin// mi dgasems la g.yo med pa// bde bas bskyod pa mnyam gzhag pa// rang gi las 'bras mngon sum ste// lha yi gnas su 'das pa yin// chos dad
ny+tsi chos min gtsor mi 'dzani// kun nas 'jig rten srog yin te// 'di ltar chos las skyob gzhan med// de bsachos la dga' bar gyis// gang zhig chos n yodas spradasanas// mi dge
nyes par byed la dga'// de ni skyes pas gdungs pa dngos// rtagatu sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten thob nasau// bag med rnams la chags 'gyur ba// de ni dag ba'ilaamatha2
zad// 'chinga'i mtha' ni mi rigago/ gang na 'chi bar 'gyur ba med// de ni rtag tu bde dang ligs// 'che ba'i zhags pas bcings pa dag/ nam yang bde ba yod ma yin// ji lta ji ltar bde thob pa//
de ltar srid pa'i tshogs 'phel la// de ltar srid pa'i mo yis gdungs pan// samasacan dmyal bar 'dren// lha la bag med mi rigs kyis// shin tu bag med ma byed cig/ bag med nyes
rnam nyams pas// sum cu rtsa gsum gnasas 'chi// de ltar bya de rnams kyisarjes su bstan pa na lha mos yid g.yos shing yul gyi srid pas/ blo gros dang/ blo phrogs pa dang/
bya'i sgra rnam par 'byin pa bden pa de thos pa mi 'gyur la/ detshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang lteng ka dang/ 'bab chu dag la rjes su rten par byed do// degal te kun dga' r ba bde bar
gnas pa'i lted ka zhes bya bar mtho ba ga la ba der 'dang bar byed do// ri mthobaden bya mdo bar dga' ba zhes bya ba bya mo rnams dang lhan cagi na tshun dga' zhing/ phan tshun shin tu lta 'dod pa

dag/ lteng ka dang pad+ma'i tshal sna tshogs de rnams su rtse bar byed do// de nas bya de rnams mthong nas/ lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kyaamabya gzugs snatshogs can 'di dag sgra sna tshogs 'byin ci'i
nyams dga' bar byed pa yin te/ mtho risakyi bya bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'thun par sgra 'byin pa 'am/ snatshogs su 'byin par byed pa'ibya de rnams kyi stod du gnas bcas la/ bdag zhon

te/ tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshaladang/ lteng ka dag bltasaMr bya'o snyam mo// de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du lha de dag gi bya rnams lus chen por gyur nas/ lha de dag ga la ba deramyur du nye bar 'dod
bar byed do// de nas lha des bya do dag la lag gis zhug par byed de// byugs nas kyang yin no// de nas bya rnams la zhon ma thag nyid du lhas sprul pa mngon par dga' ba'i bya tshogs dag nam mkha'
(la 'dong bar byed do// de nas bya sna tshogs pa de rnams kyi rgyab tu zhon ma thag nyid du yid la zhi bo che sna bdun gyi gzhal med 'ang tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal dang/ lteng ka dang/

'bab chu dang/ pad+ma phun sum tshogs shing bya rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar rtse bar sems par byed do// de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du bya de rnams kyi rgyab tu gzhal med khrang de dag ji ltar lta des/

'a yid la bsams pa de bzhin du 'byung ngo// de nas lha de dag gi phyi bzhin du lhamo cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa dag rjes su 'brang zhing nye bar spyod pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dong sto/ u la
nas yul dag tu 'dong bar byed la/ de thams cad lha'i bde ba dag gas rtsa zhing nye bar spyod pan/ mtho ris kyi gnas dag la dga' ba dad/ shin tu dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' bar rtog
! par byed de// des sa de dag la rtog rtog nas srid pa 'bum 'gyur gyis g.yeng bar byed de/'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi gnas dpar bya bar mi nus// de ltar sgo drug nas srid pa'i me 'bar ba

kyi/ mchog tu mi bzad pa med la 'bar ba yin te/ debade gzugs bar n lta bu'i sdug bsngal des mngon par nyamasabazhin du bya de rnams kyi stong du zhanonas/ siyasnyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra snyan pa yid

du'odob dpe med pa nye bar len nyid rir ba kyi zhabs thamasacad la lta bar byed de/ detshal dang/ nye ba'itshal dang/ lteng ka phun sum tshogs pa dang/ nags tshal dang/ ri ngos dang/ shing ljon pa dang/
phyogs gcig pa dang/ pad+ma'i tshal dums khebs pa dang/ bya sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang/ lha dang/ lha mo dang/ lha'i bu mo phan tshun rtse ban mthong ngo// yul den dga' ba 'bum phrag du ma yong
do/ yul shin tu rnam par phyoba'i dga' ba thams cad mthong yang 'dod pa rnams kyis de srid du tsham pa med pa nyidi yin te/ dga' ba'i 'dod chagasakyi mod las skyes pa'i sems kyis g.yos pa'isrid

pa'i lha de rnams yul dag gi dbang po rnams shin tu tshim pa med do// de ltar de yun ring po du mar bya'istong gzhal med khang na gnas pa desar bo khri phrag drug cu'i nang nara'i rgyal po ri rab 'dug
pa de dag thams cad la lta bar byed de/ lha las legs par byas pa thamasacad kyi gnas dpa med paM/ nyams dga' ba/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba/ ngos bzhi kun nas lham pa/ kha dog/
rnam pa bzhisan tu rnam par phye ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ bit+tArma dang/ dadul dang/ gsor dang/ shelangashin tu bzang ba'ar ba de la des ma lus par bltas nas rang rang gi gnas ga la
ba der 'dong bar byed do// de ltar bya rnams kyi ston zhon pa de dag bya de dag la sna tshogs usams par byed de/ ji lta ji ltar 'dog dang/ gzugs dang/ cha byad dang dbyibs bsams
pa de lta de ltar gyur ro// de nas yang de bya ri rnams kyi stong du yon nas/ rdzing chu dang pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do// rdzong de'ang kun nas dpag tshad lnga yod la/ kun nas
lham pa/ rin po chaan+darAl dang/ brgya rnams kyis sna tshogs su brgyan cing/ gzhan pa rnams kyis kyang nye bar mdzes par byas pa// legs par byas pa'i
las mngon sum du byung ba der dod nas/ de na lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lta 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtsa bar byed do// pad+ma de rnams kyi bar dag na bud

ba bzhin du sbrang rtsi do dag la 'thung bar byed cing/ bdud rtsi la'ang bu bar khyod de/ lha'i dri dang/ ro dang/ mdog phun sum tshogs shong/ zla ba ltar drim med la/ ro dang shazhitu ldan pa de dag la za
! bar byed do// gos de dag kyang gyon nas ji srid du 'dod pa sdugapa nId du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de dgadang lhan cig dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par
byed do// de phyis lca'i 'jig rten nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang las la grob ji ltab pa chen sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro//

gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'an par de rtag par shin tu bde zhing/ bzhon pa dang skyed mos tshal phun sumatshogs la/ skye bo kun dga' ba'irgyal po 'am/ blon po
chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo// de nas yang dge slong las 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thes pa las byung ba'i
shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// der sems nadag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'ishes pas brtags na/
skyes bu dag ba phanapar 'dod pa gang gis srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa mi byed l/ gzhan byed pa'i ng phyir zlog pa byed de/ dge ba'i las la rab tu 'jog pa yin no// bdag nyid kyis srog
gcod pa mi byed pa'i rnam pa du yod na/ 'di la sbrang bu'i snang ci dang/ bung ba'i sbrang rtsi dag las drod gsher las skyo ba'i sun bu dag 'byung bar mthong nas/ desrog gcod pa'i 'jigs pas sbyang/

rtsi za bar mi byed cing/ gzhan zana'ang phyir zlog par byed la/ rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/'din sdig pa'i yin no bar shes nas spong bar byed do/ de thabs kun gyis kyang 'dren par mi byed la/ migazur
tsam gyis kyang lta bar mi byed de/ srog gcod pa dang bral ba'i rnam pa de dag yin no// ma byin par len pa dang bral ba ji lta bu yin zhen/ 'di la sdom pa blangs pasamachod rten gyi gnas susas rgyas
la mar me phul ba de'i 'od la'ang zhu bar mi byed cing/ des bdag gi las mi byed/ de las snag tsha'ang 'byin par mi byed la/pharab tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba yin te/ de ltar srog gcod pa dang/
ma byin par len pa dag sangs pa dag yin no// yang srog gcod pa dang/ ma byin pa len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'di la sbrang bu 'am/ srog chags ma ko ta 'am/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba dag gsod
par ma byed pa yin te/ de dag 'phrul la bsams nas gsod par mi byed la/ gzhan gyis gzung ba zhig yod na'ang thar pa'i byed/ srog gcod pa byas pa'i nyes pas byas pa'i
mo1 'bras bu 'chags par byed/ gzhan gyis srog gcod pa byas na sdig pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su 'grub kyis/ khyed ma byed ces 'doms pa yin te/ de ltar gzhan yang
'tsha bzlog nas sdom pa la rab tu 'jog par byed de/ de ni sdig pa spangs pa yin no// bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyun rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ban 'di la dgon par
myuram/ lam du zhugs pa lam brgyags nyung yang srog la mi blta bar gzhan lam brgyags nyung ba 'am/ lam brgyags med pa// sdug bsngal ba la srog yongs su btang nas/ rang gi kha zas
bgo bsha' byed pa de ni 'bras buche ba yin no// zhing gi 'bras bu'i khyad par sems pa ni/ dus su byin pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar nad rnams kyi nang na bkres pa nad che ba yin na/ de lam
bltas par 'bras buchen por yang dag par sbyor ba yanano// de ltar tshul khrims gnyis ka srung ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par rab du zhugs pa/ sems rtog pa med pa/drang po'i ring bzhanecan
sams shin tu dge ba/ phra rab tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba des/ ma dang pa'i lus la nor bu dag gis rgyan 'dogs pa 'am/sangs rgyas lanor bu dag gisargyan 'bul ba'i mi de lus dang bralanas

[}]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nor bu'i snying po'isar skyo bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang legs par byed pa'i las byas pa de shin tu bltan sdug pa// lha'i yul gyi bde ba byung ste/ dge ba'i las kyi
mtha' spyad pa/ de'i lus de thams cad gzi brjid 'byung la/ lus de las gzi brjid 'byud ba kun tu dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'byung ngo// dpon nyi ma shar ban nyi masar gsal bar byed pa de ltar de'i
gsal bas thams cad du snang bar byed la/ gnas gzhan thams cad kyang de'i rab tu gsal ba des/ de nas yang brgya 'gyur du gsal bar byed do// mdog sngon po dang/ sur po dang/ btsod ka
dang/ dmar po rnams kyis gsal bar byed do// dper na 'ja'i mdog mdzes par 'gyur ba de bas kyang lha'i rang gi lus las rdo 'byung ba brgya 'gyur gyis mdzes pa yin te/ dge ba'i las des
mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lus kyi 'od 'byung bas lha'i tshogs thams cad sbrel gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzesaso// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od kyis gza' dang/ skar ma dang/ rgyu skar thams cad zil gyis
mnan nas rnam par mdzes bzhin du/ lha de 'od kyi 'phreng ba bcazhin de rang gi gzi brjid des 'bar bas rang gi gnas de dag la rtog par byed do// gnas de'ang kun nas nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye

bar sprasashing sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ kun nas thams cad du rnam par mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma brgya lta bur 'od 'byung ba yin no// des de dag mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas phyogs gnyis pa la rtog par
byed den lha mo gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa// rgyan dpe med pa rdzogs pa/ 'dod pa'i rgyu rnam pa snatshogs skyed pa ston pa dag mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ de dag gi nang nas kha cig ni rol

lo1mo'i rnam pa rdza rnga dang/ glang pud/ lcagasakyisil khrol de dag la ston to// de dag gi nang nas gzhan kha cig ni lha mo rnams kyi nang du song nas bro rdung shing/ glu len la/ me tog 'phreng bas mgul brgyan/

tsha pa dag dang ngang pa rnams dang lhan cig pad+ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang du mu'a rnam par rtsor byed do// gzhan dgan lha'i 'bras bu dag la za'o// gzhan dag ni dpag bsam gyi shing nang du dong nas me tog

tshu rnams 'thog par byed cing 'a'i glu dbyangs pa med pa dag kyang len te/ 'dod pa yang dag pa ston pa/ skye bo kun gyi yid shin tu mgu bar byed pa rnam pa du ma yod do// de der skyes te/ lha mo de dag mthong
nas thog ma nyid du yul gyi mchog 'dod chags kyi sprul gyi mche ba lta bu'i yul gyi deb las mngon par zin pa/ stan las las nas gzhan du 'gro ste/ gang na lha mo na tshod dpa med pa dag dang ldan pa//
lha'i 'phreng ba dang gos gyon pa de dag mthong nas/ 'dod chags kyi mos yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyis der 'gro bar byed la/ de dag kyang lha de ga la ba der 'deng bar byed do// lha'i bu gzhan de 'aci
ban/ yongs su gtong bar byed de/ ji ltar bung ba dag gas me tog skam po bor nas/ gsar pa'i drud du 'gro ba de ltar lha de 'chiban/ lha mo dag gis yongasasubatang nas/ me tog gsar pa lta
bu'i lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du 'gro bar byed la/ ma tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba thogs pa/ snying du sdug cing chags pa lha'i bu gzhon nu dang/ thams cad du 'dris pa thog ma med pa'idus nas goms
pa'i 'dod chags kyis nye bar spyod pas rtse bar byed do// lha'i bu de'ang 'chi ban rang gi lha mo dag gzhan du dong bar mngon par mthong nas/ yid la gdung ba'i rnam pa de lta bu s shin tu gdungs te/
ji ltar sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i mes mnar med pa'i lus bsregs pa de ltar de'i stag pa gzhan du dong bar gyur pa'i yid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yid shin tu gdungs te/ sumacu rtsa

gsum gyi gnas nas lha'i bu 'chib na/ phrag dog dang ser sna'i yid sdug bsngalab des mngon par nyoms pa de 'chi ba'i dus byed do// desrid pa phyi mar sems shin tu gdungs pa de la dmigs pa nye bar len pa/
rgyan gyi srid pasasems rtog pa can du byas pa de/ de las gzhan yang mi mthong ste/ de de nas shi nas/ de nas yang sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi nad du skye bar 'gyur
ro// de'i rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu gang yin zhen/ gang gis gzhan gyi bud med la sdom pa ma bzung ba yan te/ bya ba byas pa yin no// de gal te dge ba'i las gzhan gyis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyang

'chi ba'i dus do'i tshi/ de la gzhan gyi chung ma phrogs pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi rkyen 'byung ngo// de ltar legs par byas pa'i nang na nyes par byas pa'i ng de ltar smane pa ra 'gyur te/ de lta bsan nyes
par byed pa chud du yang yang mi bya'o// ji ltar pa rnams 'chib na tshul khrims bdun ma ral ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba de ltar/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi'ang yazhe

tshe te/ de ni rgya cher phyis 'chad do// de nas lha'i bu shi ba de'i lha'i bu mo de dag lta bu gsar du byung ba de ga la ba der/ lcadi 'phrang ba mdog bzang po dri dang reg pa mas pade dag blangs nas/ lca'ibu de'i lus

la 'dogs par byed do// lha'i bu de'ang thog ma skyes ma thag tu dag2/ yid rab du dga' sto/ lha'i bu mo de dag gi drung du 'gro bar byed de// de nas lha'i bu de lha'i bu mo de dag dang phan tshun sAn tu
dga' b rnams tshal dang/ nye ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do// de lha'is donachurnyog pa med pa'i nangan/ parlabo DUrma'i mdog la/'dab mgaser dang/ snying po rdo rje skyes pa dag la bung bum
snyad kyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ bung ba de dag kyang kha cig gi lus li chu la sgrogasar du 'dug pa dang/ kha cig lus gsog la skyo dngul du 'dug pa dang/ kha cig gi lus 'dres pa dang/ khacig
gi lusu byu ru la/ sgro ke ke ru 'dug pa yin te/ de dag rtag tu 'damanas skyes pa'i bad+ma mas pa dag gi nang na rdo bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de ltar lha mo rnams sgra snyan ba des glu

dbyangs litsang/ jig rdob par byed pa de bzhin du/ bung ba pad+ma'i gsab gsibatu dong ba de rnams sgra 'byin par byed do// de nas lha'i bu de lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rdzong dedag gi nang du 'jug ste/

0/de chu la rtse bar byed cing/ dgod/ tse/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de ltar de rnams kyis shin tu yun rade bar rtsar nye bar sbyar nas/ tshalagaser gyi shing ljon pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba shing
gnyis kyis khebs pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed l/ glu dbyas dang/ sil snyan dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan ba/ gser btso ma'ar bo rani po che'i rtse mo bzang po la rtog ste/ rtsomo dang
ldan bde dag la lta'atshogs du ma dang/ lha mo gzhan dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing lta bar byed do// lharang ga pad+ma'i tshal dang/ ma rtog ut+pala'i tshal dri rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ lha'i phun sum
tshogs pa rnams kyi nangan/ lha'i 'phrong ba dang gos gyon pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsor btso mas brgyan pa'i lha dang/ lha mo gzhan de dag dag lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nye bar len

cing rtse bar byed do// gzhan dag na bya dang pa dang/ karan dpa sgra snyan par 'byonecing/ rma bya dang pa sbyongs pa'i nang du zhugs nas rtse bar byed do// de nas yang lha'i tshog sanam mkha'i gzhal med/
khang na 'khod pa gzhan dag nam mkha' la lha mo'i tshogs dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed do/ nam mkha' la sgron ma lta bur gyur pa lta'irol mo la bloshin tu chags pa rnams me tog gi char mngon

par 'babasashing/ sal snyan lan lag lnga dang ldan pa nye bar len pa na/ lha'i bde ba de dag rjes su myong bar byed do// de nas yang lha'i tshogs gzhan dag phan tshun grogs su gyur pa chang gam po dag
'thung zhang/ phan tshun dag ra la 'thun pa'i tshig gis 'dum pa dag mthong ngo// de nas par lha'i tshog sarang gi las dang 'thun pa'i bdud rtsi mdog dang ro dang/ dri dang (bde ba phun sum

tshog sapadag zab mthong ngo// de nas yar lha gzhan dag rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i shing ljon pa dag 'aan po che sna bdun gyi me tog dag 'thog cing/ bdag nyid la 'ching ba dag mthong ngo// de nas yang lha'i tshogs

gzhan dag lha'i 'bras bu lag na thogs te/ pan tshun 'den cing za bdag mthong ngo// de nas yang lha'i tshogs gzhan dag lha'i nga pa rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrog shig brkyang ba'i stong du zhonanas 2 nam mkha' la 'gro ba na

lta pan tshun lus la gnod pa med do// de nas yang lha gzhan dag jeng dang/ rdzudang/ sil dkrol dang/ gling bu dag dang yang daka par b tu ldan pa'i rol mo byed pan/ lha mo rnams lha de rnams kyi mdun na bro gar byed de

de dag dang lhan cig rtsa zhing lhan cig dga' ba dang/ lha'i pad+ma rnams kyis phan tshun rdeg ba na/ 'dod pa la zhen pa de yongs su dgod la/ 2do do pa stan cing smra ba dag mthong ngo// de ltar lha'i bu gsar du skyes

rgya pa de lta'i 'jig rten sna tshogs la sna tshogs kyis sbalapa de mthong ste/ yid la sems pa/ bdag gi mig gzugs sna tshogs lta ba la ngoms pa ma sku/ bdag gi rna bsla rnam pa sna tshogs du mnyan pa la ngoms

pa mi skyo/ bdag gi sna drinam pa snatshogs snom po la ngoms pa ma skyo/ bdag gi lce ro phun sum tshogs pa'i myong bar bya nga drugal ngoms pa mi skye/ bdag gi lus bgo ba'i reg pa dang/ rgyan dang/ byug pa'i/

rig pa ste/ rig pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la dogs pa mi skye/ bdag gi bde sdug pa sna tshogs yid du 'do ba'i chos byung ba thams cad la ngoms pa skyo ba med ba de ni bdag yin te/ kun nas bde ba la chags
pa bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo// de ltar rjes su bsams pa de phan tshun shAni du ma nyams dga' ba/ mtho sa dang 'thunang sna tshogs dag gi yul dang yul dag la nye bar ston par byed do// srid pa'i

tshogs drug la rnam par chags pa de/ kun nas srid pa'i mes yongs su bskor nasasrid par byed de/ dper na sos ka rab tu tsha ba'i nyi ma'i gung lam zhig mya ngan gyi nad du zhugs te/ mya ngam gyi nang du zhugs pa
de'i mya ngam kun nas rtswa dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lam dang/ shing ljon pa'i yal ga 'phur ba dang/ tshal dang/ ri khrod kyi tshal skam po dang/ brag dang/ ri sul der mi gang zhig gis ma btang ngo// de

mi des kun nas tshal gyi mi des yongs su bskor bskom gyis gdungs te/ gar bab bab tu 'bros so// de nas gang dang gang du 'bros pa de dang de nyid du ma'i phung po rab tutsha ba tshal gyi shing sreg par
byed pa/ kun nas shin tu 'bar ba yin te/ de ltar shin tu 'bar bar byas ngo sa tshal gyi shing thams cad sreg par byed do// de nas mi de lam gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du kun nas rab tu
[R]bar ba mthong ste/ de mo de'i nang du song nas sreg par byed kyang 'bros par mi nus la/ de ltar mo'i nang du song ba de thul gyis tshig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skyo ba las kyi ma
thams cad rtsa dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma skam po sug pa'i tshal gyi ma lta bu'i srid pa'i mya ngam gyi nang du rab tu 'jug par byed do// de nas de srid pa ma lta bu'i
